text: This is the coffee scoop I have been looking for.  My mom has a coffee scoop and makes the most perfect coffee every time.  I always used a table spoon and it never turned out just right.  With this scoop my coffee comes out perfect every time like my momma's and it has a nifty bag clip so I don't have to leave the scoop on my coffee!!  The clip is super durable and dependable.  It is much more than I expected.  I love the colored gems on them.  It looks great on my coffee bag and they come in a variety of colors.  The scoop is equivalent to 1 1/2 tablespoons.  I use 1 scoop to make my individual cup of coffee!!  Get Brew Perfect coffee with every cup!!* I received this product at a discount for quality testing and review and it exceeds my tastebuds!!

I do the saliva test and it seems to be accurate to me.  You are supposed to test 2 hours after you eat.  You can use a spoon and spit on and place 1 test strip on the spoon for 15 seconds for an accurate reading.  There is also a urine test.  I have not tried that one because I prefer the saliva testing.  I would have given the product 5 stars but the case is difficult to open and fits tighter than others I have tested.  Make sure when you first receive the box to open it from the bottom to get the test kit out of the box.  Otherwise you may take the cap off while opening the box and spill the test strips.  Great kit, just needs tweaking on the cap because it fits too tight making it a pain to open and close.  The test strips are jammed in there also and they should have a tiny bit of room to move around freely.  Minor modifications to the packing would make this a 5 star product.* I received this product for quality testing and review. The product itself meets my expectations, minor packaging issues caused 1 star to be deducted.

These test strips are super easy to use and give a wealth of information to help your body. My mom has used PH test strips for years to test the pool but I never knew they had test strips for you.I didn't know by testing your saliva it could tell if you are too alkaline or too acidic and there are major complications with being too much of one or the other.  By resting your PH it can help you tweak the foods in your diet for optimum health.  I have liked on a terrible poor diet for several years now and I want to change my eating habits along with exercise to shed some pounds.  Knowing my body's PH can help me keep it in check so I feel good enough to keep a proper diet and exercise regimen.* I received this test kit for quality testing and review.

I had never heard of a silicone wedding band until after TV host Jimmy Fallon from the Late show had a finger injury, called ring avulsion.  You may not want to google pictures of ring avulsion because I almost got sick glancing at the photos to write my review.  Now I see a lot more people turning to them since he is bringing awareness to his horrifying injury.I have a gorgeous diamond wedding band but my fingers tend to swell and I have to go a few weeks without my wedding ring every so often and that is troublesome to me.  I have been married for over 12 years and I hate to go without my wedding ring because guys always think I am single and ask me out or for my number even when I am with my pre-teen boys.  I don't want to resize my ring because when the swelling in my fingers goes down my ring fits or even twist around on my finger.I think this silicone band is great and is inexpensive compared to my wedding ring.  Not to mention, I like to wear it to the gym or when I am working in my flower garden.I have been wearing the ring for a week and it is super comfortable on my finger and I often forget I am wearing it until I see the pretty Aqua color.  It comes with a 1 year satisfaction guarantee and if it ever breaks they will replace it.  That is my kind of warranty.*  I received this ring for quality testing and review. I am satisfied with the quality of this ring to give it a 5 star rating. I would be happy to answer any questions.

ONE OF MY FAVORITE ALBUMS!!  I HAVE NOT BOUGHT AN ALBUM IN A WHILE BUT THIS ONE I COULD NOT PASS UP.  SO MANY GREAT SONGS ON HERE!!  WORTH EVERY PENNY!!  CAN'T WAIT TO HIT THE GYM WITH THIS MIX.  MY KIDS ARE GOING TO BE SO STOKED WHEN THEY FIND OUT I PURCHASED IT!!  I HOPE THE NEXT MIX IS AS GOOD AS THIS ONE!

CLELO Vintage Canvas Leather Schoolbag Laptop Backpack Rucksack - BlackThis is a really well made vintage style canvas with leather accented rucksack.  I have been in love with canvas since I started wearing a hobo bag that was made of a canvas material.  This bag is great for my pre-teen boys to use.  I shoved a ton of clothes in it to take photos of for my review to fill the bag out for the photos.  The zippers are nice and rugged and go well with the bag.  The back is padded and has padded straps for comfort.  The leather straps on the front of the bag are actually a snap closure making it easy to get in and out of your bag quickly.  There are a variety of pockets inside and outside of the backpack and even a zipper enclosure on the backside of the backpack.  My oldest son called using the bag 1st as soon as I got it out of the box.  These bags are a thick canvas material with sturdy stitching.  They come in an array of colors.* I received this bag for quality testing and review and it exceeds my expectations.  If you have any questions about my review please ask and I will respond.

This kit has everything you would need even a few buttons for on the go!  Nice compact zippered case is durable and the accessories are nicely kept inside.  It comes with a bundle of extra safety pins and push pins to fit many needs.  The small pair of scissors are sharp and a great set of standard needles to sew something up quick!This kit is great for anyone especially college students, new families and baby showers for new moms and dads!I love this kit because my boys are always busting the seams of their teddy bears and need me to see them up.  I have a small teddy bear hospital on my sewing table waiting to be serviced.  With this kit I can finally see them up and get them back on their way back to my boys room!* I received this kit for quality testing and review.

This Bamboo pillow cost less than the same type at my local big box store.  My mom just paid over 30 bucks for one like this.  I was wondering what all the hype was about!! What is really so special about this new technology in a pillow?  Well, when I received this pillow in the mail and opened it up I found out exactly what all the hype was about.  It is truly a luxurious hotel quality pillow.  Here is why:  • Luxurious shredded memory foam technology that promotes adequate air circulation, cooling comfort, and temperature regulation in comparison to standard memory foam  (Which is true, because with standard memory foam pillows I get so hot and sweaty, that I can't sleep)  • Durable 40% bamboo and 60% polyester blended fabric cover that can easily be unzipped and machine washed when needed (Hello?!? It comes with its own fabric cover, which is nice and soft)  • Substantial breathability and shapeability that molds and fluffs to YOUR comfort for any type of sleep, including back, stomach, and side sleeping. (which I was happy with because the pillow easily molded to my needs instead of it's own, making it super comfy so I can get a good night sleep)  •  Relief from insomnia, allergies, snoring, migraines, TMJ, neck and back pain, and more!  (I suffer from insomnia, allergies, snoring, TMJ, back pain...well that's terrible to say out loud.  It has helped my insomnia and allowed me to get comfortable faster to get a better night sleep without waking up hot like with other pillows I have tried.  My back pain is gone too.  I am not sure about the snoring or TMJ since nobody has been awake to hear if I am snoring or grinding my teeth.  I have asthma and allergies and I am not sure if the pillow has helped that either, probably depends on what you are allergic to.)If you are not satisfied with your pillow they have a money back guarantee!!  I am 100% satisfied with this shredded memory foam Bamboo pillow and it is definitely worth every penny for a great night sleep!* I received this product at a discount for quality testing and review and it far exceeded my expectations!!

These trays are so cool!!  Fun and easy to use.  There is a trick to getting the ice out easy. You can either run cold water on the bottom of the tray or just having it out of the freezer for a minute while you pour your tea or drink is usually long enough time for them to become lose enough to slide right out.Made out of a high grade food safe silicone makes them stretchy to twist and turn the tray.  I put tea in my glass and turned the tray over with a plate under it and started by popping 2 middle pieces out.  Then I popped the 2 on the outside of the middle ones that popped out.  Finally, I popped out the other ones from the middle out.  It took me less than 1 minute total from getting it from the freezer to popping it into my iced tea.  I have has lots of practice with other silicone ice trays I have tested.  It takes some practice to get the hang of it.  But once you go the silicone tray route you will never go back to hard trays with small ice cubes!* I received this tray set for quality testing and review.

This is a quality pair of headphones if you have an android device.  It is not geared toward Apple so the volume button does not function with Apple.  You can pause and play or answer and end a call with Apple.  The sound quality is great with an equal amount of bass and treble make it a great set to have!!These are a great gift for android users, come in cool colors and are sturdy with a great stereo sound!!* I received this set of quality headphones for testing and review.  I have an Apple phone and can verify the functions and the great sound quality.  I will be giving these wonderful headphones to my ANDRIOD family members to rock to the beat!!

I love the 360 design because when my preteen boys were 1 I gave them baby toothbrushes with 1 side and my youngest son always would turn the brush away from his teeth to brush instead of to his teeth.  This brush is well designed, comes in a variety of fun colors and a ton of microfiber bristles.  Great to use with just water for training or they have Flouride free baby toothpaste you can use too.  Just remember to use a tiny amount for proper tooth brushing.  It has a nice, wide easy to hold handle for small ones and it the perfect step to your children to learn how to brush on their own.  The sooner you teach them the better.  By boys have been successful at being cavity free except for 1 chipped tooth since we started their brushing regimen early.  It makes it second nature to them.  Starting early will help save thousands in costly dental bills in your future.  This is a great 1st step to success.Even great to give as a birthday present or baby shower gift!!I personally will be using it to brush my doggies teeth.  I think it works even better than most dog tooth brushes I have seen at the big box stores.* I received this baby buddy 360 toothbrush for quality testing and review.

I love these nifty TSA Approved locks.  Way better than the lock and key ones because I always loose the keys and my husband has to cut them off.  Not to mention on our last trip from Hawaii to Los Angeles TSA cut the locks off of my Husband's military gear and we still had to travel all the way to SC.  Making it a real inconvenience for our family with dogs in tow.  If we had these locks at the time they could have simply opened them, checked them and locked out expensive military gear back up.  They assured us they would not be checking his bags and to leave the locks locked and not to worry.  Wrong, wrong, wrong.  These locks are so important to have. They are so easy to open with the 3 digit combination.  I was able to reset the combination within 30 seconds and my lock was ready to go.Great not only for air travel.  Can be used for your gym locker, backpacks, laptop bags, tool boxes and so much more.  It is a heavy duty lock and well made.  The dials turn easily and the locking mechanism is super strong.  Will hold up to lots of wear and tear!!*  I received this lock for quality testing and review and it is a trustworthy lock I would trust for my family!

I don't know about you but safety is a top priority in my home.  We have a fence around our yard, 6 dogs to alert us and cameras surveillance around our property with a large bright pole light that lights up my entire yard.  But sometimes even all that doesn't deter a burglar because they don't pay attention to the tiny cameras around my home.  That is where a nice bright sign comes in handy telling them they are being watched.  A sign like this would deter me from entering a home unauthorized.  I am giving 1 to my parents and I am putting mine up on the 1st and back of my home for our safety!* I received these for quality testing and review.

I was initially going to give this product 4 stars but decided to give it 5 since on the product page it has full instructions and photos showing you how to use the tools.  Therefore completing what I needed to make it a 5 star set with the correct purchase price.I love how the photos show you how to use the tools because I learn better by visually seeing how something works.  The tools are a great little sturdy set to get the job done.  Perfect for my preteen boys since we have 4 BMX bikes and they are always tinkering on them.  My oldest knows how to use the tools because I don't fool with their bikes.  But with the photos it was simple enough for him to figure out.  Great set to have on hand for when you need it!  Great gift too!* I received this set for quality testing and review and it meets your needs at an economical price.

Cute jump rope that is fully adjustable with a skip counter.  Fun for the whole family and great exercise too!  I love jump rope because it is a great way to get your heart pumping and it is fun at the same time.  It doesn't feel like exercise and that is what is so great about jumping rope!!Great for my boys because they like to compete with everything and this counts the skips so I don't have the daunting task to do so.  Makes it easy and fun for us all!* I received this product for quality testing and review and it works as advertised!!

This is an adorable set of classy door stops.  They hang on your door when not in use and add a nice flare to your door knob.  Set of 4 well made with a nice, durable hanger.  Great for gifts too!* I received this set for quality testing and review.

This is an adorable solar powered bird bath.  It has a few attachments for everyone's needs.  I was super happy with the pre installed attachment.  It worked as soon as it saw sunlight.  It didn't even need hours to charge up or anything.  I was super excited to see it spray the water.  It seems to be a nice, durable quality and a great design!  It will look great in a variety of outdoor arrangements.  I will be placing it in a bird bath next spring.  I don't want it outside during our cold, harsh winter.* I received this product for quality testing and review and it works great!!

Professional quality temperature change gel polish!  Easy to apply and only took 1 minute for it to dry for me under my UV flashlight.  I applied 2 coats and dried each under the UV light.  I didn't have any sticky residue with this polish like some other reviewers have mentioned.  If you do have a sticky residue just use a gel cleaner and rub over them and the stickiness goes away.  I didn't have that problem none of the times I have used it so far.  My nails are silky smooth with a high gloss shine.  I love the color change.  They have a variety of beautiful salon quality temperature change gel colors to choose from.  Gel is the way to go because it last longer than regular nail polish.  I used to never paint my nails because I would have to do touch ups every other day.  With this polish it stays on for 2 weeks.  To remove the polish simply soak a cotton ball or cotton round in an acetone nail polish remover and wrap it around your finger for 2-3 minutes then you can easily peel the gel polish off.  It is truly that simply, you just have to be diligent about the process.  You can save hundreds of dollars in a year by doing a salon quality nail manicure and pedicure at home!!  This is a great polish that will stay on when you need it and come off when you want it!* I received this gel polish for quality testing and review and it is a 5 star quality product! If you have any questions, please feel free to ask!

This nail polish is excellent!!  It dries in a few minutes under a LED light or UV light.  The funny part is that I was sitting under a LED lamp using an UV flashlight to dry my nails.  I didn't have any sticky residue left over with this polish.  I applied two coats and it has a high gloss shine. I love the combination of colors.  They look amazing!! It is great to have salon quality gel nail polish that last 2 weeks between changes.  I never wear nail polish on my fingers until I found these polishes because I hate having to redo my nails every other day.  No longer the case with this wonderful set of  polishes!!  I just have to decide which color I want to wear 1st.  They are all great!!Does NOT contain Toluene, Formaldehyde, or Dibutyl Phthalate.  It goes on like polish, wears like gel!  Easy to take off in a few minutes!Usage Instructions:* Step 1 : File your nail first. Remember to push back or remove excess curticle. Then clean the nail surface.* Step 2: You may want to apply a BASE Gel first for perfection. Dry it under UV or LED lamp* Step 3: Apply the Gel the way you do with nail polish.* Step 4: Cure it under UV Lamp for 2-3 minutes or a LED lamp for 1-2 minutes.* Step 5: Apply a second layer if you want a solid color and cure it under UV or LED lamp again.*Step 6: If it remains sticky after dry, remove the stickiness by Gel Cleaner. (I did not have this problem).It is truly a superior quality nail polish with great temperature change combinations!!* I received this set for quality testing and review and it passed with flying colors!!

These work great for my itchy allergy eyes.  I am allergic to grass and during allergy season my eyes get all red and irritated.  I purchased these the first time at our local grocery store because they were going out of business.  I am so glad I did because they have worked great ever since.  They are my go to allergy eye drops!!

Super strong clamps that hold tight without damaging the garment.  It will not lose its grip and leave you in an embarrassing bind.  Great to wear under military uniforms or suits. Your shirt will stay tucked in and most of the time your shirts are not many different lengths in the first place so that should not become a problem.  The strap material will not rub and irritate your skin either like some other brands I have seen.  Look good and professional in what you wear on the outside by taking care of it on the inside.  You won't be disappointed.*  I received this product for quality testing and review and it deserves a 5 star rating.

This Ashwagandha Dietary Supplement with 120 Vegetarian Capsules is made in the USA by Good Manufacturing practices.  Studies have shown this all-natural extract significantly reduces stress, enhances cognitive function, supports your immune system and cardiovascular health.  Ashwagandha is often referred to as Indian ginseng.  Ashwagandha has been used in Eastern medicine for over 2,500 years and has immuno-modulating effects that boost your immune system and aid the body in lowering cortisol levels. I have high cortisol levels.  I have been under a tremendous amount of stress the past 2 years and my ever increasing waistline is my proof.Ashwagandha is known as an adaptogen. Adaptogens are an amazing class of healing plants. These plants help balance, restore and protect the body.They helps you respond to any influence or stressor, normalizing your physiological functions.  They can recharge your adrenal glands, helping you respond to stress.  Ashwagandha is one of these proven plants to make a difference in your life and well being.Since taking them I have noticed a difference in my stress level and I have been able to sleep better too!!  That is a relief.  The best part is you can take this supplement 1-2 times a day with food and there are 120 vegetarian capsules making it a inexpensive product to add to your healthcare regimen.*  I received this product for quality testing and review and you will be pleased with the results.  Do the research, the facts of this amazing healing plant are good.

This is a good clinical strength duo to help curb your appetite and help you loose weight.  Yacon Root is all-natural supplement to help promote healthy digestion, a balanced appetite and metabolic support.  The Garcinia Cambogia extract helps with appetite control, blocks fat storage and decreases stubborn belly fat.Over the past 2 years I have been under a tremendous amount of stress and that along with my poor diet have caused my waist line to grow at a startling rate.  To the point when I look down I have to lean forward a little to see my toes.  I am only 34 and my health on the inside is doing pretty good from what my doctor says.  However, she said I am obese and need to get my weight under control of I will be looking at serious health issues in the near future.My biggest problem is late night eating with a diet of  potato chips and soda.  While taking this supplement I noticed that I had less cravings and did not gain any extra weight.  Which is good since I had noticed about a 10 pound increase recently.  I am so tired of the yo-yo dieting and a supplement like this to help curb my cravings and fight belly fat motivates me to want to lose extra weight by eating healthier and exercising.  I am one of those people that like to see things in reverse.  I want the magic pill to produce results and then I will be motivated to take the next steps to get the weight off and keep it off.I especially like this supplement because it Made in the USA with Good Manufacturing Practices.  Just take 2 of each before a meal with 8oz of water and see the difference for yourself.  Even though this has helped me and I like the results, does not mean you will get the same results.  I have had good experiences with some supplements and terrible experiences with others.  It just depends on how your body reacts to the supplement.  This is just my experiences.  Good luck and bye bye to belly fat!!*  I received this product for quality testing and review.

The speakers are a great quality and sounds clear during song play.  But the bluetooth connectivity to my iPhone 6 plus is not perfect.  There is a slight distortion or interference you can hear when you are changing songs.  There is more treble in these headphones than bass.  I am more of a bass person so if you are not a bass fan then these are great for you.  The fit is great once I figured out how to put them in correctly.  I can shake my head like a bobble head doll and they don't fall out.  I could see how they are sweat proof by way they fit in your ear. I like the flat design of the cable and I can barely feel it on my neck.  These would be great for running and sports.*  I received these headphone for quality testing and review.  They pass with a 4 star rating, good quality with a minor bluetooth flaw that can be overlooked.  The quality is worth the price.

I am not a fan of ear hook headphones but these are great.  They are very comfortable to me and adjust easily to fit my needs.  The sound quality of these are excellent.  There is the right amount of bass and treble in these.  I love music blasting in my ears to feel immersed in my music. The sound of the piano, harp, violin, drums and keyboard sound like I am at a live concert.  These are a great set!  I have tested many sets of headphones and these fall among my top 3.  The volume control works great on the headset.  The buttons turn the volume up, down and pause the music.  You have to make sure your volume on your phone is up so you can increase the volume on the control to the max level.  Otherwise you won't get the highest sound available for the headphones.Great fit, quality, design and functionality to fit multiple customers needs.  Superior sound quality and sturdy zipper close carry case.  A really nice red color too!!*  I received this product for quality testing and review and it exceeded my expectations!!

My preteen boys are famous for losing the ear buds off their headphones.  Which is so frustrating because I end up throwing them away and buying them a new pair.  Which cost a lot!!With this set they are comfortable and easy to apply to many types of headphones my boys use.It is great they are made out of a medical grade silicone with an ergonomic design. Now I have an inexpensive high quality set of replacements when my boys lose an ear bud!!  I wish I had known about these a few years ago.  It would have saved me money to replace the earbuds instead of throwing away perfectly good headphonesThe set includes:* 1pc S* 1 pc M* 1pc L Earbuds* 2pcs Earhooks* I received this product for quality testing and review and I highly recommend this replacement set!!

These are the cutest metallic silver twist ties.  You can use then for a ton of gifts and party favor bags.  There are so many holidays you can use them with gift bags!!  Buy in bulk and save money!  These are great to have on hand for any event.Listed below are some of the events you can use them for.* New Years* Valentines* Chinese New Year* St Patrick's Day* Easter* Mother's Day* Father's Day* Cinco De Mayo* Memorial Day* Independance Day* Halloween* Thanksgiving* Christmas* Weddings* Birthdays* Bake salesThey are 5" in length which is the perfect size for gift and part favor bags!!  They work great!!*  I received this product for quality testing and review.

This unit has a pet friendly setting that works for my 6 dogs and cat.  It has a nightlight with an on, off or night sensor.Ultrasonic, ionic, and electro-magnetic settings to deter pest.It has deterred pest in my home but not eliminated them all together.  I had one mouse come in and it took me 3 days and setting a mouse trap a dozen times before I caught him with a peanut butter trap.  It would not go near my glue traps and stole the cheese and peanut butter off of other traps so many times.  So it must have been some type of super mouse to get by everything so many times but my persistence paid off.I have seen a decrease in spiders that enter my bathroom.  I had one that I thought was dead but I went to get it out of my bath tub and it was laying on its side and started moving slowly when I touched it.  Maybe the device was causing it to slowly die.  I am not sure.  But I had never seen anything like that before.I would not recommend this as a set it and forget it type of pest control.  I have a few of these in different rooms and have glue traps and mouse traps too.  I dry to keep my home pest free anyway I can.  I think these are helpful but not 100 percent effective.  If it deters 50 percent of the pest then it is worth it to me.  I used to catch 1 mouse a month and it has been about 6 months since I started using this type of product and only the 1 mouse has entered my home.* I received this product for quality testing and review.

The red and blue rear tail lights are super bright and have 4 different functions.  On, flash, SOS and off.  Made of an aircraft grade aluminum body, waterproof, batteries included, no tools required, quick release strap and 240° side angle. These rear tail lights have all the bells and whistles. One can be placed on the front of the bicycle and and one to be placed on the rear. These lights are not for illuminating your way but for safety.They are not only for your bicycle they can use for a number of safety reasons. My boys place these on their backpacks and walk to the school bus whenever it's dark outside and passing cars easily see them.These make great gifts or even party favors. You can have a lot of fun with these lights and keep people safe.I almost forgot about the tire wheel valve cap light.  They can be used on a bicycle, motorcycle or car valve stem. It is waterproof and the batteries are included. It is super bright, motion activated, lights up at all speeds and is really cool to see.  You won't be disappointed in the quality and performance. Great design!!Don't forget to register your product for their lifetime guarantee.* I received this product for quality testing and review.

This Abco Tech stand is A-A-AMazing!!  It holds my iPhone 6 Plus with Otterbox case so that should tell you how strong it is.  I was highly skeptical at 1st to test it in the clamp, but it didn't waiver.  It is super flexible and can be manipulated in a multitude of ways.  Even from the floor to the bed or floor to my couch.I was awestruck when I saw the photo on the box of the man having it hang around his neck and he seemed to be watching a movie. I am going to do that when I go to the gym.  THAT IS AWESOME!  I can see myself at the gym on the dreadful treadmill watching movies while walking.  Right now I count the seconds until the torture is over on the treadmill.If you register the product you get a free lifetime warranty and that is money you can take to the bank!!  The seller has you register all their products for warranties and that is a really great extra!  This is a perfect gift for anyone with a smartphone or gps device!!  Great for your bed, car, desk, bike, couch or even around your neck!!*  I received this product for quality testing and review.

There are plenty detailed articles and reviews which will go over the cons of this product so I will only add my current experiences. First of all I believe the company packed into too many " good things" that they viewed would make the product appear to be BETTER. But things like green tea, papaya  and apple pectin make this tablet more closely related to those all natural diet pills that were so trendy in my 80's teenage years.At this point in my life and after a bleeding ulcer I need real probiotics and Acidophlis of which there is very little of the former ( 233mg of Inulin and a multi-strain (?) probiotic) and none of the later.And while some have reported constipation with use after only one week of use my experiences are those of having taken a Metamucil overload and not wanting to be too far from a bathroom.This product appealed to me for the obvious reasons and I quite like the idea of a single serving pill over the typical 2-3 servings a day many probiotics dictate. But quite frankly I find this mix questionably effective and I think I will go back to my good ol' reliable Sundown Naturals Acidophilus, Ultimate Probiotic Formula with 13.3mg of Lactobacillus Acidophilus.

Gorgeous and comfortable to wear, this is a beautifully simple and elegant watch. slim and light on the wrist it is actually easy to forget that it is even on the wrist. This is a time only piece, there is not calendar, stop watch or other feature it is simply time with four point time markings (3,6,9 and12) and the black face and Diamond accent clearly add to the fact that the design is for looks and basic function.I would argue that the two finest features of this watch is the ability to adjust the wrist band at least three sizes easily with removable links with very secure clips so there is no fear of it coming lose and losing the watch. Arimitron's instructions which are included cover ever model for setting the functions to adjusting the size of all their wrist bands and they are easy to understand. It is unfortunate that not all watch's include such a helpful guide.Second, for the price of this watch for it's fantastic quality this is a very good bargain.

Well, I have really been enjoying this Bible and I'm 47 years old.This is really an outstanding study Bible. It might be for kids but it has not been dumbed down at all. It is the Common English Bible, a more modern language slant that the King James version but it is all here, this is not a cliff-note-paraphrased children's bible, every verse is here.What makes it for children aside from the cartoon children (the Deep Blue Crew which are the illustrated guides and despite being modern in nature they are not offensive and delightfully relatable.) but it has these wonderful In-text notes that both highlight certain passages and let a child understand meaning and what they should be looking for in a chapter/book of the Bible. For example the sailboat notes will help you grow stronger with God by pointing out positive traits. Umbrella notes offer help in difficult times, The Light house notes are Faith builders and the Life preserver provides answers to tough questions.There are also "Did you know?" notes for historical trivia and interest, Navigation points for verses to remember and I really enjoyed the God's thoughts?My thought's which are devotions that explain how the Bible applies to life today.For as much as this Study Bible has to offer it is wonderful that it is still pretty sleek in design, a nice trade size and light weight that can be handled by small hands, but the content is such that this book might easily be carried on thru their teens to adulthood. Like I said, this is a real Bible and it is designed to be a full-on working study Bible not just a gift Bible. And a must for and Bible school student. This is the Bible I will be giving in the future.

True to fit and did not shrink or fade nor did the logo peel in the wash. This is a very nice, durable midweight t-shirt that has stayed hole resistant after a rough Halloween, So I'm quite please that it is built to be worn and last.

I love the size and portability of this charger, when not in use it tucks away nicely in the glove box or even one of the many little nooks and cranies that it ubiquitous in all vehicles these days.Of course the fact that I can charge up both my phone and a tablet or laptop at the same time while I travel is the biggest and greatest part of this charger. Love it!

Love this microfiber armband. Can be worn on the upper or lower arm and will not slide during a workout no matter how sweaty (wore mine during circut training rather than a run.). This is a light weight band, easily adjustible with a solid velcro closure and is waterproof in rain and snow but can be washed in cold water and air dry and the plastic shield can be wiped down from water spots with a soft cloth.Has access points for headphone/charger plug ins at both ends, this is definately one of the most versatile for fitting more than one phone and perfect for the larger screen smartphones, as my G4 had room to spare.Very happy with it.

The murder of a prostitute in 1919 Cordova in Alaskan territory actually makes for a nice, fun gossipy read tho very predictable, as Charlotte is literally fresh off the boat when the murder occurs, her circle is limited to a handful of suspects. So the reader will be able to pick their way to the conclusion fairly easily but unfortunately that is not the problem.To flesh out the story further Pegau loads the pages with Charlotte's suffragate feminism and past history. In a land where everyone goes to reinvent themselves Charlotte's is the least interesting and quite frankly the more I got to know her I saw her more as an anachronistic selfish, self-important spoilt brat whose ham-handed handling of the investigation actually spurs more crime and nearly gets quite a few other people killed. By the end of the book her solution to the mystery really fell to the luck of having just a few suspects to cull from not because she is particularly bright.I enjoyed the mystery yet disliked the heroine, thankfully this was just a light, breezy read and Charlotte is easily forgettable, but I really am surprised that Pegau plans to create a series around her. The writing is decent, but Charlotte is no Miss Marple - and that is the character Pegau clearly is attempting to emulate.Will not be moving forward with this series but would be intrigued to check out the real case this mystery is based on.

Top notch collection of truffle chocolates. This is the Swiss chocolates that made European chocolates famous.Do not be put off by the fact that there is only 25 chocolates in this collection. Each piece is a velvety, rich chocolate that melts in your mouth and so rich and indulgent that it will be savored and will last.This is a beautifully wrapped box, perfect for gift giving and comes with a small booklet that itemizes each candy. It is also shipped in a durable box designed to protect the product.Highly recomended.

I recently underwent a breast reduction surgery and thank God for these bras they are perfect to wear after a surgery.- They are soft and do not rub or irritate my incisions/scars.- They stay in place and do not roll up, catch or tug on skin or clothes.- The S/M/L/XL  sizing makes them perfect for the fluctuating size and shape changes the breast goes thru the first six months after the surgery.- They are easy to wash and maintain and do not shrink.I still sleep in a firmer, 100% cotton workout type bra when I sleep, but during the day these nice light weight but comfortably snug bras are like wearing a security blanket. I feel fortunate to have found them when I did.

Wow!Now this is the Swiss and European chocolate I remember! So smooth, silky the nuts and raisins are fresh and chewy, and this includes two heavy duty chocolate bars at 6.9 ounces these are generous portions and I want to add that the quality of this chocolate makes it ideal for gifts and special occasions. I'm also impressed with how well this was enhanced with a nice glass of red wine ( Root 1 Cabernet Sauvignon and Red Rock Red blend). While the cost of two bars of this chocolate might seem a bit prohibitive, this is actually a quality product and worth it.You will not inhale this chocolate bar, in fact you will be finding ways to savor it. Seriously this is nothing short of heavenly.

This is actually a very good muffin mix, the flavor is decent and it is fairly moist and not too crumbly like most gluten free mixes are.I was intrigued to try this as it is also my first outing with Millet flour which is the primary grain with teff and I will say this is the difference. Most gluten free baking mixes are made with soy and bean flour which is dry and bitter to the taste and lets not forget that for many celiacs soy is just as toxic to their system as wheat can be.This mix bakes up fluffy and browns just like regular muffins and pastries without the glossy, sticky finish that is common in some mixes. I will admit that as flavor goes this is second only to Udi's muffins. If I made any adjustments to this recipe it might be to add almond flour to add a bit more sweetness and moisture. The mix also relies heavily on additions (fruit, veg, nuts) for added moistness. I added one cup of frozen unsweetened blueberries and I'm pleased with the results. It was moist out of the oven and they were still moist after they cooled and spent 8 hours in the refrigerator.Also the package suggests baking at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes. That might work in Texas (where the Bona Dea company is located) but I live at 7000 feet in the Rockies and had to bake it for 35 minutes before it was done.But this is a good product and I will buy it again as well as try out their other mixes.

Well, I must say this is quite possibly one of the nicest things I own.I was reluctant to get this as I apparently kill watches. I am one of those people that has to wear digital (which I hate! After all the trouble I went thru to learn how to tell time when I was a child, wearing a real watch is a badge of honor.) a typical watch will stop within a day or two, but resume on someone else's wrist. I can wear a Timex and slow it down so that within a week I will have lost 45 minutes, so my reserve with a watch this nice and of this value is entirely understandable.However, I have been wearing it for two weeks now and it runs like a charm and has not lost a second. I am truly delighted by this!This is a beautiful womens watch and as you can see in my pictures it has a 1.5 inch diameter which provides a very easy to read clock face, the watch and band is stainless steel and very durable and is very easy to set. The band itself is actually very large and I will need to take it in to a jeweler to have the band adjusted. The band sections are spring loaded so perhaps a handier person could pop out the extra panels and adjust it yourself.As I said I stop/slow watches and I have only had this a couple of weeks. You can be assured that if there is any change I will be posting an update in the future.

Don't let the humor used in retailing this product detract you, in fact just consider it a bonus. The product itself absolutely, 100% works and when I looked into it the science of using essential oils in the commode has been around for quite a while, so I suppose the only reason it has not been a steadfastly used in the battle with bathroom odors is because essential oils, which is what Poo-Pourri is made of is actually pretty pricey (hence the retail cost) over the fake chemicals that the aerosprays use.What I found intriguing is how the scent really is activated after you go. I went ahead and experimented and spritzed the toilet in advance in the hopes that the scent would give the bathroom a lovely smell even tho it was not particularly needed at the time. The Vanilla mint is a surprisingly wonderful scent, I'm not usually a fan of vanilla, but this smells fresh like real vanilla and the mint really has an energizing effect. Back to my experiment: in the bowl as is I did detect light, pleasant scent in the room. However, it is when it is used with the proverbial number two that the scent really implodes so to speak and there really is no feces undertones.And since you only need 3-5 spritz for every use a 4 ounce bottle will go a long way so I consider the price to be justified.

This is a really decent rug cleaner that actually got an old tar stain out of my truck floor, but then again Oxy really does work. The cleaner itself has a nice mild scent with no chemical overtones, it also rinsed out well and dried nicely, the carpet was fairly pliable with hardly any stiffness after it dried. And wit h 52 ounces this is a generous amount to have on hand.

Sweet little plush doll that will double as a stuffed animal or security blanket. She is VERY well made and the details sculpted into the fabric like her toes, fingers and little butt cheeks is adorable. Her clothes are a soft knit that are held on with velcro making it easy for little fingers to dress and undress her. She is machine washable and the magnet in the pacifier and her face are barely noticable. Despite being recommended for 12 months and older I believe this is a doll that can safely be given to an infant to cuddle with. These are the kind of toys that will have longevity in a child's life and not just a passing fad since it is clearly designed to bring comfort.I also think this would be a great toy for anyone doing the Operation Christmas Child boxes for Samaritans Purse!

In my entire life I had never participated in a Bible study group that centered entirely on women, so I was naturally intrigued to see what this book was about.I found the format to be basic and easy to follow, tho I did not have access to the accompanying videos that Ms. LaGrone has made to go along with each section which covers a five week period and the questions fairly rudimentary and maybe that was why I was not completely comfortable with it. As I said I have never been in a Bible Study course designed just for women and I found it to be unnecessary and by catering to women I felt there was a certain coyness, rather an attempt to seduce women into consecrating themselves to God by feel royal and special which felt a bit underestimating to the personal challenges and the actual discipline of commiting yourself to God. I felt more like I was sitting in on a Junior League meeting.This did make me interested in Jessica LaGore, I wanted to know more about her and her ministry and what her denomination might be since, it is off from everything I had grown up with (Lutheran/Episcopalian) other than her blog, which I did not find particularly informative I found her to be a listed Dean at Asbury Theological Seminary in Kentucky (Does explain the overwhelming sense of "Southern Woman" I was picking up from her writing.) which is an evangelical & multi-denominational college & that she did a stint with a Methodist church. I just really hoped to find out more about her than the echoes from her book blurb. I like to have a better "connection" with my "mentors".While her faith and enthusiasm may be sound, I just don't want my relationship to God to feel like I'm being inducted in to a special club. God is not a club.

After having read Rebecca Alexander's first book, "The Secrets of Life and Death" I felt that she was an author with a lot of promise but still had a ways to go so I was willing to hang in there for her. Sadly her second outing is actually worse than the first and by this I mean her writing needs some serious reworking, she needs an editor with a deft hand that can help her to pull her ideas together and give her storylines a better cohesiveness. As is her writing is a frustrating affair to get thru. Her imagination and even her research seems sound, but she really has difficulty with her characters, pacing and general plotting of format.For example Edward Kelley once again is her predominate secondary character but he is so weak and dislikable that it is difficult to want to read his sections. Coupled with Alexander's disjointed writing does not help. Her other dominate male character, Felix also returns as a possible love interest and researching partner for Jack, but his sections once again are not only fruitless, but he exhibits and ignorance that is frustrating in that he is clearly on a loose end and is more of a hinderance rather than a help when dealing with Jack and Sadie's condition as "borrowed timers".And rather than deal with the situation of being a "Borrowed Timer" which seemed to be the evolution of the plot from the first novel, Alexander has chosen to embed her second outing with her take on the werewolf mythos which despite what the reader might think has absolutely nothing to do with Jack and Sadie's situation and feels more like a red herring rather than a primary story line to drag this out for a third outing.Problem is, Alexander needs so much help with her writing and story plotting that despite the glimpses of promise she has given us I am perfectly willing to drop her right now.

This is essentially Hipster lit - for Young Adults. Despite being from Finland this brief novel covers everything from pitying self-involvement that brilliantly illustrates a narcissistic personality disorder, apathy, obsessions, skinny jeans and sexual ambiguity, transgenderism, lesbianism and hetrosexuality and none of these things had anything to do with the "mystery".  I felt like I should have been reading this novel thru thick dark glass frames with fake lenses while pounding a six-pack of Pabst Blue Ribbon beer with some dreary Emo band played on repeat on an MP3 player.This is brief skit involving a stalker and a hat tip to the Snow White fairy tale with a feminist slant. What I disliked the most about it: Lumikki (I really hate the trend of dish-rag heroines being inexplicably irresistible to everyone around them when they barely have the energy to breathe.) What I liked best about this book: I read it just inside an hour.

I have yet to try a product from the Ahava skincare line that disappoints so far Ahava is perfectly designed for sensitive skin, which I will presume to mean that it is ideal for all skin types.This mud mask in particular is a revelation: it does not need to be pasted on as thick as typical mud masks, it dries clear and needs to be on no longer than two minutes before rinsing. It is not tight or uncomfortable when it dries either, so I did not feel the need to hurry and scrub it off like so many other masks I 've tried. And the light scent is fresh and unoffensive and of course my skin was left feeling soothed with no foul side-effects or reactions. Most masks are recommended for once or twice a week use only, but this mask is so easy on the skin and senses that a person could use it daily if they were so inclined without harsh drying.Just one more Ahava product to love and yes I highly recommend this to absolutely everyone.

I admit, after pulling this from the fridge and rolling it all over my face (I opted for the use as a  mask option) it was very soothing and I also enjoyed that when it dried it did not leave a tight feeling film on my face.I suppose my biggest reservation is the price for this item, particularly since it is more or less an additional item for your overall skincare treatment that isn't really necessary, particularly for the elimination of acne. I can't exactly condone it's use when the money can be more aptly spent on a product that will actually work towards clearing up acne rather than offering minor relief. Sadly a bag of frozen peas would be just as comforting and much, much cheaper.

I'm actually pretty impressed with this little soap making kit. The instruction manual is a gem unto itself, not only does it have a very nice selection of recipes it makes note of additions and explains why, for example adding oatmeal (soothing to skin) and honey (a natural anti-bacterial) will accomplish. The entire premise is based on the science and history of soap - how it is made, why we use it and how it achieves effectiveness rather than simply focus on pretty colors, pretty scents and just being pretty. Also includes great direction in not only mixing in additives such as oils and scents but also in how to combine colors for both sheer and opaque soaps as well. This kit is for the child with more scientific inclinations and is a great and very satisfying start for functional creativity and learning.Despite being recommended for children 8+ I gave this to my niece for her sixth birthday, she has been helping in the kitchen since she was a toddler and able to successfully crack eggs without shell flecks since she was three so I figured she could handle this. And she is nailing it! The great part about the book is that it also has a nifty "how to fix it" guide in case things don't quite turn out as expected or a complete do over is needed. Which is great because then it teaches a child that mistakes can be fixed or upgraded to a wonderful accident.The kit comes with just basics: 5.28 oz of clear glycerin base, 5.28 oz of white glycerin base, 3 .53 oz pigments for color, 3 sets of molds, two measuring spoons and 5 gift boxes. This is really a perfect amount to get started, all additional ingredients are simple items that can be found at home, and if the child really gets into it these are items that can be bought elsewhere quire easily.

This is a great foot cream, it is not greasy and soaks right into the skin (My father even uses it as a hand cream, he is a carpenter and claims if it works on the callouses on his feet than it will do just fine for his hands as well.) the texture is so nice and creamy, but the light scent is crisp and invigorating. The Tea tree oil gives a nice tingly buzz to the tootsies without burning and at 5.1 ounces this is a nice amount for the price.I will most definitely be getting more of this.

Not just for the Mexican kitchen, as a single person in a single house hold this is the perfect sized casserole dish as it is basically a 3-4 serving size. It is dishwasher safe and with proper care cleans up well. The lid can be turned upside down which makes it easier for storing in smaller spaces and for stacking. And the color just adds to it's serving appeal.Love it!

Perfect little stand alone mystery for travel, beach read, quiet afternoon, etc. I call these types of mystery's a "Spa read" since they can be knocked out in an afternoon, are perfect for relaxing and go really with with a hot cuppa-whatever-suits-ya!Leslie Meier clearly has her formula down for her mysteries which might not be for those who expect more complexities and less predictabilities in their mystery reading but the homespun, gossipy nature of these reads give a nice lightweight escape and a very quick read. The fact that this, like her others are holiday themed will add to their attractiveness as a special treat to read along with the season. I felt like I should have been lounging in a tub with spice cookies and a hot mug of cider, this was an enjoyable 4 hour escape from the world and should have come with a packet of bath salts.

This was my first Ace Collins book and I was actually taken aback by what a talented writer he is, with over 60 books out I feel really behind that I have not heard of him before. Particularly since I wade through a lot of dreck that should never have wasted the paper it gets published on I am truly astonished that I am just now being introduced to this very fine and extremely capable writer.But I digress, as for the topic at hand: Hollywood Lost, I was pleased with the writing style as Mr. Collins did a great job of emmulating the old noir style writing and often had me reflecting on Elmore Leonard (tho' without the odd ball humor) I really felt as tho I had been transported back to Dust bowl 30's and Hollywood just hitting its star-making stride. Despite name-dropping actual actors (William Powell, Cary Grant, Clark Gable, Joan Crawford, etc.) The primary characters are fictional, tho the two male leads, Flynn Sparks and Dalton Andrews are so well fleshed out that the real actors they are clearly based on are obvious. As Ace Collines is a Christian writer his primary character, Shelby Beckett is clearly a protagonist with rock-solid morals and by placing her on a Hollywood movie lot where raft and corruption is the name of the game part of the suspense is in weather Shelby can be tricked into temptation. This is clearly the plot point that gets the most development as many readers point out there is otherwise a great deal of predictability to this whodunnit (which is quite frankly also a common plot device in the old Hollywood noirs - it was more about sensationalism and setting the scene rather than a complex mystery.) which will feel rather frustrating to many readers, but thankfully Ace Collins is a deft and intelligent writer and quite frankly the "Big Reveal" is absolutely worth the read. In fact it was so good it more than makes up for the chapter 2/3 of the way in that have you wondering if everyone was lobotomized.I'm also impressed that Mr. Collins can write Faith based books that are neither saccharine nor preachy. He delivers a great story without obscenities, nor crass hook lines that aim for shock value. This is a great book that can be appreciated by anyone either on faith or secular level.I will be looking into his other titles for sure.

While the storyline in the book that accompanies this aircraft model set might be a bit tenuous the instructions are visually very clear so a non-reading child will have no difficulty in figuring out how to put together any one of the 10 models featured here.vOf course once they get started with the basic 10 they will most certainly branch off and begin inventing their own.There are 73 pieces here, a few of them are fairly small and most could be a choking hazard, but I really think the age 3 is a perfectly safe beginning point for this set. There are enough pieces to build each model, but just enough to build one model at a time, since this is a learning toy it is meant to be taken apart and put back together unlike many model toy sets which only produce one thing. The parts easily fit together and come apart, but are sturdy enough they will not be loose and a child can play with what he/she builds. They are also solid and sturdy with mostly curved edges so no nicks or sharp parts.As a beginner engineering kit, I think it is brilliant and my little nephew fell right into it for hours - even his big sister tried to horn in on the action. And I really felt that it is proof that this is a thinking child's toy because unlike a lot of toys in this genre this comes with a nice sturdy plastic tote with an enter-locking lid for storage and organization. This is a bigger plus than you might imagine when it comes to also training a child to keep his room clean and tidy.

I picked this tile set up for my dad and I will admit we were a bit put off when we first opened the box and saw that the tiles appear to be just molded plastic and despite the raised pattern, pretty slippery.Thankfully, despite the hard, molded plastic these are not slick and as you can see from my photos even with saw dust scattered on them they are stable and easy to walk on.This set comes with 32 12x12in squares with a 1in lift that can be arranged in any pattern (half the tiles are silver, half black so you can even play with the design.) thanks to the interlocking loops underneath. They snap together much like legos, and the trim edge pieces give it a nice clean finish so you won't trip stepping up on them. These are designed for mechanics and garages, but as you can see my Father needed them for the flooring in his work trailer. We were both really impressed with not only how quickly and adaptable these tiles laid out but when it came to fitting a tile to an edge they cut very easily as well giving a beautiful custom fit.They sweep and mop up well without gathering grit in the seams because that's how well fitted they are, they are not slippery and that 1in of raised space is a nice insulator for keeping my Father's feet warm while he works inside the trailer. He is extremely satisfied with this work stable tile kit.

When I first fell into this novel, I was actually swept away. The dialogue and the action actually picks up on momentum as this is clearly an action paced book. Robert Brockway actually has some pretty snappy repertoire and I didn't have a problem with his characters, maybe it's my age but I actually preferred 1977 NYC punk Carey to 2013 LA Stunt woman Kaitlyn, who quite frankly picks up a rather masculine tone by the end of the book. I guess Brockway was writing so fast his characters lives not only overlap so do their personalities.There really isn't much for conversation, in fact it becomes clear early on that Brockway is all about the snappy one liner, the zinging retort which unfortunately does not add up to any conclusive story-telling. In fact about halfway through his story line is heavily sandwiched between loads of graphic violence. Really everything splats, snaps, scrapes, breaks, oozes, splatters and drips with a zippy retort, usually from Carey in the midst of it all. And that was when the book starts to drag because I'm pretty sure I'm not the only one out there that actually began to get bored from uber-violence and I kept thinking, "Robert Brockway really LOVED Chuck Palahniuk's books, especially Fight Club.And then this was no longer a unique read to me but rather one authors gushing (literally this book should be dripping blood.) tribute to another in the same off-beat, violent genre. So it was okay, but really lost it's uniqueness along the way which was too bad because I started out liking this book so much and by it's strangely inconclusive end I just felt "meh".

That's right, for those of us Gals that don't blow our savings on bikini waxes we invest in beard trimmers for men and take matters into our own hands.As advertised this is in fact a waterproof body groomer and it is ideal for the shower, as many of us know most beard trimmers are designed for dry use over a sink. (yeah, right.) So I must say that to finally have a battery operated trimmer that works in the shower and at such an affordable price this is a lucky find indeed.The groomer comes with two different trimming combs a 1/8 (3mm) one which is great for maintaining the bush (no pun intended, but here it is.) and a 1/32 (0.5) for fine tuning the hedge. Both of these can be removed so that the trimming head can be used directly on the skin for a full and comfortable clean up without pinching or nicks. At 1.5 inches across this is a quarter inch wider than your basic beard trimmer so it will trim a wider swath but will need a little more attention to fine tuning smaller areas.I liked that I can use this in the shower, I also liked that it can be used on damp of wet hair. It takes a little longer but being in the shower keeps clean up to a minimum. It is also a nice compact 6.5 inches long making it perfect for travel or just tossing in the gym bag and the silicone handle offers a third hand by allowing you to hang it on a shower heard or bar.So far I am very happy with this.

I cheated and I didn't eat this as a cereal. Instead I altered a hard tack recipe and the result is a delicious cracker that is great to take hiking or camping. Here is my altered recipe:Hard Tack with muesli1 pint greek yogurt or whole milk1.5 teaspoons of baking sodahalf a cup of sugar1 cup muesli1 cup olive oil1 cup whole wheat flour (add additional flour as needed until dough is stiff.)flour for dustingCombine ingredients. dust counter or rolling mat with flour. Break dough into small balls and roll thin, about 3x6 inch strips. Cook in oven for 10 minutes then turn over and cook for another 5 minutes or until brown.The cranberries and seeds really added to the density and flavor of the hard tack.

I'm really amazed with this product, as I am trying it out in a pinch.Normally the only Conditioner I use is Biolage Ultra Hydrating conditioning balm, as I have medium to fine hair and Biolage is the only conditioner I have ever used that seems to rinse clean and actually offer some moisturizing protection to my hair. Most conditioners weigh down my hair or make it greasy either right after I use it or by the end of the day my hair had collected enough grit to seem so.Just for Me Hair Milk has shea butter, soymilk  which had me concerned about not rinsing out well and making my hair oily and honey. So I'm really surprised and quite happy that the product does what it says: it moisturizes my hair, makes it very soft and smooth and more importantly it washes out well and does not grease up my hair and I have been using this for a week now. And I just need a dab the size of a half-dollar piece to get full coverage.I am in fact very happy that I have found a new product that is every bit as good as the Biolage Hydrating balm.

Okay, so I'm only with holding a star because I have not had a chance to try this out in cold weather yet, but I took it out this weekend while our day time temps were in the around 70 and 82 degrees with the night time temps dropping to 44 degrees the first night and 38 degrees the second night (I live in Wyoming). And I must say I had a very comfortable weekend, the first night I laid on top of the wrap around insert for the minimum coverage, if anything it was a warm enough night I worried that I might get too warm and the nylon shell might wind up sticking to me, thankfully this did not happen. The second night the wind picked up and put a bit more chill into the air so I wound up burrowing down under the insert and stayed comfortably warm all night.Since it is summer I did not cinch in the hood but went a head and left it on as extra cushioning for my pillow, but the hood does come with a draw string cord to be cinched in as needed, it will also zip apart. In fact the insert will also zip out, and for anyone who can't sleep with bunchy covers they will appreciate this. The entire sleeping bag will also unzip to be used as a comforter or can even be zipped together with another bag to create an extended bag. the best part about the zips is that they connect easily and taking this bag apart and zipping it back together is easy and there is no struggling to get the zips to connect.Anyway, another nice thing about this bag is that it is very light weight, kind of like a down vest, only with a synthetic filling and it washes up beautifully. By instruction it can be machine washed and dried if necessary but recommends hang drying and quite frankly this is really all you need to do. I threw this in the washer this morning and most of the water was spun out of it on the last cycle, I hung it up to dry out side and it was mostly dry within an hour.So far I am very pleased with this bag and look forward to trying it out this fall in cooler temps to see if it gets a full five star rating.

I love, love, love this pan and for the quality I can not believe it retails for under $30 bucks.I normally cook with cast iron, but I have been coveting a decent ceramic pan just to have a really decent non-stick pan (Teflon sucks!) which can be pretty pricey. This is so strong and so beautifully made and the ceramic coat is lovely and trust me nothing sticks and you really don't need anything more than a wooden spoon to stir and flip - nothing sticks and the entire pan heats up evenly which mean this pan, while dish washer safe can be cleaned up with a sponge or dishrag there is no scouring needed to clean this pan.Of course I also marvel over the fact that while the pan heats up the handle does not and I was able to handle it while it maintained a room temperature. I am going to get at least two more of these pans.

Wow! I can not believe what I got in this backpack.I repacked the entire contents of what I took on a month long trip to Europe from a few years before into this bag (3 t-shirts, sweat shirt, jacket, 1 pair of jeans, 2 pairs of shorts, 3 bras, 30 pairs of underpants, sandals, 6 pairs of socks and my 12x6x12 cosmetic bag and a bottle each of shampoo, conditioner and body wash) and I had at least another 8 inches to the top of this bag to spare. And this did not include the outside pockets and straps that will also hold water bottles and extras, I can't get over the room in this pack and the innovative inner pockets which are great for organizing and accessibility.I am 6 foot tall and I am really happy with how this bag fits me. The design and make of this pack is also high quality with re-enforced seams and zippers and the real treat to this bag is the light weight aluminum support rack and the mesh encased padding that holds the weight away from your back allowing airway to keep cool while also alleviating the weight of the pack making this perfect for carrying 12+ hours while trekking. The belt is adjustable and also padded for comfort, and the color is actually a deeper blue than as photographed and I can see a guy using this without fear of feminine connotations.I love and highly recommend this pack for anyone who hikes, travels or is looking for a decent sized, sturdy pack to use as a bug-out bag.

Well here is what I liked about this bag is that it is light weight, sturdy, well made and the padding actually made it more comfortable and the cushion creates an airway so the pack is not plastered right up against your back. The straps are adjustable and for a short hike or a daypack you can carry just a few things in a fairly organized manner. There are three small mesh pockets inside right at the top so that a phone, keys or wallet can be easily grabbed. On the outside there is a single zippered compartment which is big enough for a smartphone (more on this later). Two other big pluses are the outside adjustable flap which is perfect for holding a bike helmet, or in my case a rolled up sweat shirt or jacket making it extremely easy to get to. and also as you can see in my 3rd photo is the water bottle pocket along the bottom making it very easy to get to your water while securely holding it in place, there is no chance for it to just slip out.The strap system is a bit convoluted but I did like the elastic band roll system that holds the adjustments in place, they are very effective.What I didn't like about the bag: The Action pocket sleeve is a waste, My Galaxy S4 was to big too fit in it and the S4 isn't even the biggest phone out there so I tossed it, I don't care for the two skinny cross straps at the top that hold the action pocket in place, as you can see I am a curvey woman and those straps, while adjustable are uncomfortable and dig in - hate them and do not use them. The zipper pulls are also a nightmare, as you can see in my second photo they are bits of elastic string that will stretch without pulling, I will be replacing those ASAP. Also the opening to the main compartment is a little narrow, the bag itself will expand to hold quite a bit but the mouth of the bag is maybe 18 inches, so if a person wanted to carry electronics a full sized laptop is a no go event tho the pack itself has room for it. Also on the straps themselves there are two small mesh pockets that are kind of a why bother, they are narrow enough that you could get a pocket knife or chapstick in there, but deep enough that you would have to work at it to fish them out.In a way I feel that less is more with this bag, all of the cute little additions are either unnecessary or do not work and create complications rather than solve them. However cute stuff aside, the depth and volume of this bag is very nice and probably most importantly carries very comfortably for several hours.

I have been wearing Bali Passion for Comfort bras for years now, they are the ultimate t-shirt bras, light weight, wear like iron and hold their shape. A great bra for a full figured gal. So I was actually expecting that same bra only with a front close option.Well this is certainly a variation of the Passion for comfort bra: still runs with the same smooth lines, sturdy build, will hold you up all day long, washes well, and the front clasp is a nifty turn and lock clasp that will not come undone no matter how much you shift around.Only one down side, this has a padded molded cup that is considerably more than "lightly lined". The Passion for comfort bra is lightly lined with no unnecessary padding. Now while this padding might be great for winter and no show-thru for anyone over a B cup the padding is not only unnecessary but unwanted. I don't particularly want to be bigger than I all ready am.

For an over the counter acne treatment, this is perfectly suitable for the odd mild yet inconvenient case of acne,i.e. the odd blackhead spot patch around the usual t-zone areas or the occasional whtehead that needs dried out and if I only use it in those areas I can avoid drying my skin out. I do have sensitive skin and I have observed in previous reviews complaints that users skin was drying out and painful. This can happen particularly if a person smears it over their entire face and they may only need it on their chin, nose or forehead. So please use only on affected areas as directed.Otherwise an individual may be in the market for RetinA .05% cream, which is more helpful for more severe cases of acne, and I most definately encourage anyone to see a dermatologist before they invest in any product. Tackling acne is unfortunately not cheap and before taking a chance on anything please visit a specialist to see where you are at. There is a very good chance that the Proactive Line is all you need, but I will also point out that RetinA and other prescription meds cost the same, so you might want to get it right the first time.

This is my first time out will Paul Asay and quite frankly I am unimpressed. As a Christian movie reviewer, I found him to be just a little to eager to find a bright spot in some really questionable shows and I did not find myself swayed. I am also disturbed that he seemed to expend more energy into being cool and entertained by these shows and that the case for God and the Christian message was tenuous and not strongly argued.The writing style is suitable for the 12- 14 age group but none of the movies and shows he reviews, and yes these chapters are movie reviews, are shows I would want a kid to watch. Example: True Detective, 2012, Friday the 13th, anything with zombies in it etc. His banter bordered on the hipster doofus, and yes, at least once in every chapter he makes a reference to hipsters. Yet by the same token, despite his best efforts to appear hip and blithe in his writing he illustrates just how far out of touch he is by reviewing the latest movie version of superman and attempting to discuss X-men, the Avengers, etc. when he has clearly NEVER read any of the comic books these movies are based on and his targeted audience will know him to be false! I don't think he has ever read a comic book of any kind  otherwise he would be well aware of the rather intense and dense mythologies of each and every Superhero. Then Asay would realize that movies, at best are cliff notes to these characters. His "I wonder what will happen next with Hell-boy" commentary is especially cringe-worthy and had any real back ground right there he could have had an excellent thought provoking treatise on free-will, the influence of God and the awareness between right and wrong and not just a paragraph. As an adult I was put off by his writing it felt forced, as though he put more effort into being clever rather than presenting a truly intellectual dissertation arguing the elements of God and his message in modern media outlets. Sure he throws in the odd quote from C.K. Chesterson and C.S. Lewis, and miscellaneous Bible verses to show us all that at some point in his life he has picked up a book. However when he goes off on the Hobbit and the Lord of the rings he appears completely oblivious to the fact that these were originally books written by J.R.R Tolkein, who like C.S. Lewis created the Lord of the Rings and the Hobbit as fantasy centered on Christian theology. Wow, but it's nice that Asay kinda picked up on it in the movies and felt that he was on to something. Seriously, even wikipedia could have done this guy some favors had he decided to add a little research to his general movie-viewing assessments.I could really go on, but in a nutshell the book felt light-weight and out of touch and that there was no research done. Asay's comparisons and arguments felt secondary, rather than primary and as a Christian, I felt both spiritually and intellectually slighted.

Well, This isn't a bad book really. I don't know if I would call it a cleanse since this is not the typical liquid only cleanse that typically defines a "cleanse" this is actually a four day vegetarian diet, complete with soups and salads that include nuts and tofu. So calling this the "Four day Cleanse" is just pretty language for what is actually the "Four day enema" since cleaning out the bowls is the real end here.I actually picked this book up for other reasons, I wanted to snag all of her juicing recipes. I am terrible at eating my veggies and I do buy into the idea that you get more nutrients from them raw than cooked. Interestingly enough I love her fruit and veg ideas but I am loathe to just juice them as it is a loss of fiber which is really the point of the four day cleanse, really and a loss of crucial vitamins. So I forgo the juicer and I actually use my Ninja to whip everything into a very satisfying smoothie. And rather than enjoy them for four days I try to drink two or three of them a day with my normal diet which also includes dairy and meat. And yes, I do feel better for finally eating more veg and throwing fruit in will even make a turnip tolerable.

I feel like I'm being really generous here with three stars, but I'm kind of torn.First of all, I really enjoyed Paula Brackston's writing. This is the first novel of hers that I have read and I do believe I will go ahead and check out some of her other books. I was completely wrapped up in the side-by-side past/present story telling, it really kept me going tho I admit that I preferred the Megan/Merlin storyline to the Laura/Rhys storyline. Of course the common thread throughout the novel is Merlin, but I felt that Brackston had difficulty fleshing him out like she wanted too.Really the two lead female characters get the best descriptive development. Megan is especially well done and I truly liked her. She is actually a very strong, brave and noble young woman and it really is Megan who drew me in. I was on pins and needles with concern as she manueveres her way thru castle intrigue under the vile Lord Geraint and his trashy wife.Unfortunately, and this is where I am torn with my rating. I really disliked Laura. Where Megan was every possible positive a reader would want in their heroine, Laura is the exact opposite. Laura is selfish, self-involved, whiney, remarkably stupid and a terrible wife and friend. In fact she blindly puts the lives of her husband and friends in needless danger merely because she needs a shag with a clearly scary stranger just to feel better about herself. I almost put the book down, but her best friend, Steph gives her the lecture we all want her to have so that showed me that the author was not particularly fond of her, herself so I plugged along to see where it would go.By the end I was a bit stunned and really dissatisfied because, Merlin is supposed to be a wise and talented wizard who can see the future, yet he plunges Megan into the worst possible scenario, much like Laura, out of pure idiocy and selfishness and there is no clear reason why he should be so found of Laura. Frankly there is no reason for anyone to be fond of Laura. The Anwen character is the true wise mystic in this tale - whoever the heck she is? Seriously, I want to see Anwen again, she is the perfect character to drift through many a novel.But what really upset me, was that like most novels in this genre it all appeared to be going in the direction of Laura facing her consequences and the tragedies they reaped. Instead, Brackston got lazy and decided to quickly wrap things up with a rescue and a reward. whf? If this were a real fairy tale the point would be that being good has no reward, but being useless and dangerous gets the big prize.

We use 2 of these on my husband's down pillow to protect it from his perspiration. It works well so far- it's only been a few weeks. It is thicker than a regular pillow case. My husband likes the added bulk as his down pillow loses bulk over time.

I gave these 2 stars instead of one because the strong solvent odor could perhaps come out in the wash. Additionally these were tiny. They looked like they were meant for a child. I am 5' 5" tall and 100 pounds and I doubt they would have fit. I put my hands inside the waist elastic and stretched and it didn't seem to give near enough. The odor problem seems like a common complaint for this type of item. I did find these type at Kohl's without an odor but theirs didn't have any spandex which you need for leggings.

The company tries to make up for quality with quantity. 4 pairs for $7 including shipping. This are very thin and flimsy. They barely reduced noise and I was afraid to wear them swimming. They are the cheapest earplugs I have ever tried. I would bet good money they are made in China. I  returned them.

I was thrilled to learn of non-toxic chalk markers because as a chemically sensitive person I can't use Sharpies or dry erase markers. These have a small smell of what I guess is alcohol but it doesn't make me ill.The markers are fine and work like the other reviews state. The colors are nice but I would have liked a bright blue.
