This is more like blue mixed with white. My concern was the lids are inconsistent. Some fit snugly , others loosely. Only one fit well on both ends. They all snapped closed but in different ways. When you were using a pen and put the cap on the other end, 2 of them wouldn't snap in at all and others barely did and if bumped could be dislodged. My biggest concern was that they might loosen more with use and not snap on at all. The package is cheap and is held together with a flap that will likely break with time. They don't list the country that these are manufactured in.Chalk markers are lots of fun and now that I have tried them I never want to be without them. They even work on balloons unless I make it too thick or wide (I am a balloon artist). I returned these pens and have ordered another brand. Perhaps this was just a bad batch. You can feel safe trying them because if they are defective Amazon is wonderful about refunds.I went to the companies website  and asked if there are any solvents and a week later they sent this answer:  The components of markers are: titanium dioxide that is the naturally occurring oxide of titanium. isopropyl alcohol that is secondary alcohol, Daylight Fluorescent Pigment, dispersing agents and waterI noticed they didn't identify the dispersing agents, which to the best of my knowledge is some type of solvent.

The bra is just like the picture. It comes only in one size, which in my opinion is a size small. It takes forever to arrives- several weeks as it is sent from China. It is thin but for the  price you can't beat it. Why only 3 stars? They state that it is made from cotton. The tag says: 95% viscose and 5% spandex. I looked up what viscose is."Viscose is both a semi-synthetic fabric formerly called viscose rayon or rayon and a solution of cellulose xanthate produced by treating dissolving pulp with aqueous sodium hydroxide and carbon disulfide used to spin the viscose rayon fiber."  It feels like rayon.

I love the cobalt color and the cut. I am thin and have a small bust and this fits me well. I usually take a women's small but ordered a Large due to review's advice. It fits a bit snugly but if I put on 10 pounds it would still fit. It is higher quality than other I have tried. I like the fact is a cut to fit the curves of the waist, not straight like t T-shirt.A note for chemically sensitive people like me: The shirt arrived with a solvent odor and I was concerned I would have to return it. I contacted the company and they said it was from the graphics. I put the shirt in my garage and in 2 weeks when I checked on it the odor was gone.

What's not to like? I add 20 drops per liter of water. The water tastes better and it keeps constipation at bay. And of course my body gets the trace minerals it needs and a good amount of magnesium as well.

This "probiotic" actually has a strain of bacteria that is similar to antibiotics- that strain kills fungus and good bacteria!!! I found this out when I went to see a specialist in Candida/Leaky Gut. He took me off this product. He said all soil based probiotics have this in common. I had switched to this from GutPro which had been working for me on the advice of the Paleo Mom. After switching constipation became  a big problem. But I gave it a good chance anyway because I thought it would help in the long run.There is another reason for the low rating. This company doesn't back up its product. They have no guarantee policy. So I wasted my time and money (buying 2 bottles) of this product.

I was given this a gift and didn't think I would use it much. I am chemically sensitive so tastes and smells bother me a lot. I don't like the taste of stainless steel so I always use glass , even hiking. Amazingly this product is an exception. I do not taste stainless steel. When my friend gave it to me she said, "If it tastes at all like stainless steel, soak it overnight in half water/half vinegar." I didn't wait to see if it had a bad taste, I did the overnight soak.It is wonderful to have a non-breakable, lighter alternative to glass. I like it so much I have bought another one. I just wish they came in other colors. :)
I use these to keep my hair protected in the sauna. They are thick cotton and look like they will last. I am very happy to have quality at a reasonable price.

I ordered a pretty blue color which they call, "G1898_Denim Medium-1". The color I received was much darker- a very typical dark color of blue you can find anywhere.  I am 5' 4" and weight 100 pounds. The upper part was a little too baggy but it was the lower section that caused me to send them back. The knees and calves were quite tight. They were uncomfortable.Lastly, they smelled of chemicals or something. Hopefully that would have come out in the wash.

I gave these gloves a try and they weren't my cup of tea. I have small hands and they were too big. Also, I guess I am a creature of habit. I simply prefer cotton oven mitts. Also, I am very chemically sensitive and these mitts had an odor. The company sent me a nice letter and cheerfully refunded my money. They stated they would check into the odor. They haven't had anyone else mention it. As I said I am quite sensitive.

I really like this "thermos". It keeps my soup hot without preheating. It is sleek, not large and clumsy like a thermos. It is relatively easy to clean and the quality is high. The only problem I've had is that it can be difficult to open. It is highly polished and my hand slips making getting a good grip difficult. I plan on buying a sleeve.

I really wanted this to work. My sink had clogged and the plumber found bits of scrubbers (the cheap kind you buy at the store) had created the jam. I searched Amazon for something better. All the other chain-mail scrubbers had poor ratings but this one had good reviews including a video by a top 100 reviewer. I was jazzed.Imagine my disappointment when it barely worked. I cook eggs in a cast iron pan regularly. It only took off about 10% of the egg. The problem is the diameter of the chain-mail. It needs to be about one tenth the size. You might as well try cleaning your pan with a your snow chains (a silly extreme example to demonstrate a point.) I gave it 2 stars instead of one due to the quality of the chain.No worries if you want to try it. I returned my to Amazon and they refunded my money no problem.

I make a lot of bone broth soups and usually use Vision glass pots. But I needed something bigger and these have a glass coating. I have been using it a couple of months and it works fine. It is smaller than I thought, I wish I would have gotten the next size up. You can't see through them but they are so light they are easier and safer to clean than glass pots. The price is very reasonable if they hold up. I have no idea how long it will last.
Seems to work fine. I like the big dial. I don't have to get my reading glasses to read the dial.

The scrubber works fine on pans. We used this kind for a couple of years. Then our drain clogged. When they snaked the pipes they found the reason for the clog. It was bits and pieces of the scrubbers.  Use at your own risk.

I love this calendar. :)  The days of the week are minimized in space and the extra length accentuates the waterfalls. I bought 2 of these.I have 2 recommendations to the manufacturer. First: Make the calendar a little wider. Second: Reduce the packaging- it is ridiculously wasteful. I sent one of the the 2 calendars to a family member and had to cut down the box. It is twice as wide and several inches in length longer than needed.

I do like that this product doesn't defat the coconut it uses in its flour. However, this product is not raw. I contacted the company and asked about the temperature of the processing. They said it was 70 degrees Centigrade which is158 degrees Fahrenheit. There are brands that produce actual raw coconut flour where the temperature is quite low.Perhaps the company is going with a government standard of what can be called raw. To me raw is processed at a low enough temperature to not destroy the vital living enzymes. This is dead food. i want something with raw energy to add to smoothies, nut butters, and fruit. You are going to use it for cooking it wouldn't matter of course.

These are very overpriced. They should be about $9. I felt silly ordering them but I really needed something spill proof and I like using glass, mason jars in particular. When I got them I really felt gypped, regarding price. Four plastic lids and straws for $20. Recently, while shopping at Target, I came across Ball (the people who make mason jars) Sip and Straw Lids for $5. They work well but are not spill proof.So, if money is a concern and you don't have to have spill proof, save yourself some money and get the ones from Ball. They are sold here on Amazon as well.I put a similar review on the wide lid type. You can check out the companies response by clicking on the comment link.

These are very overpriced. I felt silly ordering them but I really needed something spill proof and I like using glass, mason jars in particular. When I got them I really felt gypped, regarding price. Four plastic lids and straws for $20. Recently, while shopping at Target, I came across Ball (the people who make mason jars) Sip and Straw Lids for $5. They work well and don't have a grommet.Save yourself some money and get the ones from Ball. They are sold here on Amazon as well.Update: Please click the comment link if you want to see what the company said and my response. They do make some good points such as: the Ball Sip and Straw lids are not spill proof and they require a metal ring. I make some good points as well.

After reading the great reviews I was ready to try this product... almost. Knowing that oils are sometimes extracted with solvents, I took the precaution of writing the company to find how the oil was extracted. Here is their response:Black Currant Seed oil is extracted using a solvent (hexane) extraction processThank you for your inquiry,NOW Product Information GroupThis explains the low price. You get what you pay for. I will look elsewhere for a healthy product.

I liked this funnel at first, especially since it fits both regular and wide mouth mason jars. But I have only had it a couple of months and it's already rusting. It has 4 rust spots, 2 of which appeared after a month.

I have used this product for about 20 years. Up till about 2 years ago I was very happy and would have given 5 stars. The brushes lasted well and so did the unit. The pointed head is just what I need to clean between my crooked teeth and really get the gum line clean.But recently, the brushes started having problems, some from the start, the other after different lengths of time. They are expensive and are supposed to last 3 months. I called customer service at Zila about 9 months ago to see if they had changed where the brushes were made. I spoke to a caring lady who really listened. She ended up replacing 2 brush heads and taught me what to do in the future. There is a tiny serial number on each brush. You just call and give them the number she said, no problem. It had to be within a certain time frame of course. I usually buy 6 at a time. At 3 months each, the total time I have to call and report them would be 18 months. At the end of the call I was very happy and felt like this was a good company that cared about their customers.About 7 months later another one was bad, right from the start. I swapped it out and put off calling since I had plenty of time. I called about 6 weeks later and got a very different customer service rep. She was not caring and didn't care to listen much. She just wanted my information so she could look it up on her computer. She found they were ordered 9 months ago. She stated that I only had 3 months to let them know not 3 months per head. She just wanted to move on to the next customer. I asked when the policy had changed. She said that had always been their policy. I tried to tell her about my previous experience but she had little interest. I felt very unimportant to her. I mentioned that if you buy 6 at a time, and they last 3 months, how will you know if the others are bad. She suggested I open all of them when I receive them and test them. That is an irritating solution but I guess I will have to do it. However, that won't help with the ones that die well before their time.I'm going to send a copy of this review to the company. Let's see if they care at all. I will update you.UPDATE: I emailed a copy of this review to Zila on March 1st. Weeks went by with no response and I had given up on hearing back from them. Finally, on March 18th they  replied with the following:"I apologize for the lack of empathy.The person you spoke to is new and the rules in place for her have always been the way they are today.We have been handed some pretty tough directives in our warranty with no wiggle room.The policies that we used to take as suggestions have now been locked and set in stone.Again, I apologize for your situation and the aggravation that it is causing you.Thank you,Kathryn RogersZila/a Tolmar CompanyOrder Entry SupervisorWeb Support"So essentially, we are stuck with a poorer quality product that they backup very little. Obviously they think they will make more money this way. But I think they will lose business from unhappy customers.

This press works well and I really like that I get more garlic out of each clove. Since we eat a lot of garlic, this savings should pay for the press after about... 10 years. :)  It is easier to clean than my old OXO but doesn't hold as much. Another good feature is it takes less strength so would work well for the elderly. It appears sturdy and should last for years.I took off one star for the high price. It should cost $20. This is stainless steel, not gold plated. LOL.

I read or scanned through most of the reviews as part of my research. I have used this product off and on for years but it seemed to have changed. Some reviewers thought the same, and made conjectures and conclusions. I will break my review into 4 parts so you can easily scan through to the data you need: Current facts, tips to save your enamel, and general health benefits and hot ACV baths.1. BRAGG'S CURRENT FACTS:  Like other reviewers, I was dismayed that my beloved Bragg's vinegar seemed to have changed. It was pale and I didn't see much "mother". After doing research on the net I called Bragg's. Here are the facts:Has Bragg's lowered their standards? Happily the answer is no. I spoke with their representative about the paleness of their current vinegar and more. No, they have not changed the dilution, it is still diluted to 5% acidity like always. The vinegar is lighter due to using apples with lighter skins. No, they haven't changed the aging. They wouldn't disclose how long they age it but the period of time is unchanged. The "mother" is invisible at first but the longer it ages the more you can see it. Also the stands become longer and the vinegar will darken. The vinegar used to sit on the shelf longer. Since the standards for "organic" have been lowered, does the company buy apples where the growers use antibiotics? No! Has the Bragg's company been sold? No, Patricia Bragg is still the sole owner. The only change that I found was that the vinegar is no longer aged in wood casks. It is a health regulation that stainless steel tanks be used. All the other companies are required to use them as well.2.TEETH EROSION: The reason I didn't consistently take ACV the last 30 years is I was concerned about my teeth. Now I don't have that worry anymore. Vinegar contains malic acid. It is wonderful for health as I will cover in part 3 but not wonderful for your teeth, especially if used on a daily basis. There are several things you can do to help with this. Bragg's suggests 2 tsp to 8 ounces of water. You could of course add more water. Some drink it using a straw. But the best way to neutralize an acid is with a base, such as baking soda. I drink it quickly and then rinse with a baking soda/water solution and then water. You will have to experiment with how much baking soda to use, there are different opinions on the net.3. HEALTH BENEFITS: After over 30 years of research and experimentation I can say that raw vinegar is the easiest, least expensive, and most systemic health remedy and preventative that I have found. I am not alone. Most health books and websites expound the benefits. The malic acid breaks down clogs. Clogged arteries, lymphatic tissues, organ tissue, and stones in the kidneys, liver, gallbladder, and bladder to name a few. It handles acid reflux, skin problems, helps diabetes and much more. It increases energy and fights infections, flus and fungus. Amazingly it handles diarrhea (if it is caused by germs). It breaks down toxins so be sure to drink plenty of good fluids all day.  All plants and animals need a certain ph balance. ACV has an alkaline reaction in the body which is perfect since almost everyone is too acid. It will help every part and system of your body. Do your own research and you will find many other conditions ACV helps.4. HOT BATHS:  Although many people use it on their skin for acne or to put into a poultice, most never try putting raw ACV in hot baths. It is a wonderful and  inexpensive way to get it into your body. I tried starting at a cup but it was too much and I had a strong detox reaction. Start lower and work up to a cup. I use it along with clay and sea salt. The water shouldn't be over 105 degrees. I also put in 1/4 tsp vitamin C which neutralizes the chlorine and chloramines. Be sure to put the clay and water mixture through the blender first or you can clog the drain. Your skin will become soft and have less cellulite. This is because the clay and salt draw out toxins. Hot baths are an aged old remedy and really do heal.If you found this review helpful please click "yes" to increase it's ranking so as many people as possible get this helpful information. :)

This is a quality, large hot water bottle. I think it will last for many years. It is made of rubber and smells like it. Due to the larger capacity it stays hot longer which is very desirable. I ordered another right away.

This electric window regulator was an extremely poor knock-off piece of junk. The metal was thin stamped metal that you can bend with your hands. The original Toyota part has thick metal parts that do not bend. This part has a fraction of the quality when compared to the Toyota part. I wasted several hours with this thing.

I gave 3 stars because the machine does function. It takes off mold and cleans which is why I purchased it. However for the chemically sensitive person it has one aspect that I didn't count on. Along with the water vapor comes strong plastic vapor, perhaps PVC vapor, from the plastic tubing. It really bothered my lungs.The whole idea was for me to be able to clean in a non-toxic way. Perhaps the smell would go away with time. I didn't wait to find out. I returned it to Amazon. I love their wonderful return policy and they issued a prompt refund.If you are a chemically sensitive person and find a steamer that doesn't do this, please add the name to the comment section of this review. I would love to own a steamer.

Like so many products these days the quality of these bands has greatly diminished. I remember when they were thicker and of better quality. I have to replace these often due to rust and that didn't used to be the case. Of course, I guess that is what they want.

My wife and I both love this neck warmer, in fact she is going to order 2 more today.You can wear this on your neck only or pull it up a bit and it also covers your mouth. Unlike a scarf it says put. It doesn't fall off or move down. We are glad we order it. The only down side is that you have to be careful not to put this in the dryer with your regular cloths. It can't take any heat.

This is an excellent starting book for a child or an adult. I wanted to make balloons for my students. The book has excellent step by step instructions with wonderful illustrations. I have not had any problem making any of the sculptures including the bike. There are not any animals but kids do love these and it is a good foundation to move onto other books or YouTube videos.Some reviews said there pump broke. I guess I got lucky. I bought this kit a year ago and have blown up hundreds of balloons with it. In fact, I like it so much, that I contacted Klutz and tried to buy another. The small volume of air in the narrow cylinder makes the pumping easy for kids. They have trouble with regular pumps.The only trouble I had was with the balloons. They don't put powder inside the balloon like most manufacturers. Powder helps the balloon but not the kid who breaths it in. Mine were bad so I contacted the Klutz company about this and received excellent customer service. They cheerfully sent me replacement balloons in a timely manner at no cost to me. Even fresh one pop more than Qualatex balloons. They are also less flexible and have a much shorter life. I use Klutz's only on the shapes with little or no twists like flower centers and the snake's tongue.I learned about Qualatex balloons through YouTube balloon twisting videos. Yes, I have caught the bug and now have a balloon habit! Beware- balloon twisting can be addictive. :)I recommend this kit but also recommend that you buy a bag of Qualatex 260 balloons to go with it.

This toy is OK but not quite as cute as it looks in the picture. Mine came tightly wrapped in plastic. It was wrapped so tightly, and I'm guessing for such a long period of time, that the fur was permanently bent in odd positions. The fur was pushed over the eyes detracting from the cuteness. I returned it.

I highly recommend this small pump. It is 9 inches long and an inch in diameter. It's design is well thought out, unlike other pumps I have tried.I like to make balloon sculptures for my students. Of course, they want to try to make them. Regular pumps are often too hard for them. This one is perfect. Additionally, if you are into balloon twisting, there is a thin balloon called a 160Q. It is hard to blow up by mouth or fit onto most pumps but this one is perfect for the job.It is a double action pump, meaning it pumps in air both ways as you pump up and down so the balloon fills with air faster. That's a good thing because with this small of a pump you have to pump many more times than with a regular pump.*The shipping weight is an error. It says pounds, but it should say ounces. The pump weighs less than 2 ounces.

I waited for almost a year to review the butter keeper to ensure that it held up well. It is a good product and I recommend it. It is not fancy nor large but for the price it is a good deal.One reviewer mentioned that her/his had developed many tiny cracks that were a problem. I don't see any evidence of this but I don't put it in the dishwasher.Some reviewers stated that the butter falls out. I haven't had any problem with that. I just make sure the butter is soft. I put it in a bit at a time and squish the air bubbles out with a spoon. I knew to get the air bubbles out from baking as a child. We used to spoon Crisco into a measuring cup and squish out the air bubbles to ensure we had the correct amount.I did verify with the manufacturer that the glaze is lead-free.

This DVD kit is a good deal, however if Will would have added a little more personality and smiled like he enjoyed making balloons and teaching, I would have given it 5 stars.The pump is just OK but the balloons are high quality and you get 48. The DVD is over 2 hours and he teaches you many animals and other shapes. Once you learn the basic dog, the rest come easily. I have learned to make several animals and will continue to learn more. My students are eagerly anticipating pirate swords which I will learn next. The giraffes are popular and the girls love hearts the best.I must say that I am having so much FUN that I will continue on after I finish this DVD and buy other DVD's and books. I have just ordered the Klutz book of Balloon Twisting which teachers non-animal shapes like flowers and bikes. I also plan on ordering the second DVD in this series featuring S. Frank Stringham.

I chose these because of their non-toxic glaze. Unfortunately quality is not a big concern of the manufacturer. The way these are packed they are likely to be broken. Since one was not broken I examined it. The quality looked ok, not great. Then I tried on the lid, then the other. Neither lid fit because the pot was a little oval shaped while the lids were round. I returned them.I ended up getting 4 pots, without lids, from a restaurant supply company online. They are sturdy, stack and have a larger capacity. This is also a more economical  way to go if you want a larger quantity.  Also they are white so there is no worry about lead or cadmium in the glaze.

As stated on their label, this garlic can widely vary in source. You just don't know the source. Since most garlic in the USA is now imported from China it is likely that this garlic is often from China.Skip eating questionable food from China and demand USA grown food. You can get garlic grown in the USA at your farmer's market. You can also get it from farmers online and distributors such as: spicesinc.com. Or you can search under "garlic not grown in China" like I did. It does exist.Please join me in encouraging Amazon to get an organic source of garlic that is from the USA; they currently have none. Let's help our own economy and not buy food from communist China.UPDATE 1/14/12: spicesinc.com carries USA garlic whenever possible, but they can't always find it. When I wrote the review, they had it in stock. I spoke with Greg, the CEO, today and he is searching for more USA sources. Just call to verify when you place your order.Another way to search the internet is to list a state such as: "California organic garlic powder".

Unlike other workbooks that only have problems but no lessons or examples, this has some of both. The lessons are in the first section and the practice problems comprise the second section. This is a good supplement to the text but can't stand alone. You will likely need the text to understand the both lesson and practice sections.

I searched the internet for the least toxic and lowest odor ball possible. I was excited to find this ball. However, the excitment was over when the ball arrived; it is neither no-odor nor non-toxic as the company promotes. Its odor does not make me feel as ill as ones made with phthalates, but I still felt a little ill. It has been offgassing for a week now. It is much better but still has a ways to go.Some reviewers mentioned a problem with the color. I had the same problem. I was sent a dark gray ball even though the picture shows a blue ball. When I complained Amazon quickly tried to remedy the situation and sent me another ball. Unfortuanately, it was the same color. I checked on the Natural Fitness site and the grey ball is the color of their 75 cm pro ball. Amazon has the name right, but thier picture is incorrect. So if you don't want a gray ball, don't get this ball. I did notify Amazon and hopefully they will change their picture.You may want to order a size larger than you need. I ordered this ball and have it inflated to 64 cm. At 75 cm it is very hard. I am 5' 5" and 64 cm is just right to use the ball as a chair (but I need a smaller one for exercise). My chiropractor says my legs should not be parallel to the floor while sitting. My butt should be higher than my knees. I am temporarily using another ball that has already offgassed for a chair and it really helps my back.A reviewer mentioned there were no instructions. Instructions are included- they are just in an unexpected place. They are on the back of the fitness chart.

My wife bought these and she is going to return them. She wears a size 9 and these were a little big. Perhaps that is so you can wear thick, fluffy socks with them. If they would have padded the sides and sole with fluffy, comfy wool she would have kept them. All the other wool slippers she has tried or bought always had this feature.Pros: High quality materials.  Light flexible sole.  Your heel doesn't come up from the slipper while walking.  Don't smell like solvents like other slippers she tried.  They appear to be very durable.Cons: There is an uncomfortable seam down the center.  There is no soft, fluffy wool on the inside anywhere.  The inside is scratchy.  There is very little insole padding. Just a thin layer of the same scratchy wool over the rubber sole.

My wife uses these in her tutoring business- both the large and small size. They make geometry more real to the students and more fun. They play games building the different shapes. They are also useful for high school students to work out theorems and proofs.She has bought many manipulatives during her 10 years of being a full-time tutor and lots of them just sit on the shelf. These are used very often and with excellent results.

My wife did not find these slippers comfortable and had the following comments: The sole was very thick, and the suede was stiff. They seemed more like street shoes in some ways than slippers. I prefer a cozy, comfy, light slipper; the kind that you melt into. Perhaps if I had taken the time to break them in I would have liked them better. Unfortunately, they smelled strongly of solvent, so I was unwilling to try.All of the materials seemed of good quality. The wool was quite thick and soft. They looked very durable.I didn't have any trouble returning these to Street Moda. You just have to follow the instructions to avoid a 40% restocking fee. However, the price of shipping is quite expensive now. It cost me almost a third of the price of the slipper to ship them back.

I have been using these cards for several years in my tutoring practice. So far they do not yellow (not that I can notice) or tear. They are not plastic coated. I have 12 "shoe boxes" full of them covering math through 8th grade. I put a problem on the front and the answer on the back. We use these to pracite math while playing games. They are on the thin side and you can't shuffle them like a deck of cards but I am very glad they exist and that Amazon carries them.

I ordered this game for my tutoring practice. My younger students like it and think it is funny. :)I only wish that the manufacturer would have given quality a higher priority. The monster pieces are thin cardboard coated with plastic. An arm got bent the very first game and that is only the first of many tweeks that will occur. They should have been made out of plastic.Each monster piece and game card is coated with plastic. However it is not a good plastic, like on regular playing cards. It has a film that comes off on your fingers that is irritating to my skin . I had to wash off each piece and card with soap and water- very time consuming.The stand that the monster attaches to is durable quality plastic with a wide base.

My wife had this to say: I think these would fit a person who has not hit middle age and is pear shaped. They are definitely low cut. Mine felt like an irregular; one leg was tighter than the other. The material is sturdy but not particularly soft. I took one size smaller than normal. I am returning these but if I was still in my twenties and tall, I would have kept them.

I am very glad I ordered these gloves. I originally bought them for shucking oysters. They work well for this. I use a dull knife with an upturned end. If I was using a sharp knife these would not offer enough protection.I have found a surprising second use for the gloves. They work wonderfully to open stubborn jars.

I thought that I wasn't strong enough to open oysters because I couldn't open them with a Progressive brand oyster knife. I found I can open them with this knife. It is a much better design. However, I have only had this knife a week and it has lots of pitted areas. The quality of the steel leaves something to be desired. I would have given it 5 stars if it had better quality steel.

$20-25 each for Weird Stuff Volume 1 and 2 if you buy directly from Freeman Fly's website! $1000 a book???? Really???Anyway, this book is amazing. Anyone interested in the occult and what's really going on should read these books. There is info here you can't find anywhere else.Freeman is a great source of info. He may not have it all right but he has a lot right, I think. Nobody has it all right. But this is a great source of information.

Battery life on this is TERRIBLE. Bought this for travel use but I'm returning it because I would have to charge it after every use. Before the end of one shave, the battery light is already blinking even though it is fully charged at the start.Also, it didn't give a close shave. It feel felt stubbly after a thorough shave. I wasn't expecting a razor close shave but definitely was expecting better.It has a nice build and decent quality overall but the poor battery life kills it for me. I have bought razors have the price of this one that are better quality, closer shave, and I only have to charge once a week!Returning this and would not recommend. Look elsewhere.

Doesn't fit a rope 3.5mm chain from Amazon Curated Collection. Based on reviews, it said it would fit but it didn't. Product description should include the bezel size.This is nice and solid. I love that it's made in America. Would make a great gift. I would buy it as a gift in the future. About as thick as a quarter, maybe a little less.I will probably wear this daily. Could be worn by a man or a woman. I would recommend it, for sure. I am a woman and I enjoy wearing this larger cross over this tiny, dainty ones usually made for women!

I can't explain to you how terrible this is, even with the new updates (8.1). All the bad press you have heard about this is true. Truer than true.This is AWFUL. I have had nothing but problems on multiple laptops: HP, Samsung, Sony. It freezes up regularly, and every single time there is an update, I cringe because I know something bad is going to happen. Updates incapacitate my laptops for hours on end in an endless cycle of freezing, buffering, restarting, resetting. Literally.When it came time to get a "new" computer, I went for an older one that had Windows 7 on it so I wouldn't have to deal with Windows 8. I also held off on buying one of the new Windows tablets because I didn't want to deal with Windows 8 again on a new device.The new Windows that comes out next, I will definitely avoid it for a year or 2 to make sure it not another deathtrap like Windows 8. The ONLY reason I haven't tried an Apple laptop is because they're so expensive.Windows 8 is a total crappery deathtrap from the bad place sent to earth to torture us. STAY AWAY!!!!

When I was a kid, this was the BEST product for cleaning your toilet. It's all my mom would use. It was very thick and would stick to the sides of the bowl. You could apply it at night, let it sit then finish the job in the morning.I bought this product off of Amazon recently and without a doubt it has been reformulated and cheapened. It is very thin and watery and doesn't stick like it used to. They have ruined this product.It used to be worth the extra price over a generic brand because of how well it worked. Now that it's been reformulated, you might as well just buy the generic stuff because that's all this is.What a SHAME. I know all companies are cheapening products now but this was just such a dramatic difference in quality that I had to write a review about it.

Every member of my family LOVES this and we use it multiple times daily.My mom's oven went out. She didn't have a warranty and can't afford a replacement right now. I bought this refurbished for $100 off of Woot and gave it to them. Well, I kept telling them to use this and it took them a week to warm up to the idea but after that, everyone uses it.We cook pizzas, garlic bread, broiled chicken quarters, etc.  I put raw chicken into this in water and olive oil on 350 and in 75 minutes, comes out perfectly.My mom is on a low sodium, diabetic diet and she is in Stage 4 kidney failure. This is PERFECT for making her personal meals, especially the broiled chicken which I can then make chicken salad with.I just LOVE this. We have used it heavily for a month and it shows no signs of breaking down--a generic toaster oven definitely would be breaking down by now. Anything an oven can do, this can do better (keeping in mind the size restrictions, of course). Everyone has said how this cooks faster than the regular oven did.HIGHLY recommend. Perfect. Has been a lifesaver since my family's full size oven broke down.

Perfect for small dogs and toy breeds. One set easily keeps a min pin in one pen and a Chihuahua in the other. Also had 2 toy Chihuahuas in one of these. I foster a lot of small dogs and these are perfect. Perfect 10/10 score for my purpose. They have plenty of room to run around in when I'm not home and can't have them out in the house. Small dogs and toy dogs can be easily injured in a house if you don't keep an eye on them. One pen holds a pee pad, food and water bowls and a dog bed with room to spare. They are easy to spray off with a hose or power sprayer. I heartily recommend.

I wouldn't buy this again. Doesn't live up to my expectations after reading the reviews. I like the small size but it isn't powerful enough. Not that I'm shaving through a jungle of bush or anything! It's just cheaply made. Gets the job done but it's just kind of clunky to use.I like the small size. Easy to store and would be easy to travel with. It's just average. When I'm trimming down there, I want to be using the best and this isn't it. I bought other trimmers after this trying to find a better one. This will just sit in my bathroom and collect dust. I will only use this if I am travelling to slip into my luggage.Not powerful enough at all. You will not get a quick, easy once-over trim with this.By the way, the third party prices for this of $80, at the moment, are JACKED UP! I paid $20 or 25 for this when I bought it from Amazon. DO NOT pay these outrageous third party prices! Seriously! You could find a high quality one for that price, even half that price! Keep looking! This is a $20 trimmer and no more than that.

My engine sounded smoother after I put a bottle of this in a tank of gas. I have a 2000 Lexus RX300 named Betty White. For a 15 year old car, this made a difference. I will buy this in the future probably at least every 3,000 miles with each oil change. Yes, I recommend it especially for older cars.

WOW so glad I bought this game on a whim when it was on sale on Xbox Live during Black Friday! The first time I played it, I played a couple hours. The second time, I played for 6 hours and I am NOT one to sit and play games for that long.I usually jump from game-to-game because I get bored easily but the story line and random story lines, quests, missions along the way are compelling. There is plenty to keep you busy. You have multiple quests at a time to work on and even during quests, you will get other quests to do. It can get messy keeping track of the quests but if you use your map and quest log, it gets easier as you go along.The characters are very in depth, you really get to know them and their various stories. You have a nice mix of heroes and good guys but you will also befriend rogues and villains which keeps things interesting. It's like a choose your own adventure book because every decision you make has cause and effect so you are controlling your destiny in the games. It's not just go from point A to point B, go here, go there. It's a really complex game.I love this game. The reason I looked on Amazon reviews was because I got on here to see if it had a sequel or related games. I see this is the first game from this studio. I would totally buy the sequel or the next offering from this studio. It kind of reminds me of old school Zelda on NES.Anyway, yes I recommend this if you're looking for a game with something more to it, some more depth than most video games. Very rich, complex, compelling game. I still can't believe I played for 6 hours straight...but I did!

This is very small. Maybe the size of a few grains of rice side-by-side. I wasn't impressed by it and I wouldn't buy it again.On the positive, the metal is decent quality and I also like the rainbow/gay pride style of it.

I have a large silver floating locket (size of a quarter) and a small one (size of a nickel), both Origami Owl brand, and this charm would fit in either one of them. It is about the same size and quality as a standard Origami Owl charm.Origami Owl does offer an owl charm but I thought this one had better detailing and character. I also received it much quicker than I would have received it had I ordered from Origami Owl website.I would highly recommend this.

I have a large silver floating locket (size of a quarter) and a small one (size of a nickel), both Origami Owl brand, and this charm would fit in either one of them. It is about the same size and quality as a standard Origami Owl charm.This is my favorite charm. I received it much quicker than I would have received an order from Origami Owl. Also, I love this gay pride rainbow design. I appreciate the third party generic brand charms because they offer a greater variety of charms to choose from. Origami Owl does not currently offer any rainbow charms.I love this and would highly recommend it.

I like this little metal charm. I do not regret the purchase but this particular one is about the size of 2 grains of rice side-by-side. As compared to an Origami Owl standard charm, it's about 1/3 of the size but it fits inside of my large silver Origami Owl locket just fine.This would be ideal for the small locket that is about the size of a nickel.So, although it is minuscule in size, I would still purchase more of these because it's so much quicker than buying from the Origami Owl website and these third-party charms also offer a greater variety to choose from.

I have had this for 2 months so that I could write an accurate review after having actually used it. I can say that this is better than the cheap plastic ones banks will give you but other than that, there isn't much good to say about it.This will not stay shut even after putting some wear on it. It's very generic material and poor quality. The clear plastic piece on the inside ripped. I wouldn't purchase this again, would not recommend it, and I was totally disappointed. It looks much better in the stock photos than it actually is in person.There are much better options available out there for a fraction of the price.

Bought my mother 3 packs of these. She has been unable to find this size and she is disabled so she's really not able to drive around checking at all the local stores. When she told me she needed undies, I came to Amazon and my mom loved these.She said they fit great and were very comfortable. Also, all 3 packs I ordered came in colorful styles and didn't get any plain white ones which I thought was great. None of them had any defects--they were the same as you'd buy in a store.I was thrilled that I was able to buy these for her. I guess she hasn't had new ones in a long time so she was so happy. I will definitely buy her more of these from Amazon. A+

This liner is very thin. For the price, I expected it to be thicker and better quality so I was very disappointed. I think the price is too high for what it is.This will serve its purpose and its a decent fit for my 2000 Lexus RX300. Its not a perfect fit but for an older car like mine, I'm lucky to get a cargo liner made for it at all.I was going to buy an entire set of Husky Liners mats for my car but after this purchase, I am not going to spend my money on Husky Liners when I can get better quality from brick and mortar stores for half the price.I was disappointed by this purchase and by the brand. I would not recommend this brand but if someone really needed a liner and couldn't find one anywhere else, I'd tell them about this one.

I think this is the best case that I have found for this phone. It's the only one I have found that has decent protection for the screen. The holster totally covers the screen when both pieces are on.I think this is an excellent value. I read over reviews that say it's cheap plastic but, for me, it was much better quality than I expected and I am very happy with it. The case is thin so it doesn't add much more bulk to this already bulky phone.I have an Otterbox for my Kindle Fire and I wish there was an Otterbox case available for the Intuition because they typically offer the best protection for the phones and tablets that I have had.I dropped it today from my pants pocket which was over a 3 foot drop onto hardwood floor and the case wasn't scratched and the phone wasn't damaged. This was with the phone case only-- the holster part was not attached. Adding the holster would offer much more protection but I only use the holster when I'm out and about.So I highly recommend this case especially with the case selection being so limited. The price is excellent and I would easily buy this again.

First off, this says 8.5 inches but that's total inches including the handle part. In actuality, the usable length is only about 5 inches and the girth is about like a quarter. It's very small and I was disappointed in the size when I opened it based on curb appeal alone. However, once we tried it out, this became, hands down, my favorite ever!The material is very soft and comfortable--love it. The handle provides a great grip for whatever your purpose is, alone or with a friend. Strong vibrator. Nice battery life. This is almost perfect. I would totally buy this again and probably will buy another at some point in the future.The main selling point for me is the soft, flexible material. Just buy this.

This isn't something I could ever imagine us using regularly but it's nice to have this big boy in the collection. It's stimulating to look at and the size of it turns me on. I can't imagine many women/men could truly take this comfortably even with lubrication but it's still fun to play with.I am not deducting stars for the size. Anyone who purchases this and then complains about the size is being unfair especially after seeing the multiple reviews about how extremely large it is. The dimensions are there in black and white.I'm giving it just an OK rating because the material is unyielding and hard (no pun intended). It's just not workable. I think if it was made of a softer, higher quality material, then it would be much easier to work with and people would get a much more satisfying experience from it.As it stands (no pun intended), this is more for visual appeal than anything else. Not truly functional. But I don't regret the purchase. I can't say I'd recommend it to anyone else, but I'm still glad I have it.

In no way would I consider these premium screen protectors like it says in the description.These are the thinnest ones I have ever used. They also scratch easier than any I've ever used. I have bought 2 sets of these in 2 months so basically I'm using a couple a month. I'm very easy on my phone but just having it in my pocket with wallet and keys causing noticeable scratches all over the screen protector.However, these are a great value overall. 5 is enough that if you mess up putting one on straight, you have a backup to try again. As I've already said, I've made 2 purchases of these so I will keep buying them regularly. I receive them within a week after ordering them so I can't complain and I do recommend them. What more could be expected at this price?

These work great on my Chihuahuas (3-6lb dogs). For some reason, these are less intimidating to them than fingernail clippers which is what I normally use.Fingernail clippers work fine since their paws are so small but they are difficult to keep a good grip on while you are maneuvering them and making sure you don't clip too far down which causes bleeding. The guard on these works great and they have a nice grip. All in all, using these makes the job much quicker and easier.These are well made and I suspect that they will last for years to come. I recommend them especially for small dogs. You can get cheaper ones, sure, but they won't last as long and the generics I've bought in the past are made for larger dogs. These are just right for my Chihuahuas.

In the past, I had the Droid 2 Global and Droid 2 and I loved both of them. This phone is the younger brother of those 2 phones. Amazing keyboard, big screen, apps play wonderfully on it. Besides being very heavy, this would be a 4 or 5 star phone. However...The battery life on the Droid 4 is so terrible that I have to carry around an external battery to keep this phone charged throughout the day. Even right out of the box, the battery functioned like a phone that I had been using a year. I have only had this phone 2 months or less.I have owned the Droid X, Droid X2, Droid 2 and Droid 2 Global...so I am familiar with how terrible smartphone batteries are. The battery on this phone is the worst by far. Are you kidding me, Motorola???I was doubtful purchasing any phone with a battery that cannot be replaced. All my other smartphones, I have purchased as extended battery which increased size and weight but was worth it for better battery life. With my other phones, I didn't have to buy an extended battery until 6 months or a year of heavy use.I'm telling you, within the first week I had to look for something to keep this phone charged which is when I bought a portable battery bank that adds so much bulk that I feel like I'm using one of the Zak Morris cellphones from Saved by the Bell. Not only am I using the portable battery pack but also a task killer to kill apps not currently in use.No, I do not recommend this phone. Trust me, 1 star is totally warranted and if you don't heed my advice and stay away from this phone, you will regret it. I am hearing great things about the Droid Razr Maxxx and their amazing battery life. I would urge you to try that phone.

I normally prefer crunchy peanut butter but this stuff is tops. My favorite PB ever.My mom bought this and since I always swing by and eat all of her food, I was able to try this out. I ate the whole jar in 2 or 3 days and then ordered my own off Amazon (and replaced mom's jar).I have a major sweet tooth and this is perfect. You can definitely taste the honey but it's not so strong that it drowns out the taste of the PB. I have also noticed that this goes on smoother than regular smooth style peanut butter because of the honey mixed in.I have eaten it on bagels as well as bread and it's so good I can eat it with a spoon. I have also found a couple tiny pieces of honeycomb in this which enhanced the flavor (I knew that's what it was because I've eaten fresh honey before and eaten the honeycomb).The jars I received from Amazon were very fresh with an expiration date of 6/14 so I will definitely order this from Amazon again. Highly recommend.

I had never heard of this lady before. I was casually browsing the best selling MP3 albums on Amazon and just happened to listen to some samples of Kacey's songs. I was so curious and impressed that I downloaded the album immediately. I'm so glad that I did. I must say that I'm very impressed and can't wait to hear more from her in years to come. I think she will be winning a lot of awards next year. Along with country music awards, I think this is for sure Grammy calibre.Her songs have excellent, clever lyrics that are unique to her. I'm one of those people who pays attention to the lyrics more than the actual music itself and the lyrics on this album would be impressive for a veteran to write, let alone a rookie who just released her first album.I'm a very liberal person and when it comes to country music, I really feel alienated and unwelcome to the genre in general. I enjoy the country style of music but at the same time, I don't feel wanted as a fan. The genre has come a long way for sure but still I feel there is a lot of sexism, racism, and just a general conservativeness that doesn't leave much room for crowds with more liberal, open minded values.She broaches subjects that are generally off limits in country music and I love that. It really opens up the doors for a broader audience of music fans. It's great that she's a strong woman who doesn't mind leading and being in control. Her music has grittiness to it. This album has a couple love-type songs on it but I don't feel like they're "Oh, my boyfriend broke up with me, my world is shattered, and how will I ever get through life without my man????"I respect that she is able to do this while still being an obviously country artist. Take Taylor Swift, for example. I like her music but when you hear her on the radio, one would assume it is general pop music instead of straight edge country music. Swift gets played on the local pop radio station many, many times more than I ever hear her on the local country stations based on my listening experience. Musgraves has music that people who aren't traditional country music fans can enjoy while still able to maintain a traditionally country sound.While listening to this album, Musgraves reminded me of Loretta Lynn and Tammy Wynette, both of whom I grew up listening to and while I enjoyed them, I also felt alienated by their music. For example, liking a style of car but in a color you would never buy.When I saw this album had less than 50 reviews, it made me want to add my 2 cents. I've written many reviews on Amazon but this is the first album review I have ever written. I just wanted to give this new artist some props. I think almost anyone could enjoy this, especially someone who is looking for some country music that you can not only enjoy the sound of but also relate to and feel embraced by. Everyone is welcome.

My mother is disabled so I do all of her shopping and carry all of her credit cards, IDs, etc. My old trifold wallet held all of my stuff but couldn't hold mine and hers together. I decided to upgrade so I could carry everything together.Other reviews state that this is too large for daily use. I disagree. It's about 1.5 times bigger and thicker than my old wallet but holds 2 or 3 times the amount of stuff. I love the black color and the fact that it velcros shut. It has a zippered change pocket on the outside where I store a couple spare keys in.The inside has at least 6 slots for credit cards. I put my mom's stuff on one side and mine on the other side to keep it separate. All of the cards fit with room to spare. There is enough space that the cards slide easily in and out. In my old wallet, my cards fit so tightly that they were difficult to get out.This is very well made. One of my requirements was that it had to have a chain because it keeps me from losing my wallet. The only complaint I have about this wallet is that the clasp is cheap and isn't as secure as my old chain. It is so narrow that I can barely snap it onto my wasteband but it still works. I can replace the chain and it doesn't bother me enough to deduct a star for it.I love this and would totally recommend it if you need more room than a standard wallet. I may buy a different color, too, and am going to purchase more from the Pacsafe brand to hold my checkbook, passport, etc. I think this would be great to travel with but I would definitely get a more secure chain if I was going on a long trip or overseas (if the airport security would even allow the chain...). I've never heard of this brand before but I'm glad I took a chance in buying this.

This is ultra thin--as in you could snap it in half effortlessly. And, yes, it does snap on perfectly. However, the claims that it's durable and impact resistant are ridiculous. If you dropped your Kindle Fire using only this case, it would not protect it whatsoever--it'd be like having no case on it at all.I wouldn't consider this a case. It's more like a skin. This offers minimum scratch protection. I keep my Fire on my bedstand and it never leaves my room. If I had kids or planned on traveling with it than in no way would I use this case. This will protect it from scratching when moving around on the bedstand or piece of furniture but that's it.I do not recommend this unless you do not plan on travelling or even moving around your house with it. No way would I recommend this if the Fire is being used by children.I feel the claims that it's durable and impact resistant are misleading.

I bought this for my mother who is almost blind from diabetes and glaucoma. She likes to help her grandson with his homework which was nearly impossible before she got this light, especially in the evening in lowlight environments. She is so impressed with it.I think this is a perfect gift for anyone on your list who has vision troubles. Once they actually start using it and realize how much it helps them, they will love it. The first one I bought her she keeps by her bedside. I recently bought her another for in the living room and she actually came to me asking me to get her another one so I did. That said a lot to me because she never asks for anything.I give it 5 stars for how much it helps my mother. However, I have a couple issues with the build quality. The light and magnifier part is built well but the base needs to be heavier. It has a cheap feel to it and, depending on how low you adjust the arm, it can tip over which has happened a couple times.My biggest complaint is that the pole is not attached to the base so if you try to pick it up and move it, the base falls from the pole. I think the pole needs to screw into the base. For this reason, it's not easily portable so you may end up having to purchase multiples. If you were to drop it onto a hard surface it could easily damage it.Overall, I highly, highly recommend this. It has genuinely enriched my mother's life and she is able to read, write and do things that she hasn't been able to do for years. It's amazing how this one simple item can help her so much.

High quality and well built--pretty much the exact same headset you see NFL coaches use on the sidelines. I have had excellent luck with the Motorola brand in all their hardware, including cellphones and bluetooth headsets, and I wasn't disappointed by these. I don't understand why the reviews are so bad. I love mine and would purchase them again.

In the past, I've used a needle for ingrown hairs or regular tweezers. I thought these tweezers would work better but they don't. These are actually less effective and cause more damage. Because of their thickness, it rips the skin around the hair which can cause scarring more so than a needle and regular tweezers. It's basically like using a thin nail to dig the hair out or at least that's what it felt like using them. These were a complete waste of time and money for me and added nothing to the process of digging out an ingrown hair.

To say that Vivian Wood , is an amazing find loved all the books in the series. Avery and Chase have to face their inner demons, can they work together for their common goal..To love each other and rid themselves of the evil doers? The storylines is superb, can't wait to read more from Ms.Wood!

Pax Gentry had a love like no other or so he thought. Brooke Harbin was his one true mate. The dear John like Skype was more regret filled.  He had his secrets and now he needed to uncover hers. Brooke Harbin, loved..loves one man, so why the gloom and doom?  Forces are against her. Can she right the wrongs? And when more lies are unearthed and the truth comes out its even more shocking and more enthralling. What's more is an even worse has befallen Brooke, can she be saved and when her brother has to call the one per he vowed never to talk to, it's serious!

Sexy short, the problems with long military deployments are that along the way,relationships are broken. In most case relationships are forged. Coming home to a loving wife only to have your husband present you with a man, who kept your husband safe..is explored in this sexy short. Would definitely want to read more from Lexy Harper.

This is the first book i have read by Nina Croft. Not only was the story well written but the characters  development  was first rate. Seductive and decadent.  Definitely be looking  for more from Ms.Croft.

His by law - Sue Lyndon. Lucia, alone and on the streets. Breaking into the wrong house wasn't  in her plans.Jackson McNabe, wealthy recluse has a proclivity for darker desires. Will a ghist from the past ruin what has become so dear to them both...each other.The Christmas Fig- Ava Sinclair. Edward Hargrove and Millicent, his wife tests her husband  at every turn. He has a successful career as a barrister(lawyer). But can one bad deed before Christmas spoil the holiday? Can Edward  correct his wife and when he uses a technique  that is foreign to her can it break her of her bad habits? Will Millicent teach her husband the true meaning of Christmas? This holiday is their blessing.Mistletoe Marriage -Vanessa ValeJulie  Talbot beloved school teacher/fallen woman of ill repute (a fabrication ) Garrett  Rivers,his thoughts are consumed by one woman, he is on a trip. .. he had misgivings about and following  his instinct heads home to his hearts desire Julie. Unbeknownst to him, she is now being forced  into a union with a scoundrel. Can he save her before her virtue has been compromised?Each of these authors  are a beautiful complement to each others story. Their stories  have your pulse racing and your hearts fluttering. The stories are well written with just enough  sugar and spice, i wish  there was a ten star button. A definite holiday favorite. A holiday treat for readers who love romance, interlaced with erotica,and some BDSM. You definitely don't  wanna miss out on this book.

Sexy,reciting and mesmerizing!! Escaping her life that has become a nightmare, Penny Harding is essentially in an even bigger nightmare...a snowstorm. She has found the that maybe she was predestined to just live in chaos.  Harlan Craig has just realized that he found a miracle in a snow bank, he was supposed to live a solitary life until fate gave him a gift. This series is so promising.  Not everyone can write paranormal romance and be original!! The storyline is well developed and is a definite must read!!

Having read the first 2 books in the series, I'm absolutely fascinated and mystified. That Gary finally makes it down to earth with his husbands. Petty jealous puts one man in jeopardy Suva finds himself nearly murder but it's up to his husbands, will Gary and Taran make it in time?  Jennifer Denys is one of my favourite authors. I was on the edge of my seat.
Sexy and tantalizing, is what Mia Caldwell conveyed in her interracial romance a mistake and an unexpected situation. Is a short read but definitely with the time!!

It's not often you find an author who just mesmerizes you with their writing. Mia Caldwell has just dazzled me, this is the first-ever book I have read of hers nothing short of amazing! Romance and an overall sexy story. Delightful

Allison Travers, has done nothing but salivate and dream about two men- shocked and aroused. She has to tamp down the lust. The fact that a horrible man wants to crush her hopes, it's just not an option. Allison has to also fend off the unwanted advances of Mr. Matthews. She will find running isn't the answer either. Quinn and Porter have seen and they are on the same page. They only want to make her theirs forever. The fact that one man has her running scared only makes them work that much harder. To make her their Christmas bride! Vanessa Vale has gold in this holiday treasure. Would definitely recommend Bridgewater ménage to anyone looking for sexy, decadent reading!

Loving someone is loving the with their faults.They say that the heart grows fonder with the passing of time. Can it cure a broken heart(s). Reed Stone,had once a love but the fact  that his heart had been badly broken at a young age only cement the idea- Don't love hard and it won't hurt. Years later all he wants is a redo. Can he right the wrongs or will he be to late. Aurelis Fuentes has had the fairytale.  But years ago words cut her and their love.  No children and no Christmas(no gatherings). The fact wasn't lost on her. She missed and longed for her mate. When he clues  her in to the who,what and why.  Could  she really trust him with her heart again? Can they recapture the love? This was very emotional for me, oh the sex was mind blowing and out of this world. But the feeling in this story is what i call pure Milly magic! This has to be the best holiday read!  Milly Taiden  has yet another 5 star read. The only thing  to do is wish for more Gerri Wilder and more paranormal dating agency!

Lady Amelia Chesterfield, unrestrained, uncontrollable and uninhibited and the scandal that has just occurred has her family reeling! Her unceremoniously bedding below her station has her parents scrabbling. Enter the most eligible handsome scoundrel in the country, and being the richest also helps, but it's the hungry look that has you wanting to bend to his will. Garrett Darmley has his own skeletons in his closet(as in get a chair type and wedge it shut). He wants an unconventional marriage, he wants a little and a ward and a wife...and perhaps down the road..well. Amelia never had love and she never had caring but this man will bring to her life love ,family and every emotion she has never felt.  Cherished and adored, but when an outside source threatens it all, it's up to the most unlikely person to help. Ava Sinclair continues her seduction, her readers are captivated with Victorian erotica unsurpassed bounds and its a delightful read. Each of her books are unique but this one has what I call an escape quality. To literally take you into the story, you live in the book it's draws you in and you fall hard for the characters. Once again a fascinating,fabulous read by a truly gifted author! Bravo Ava Sinclair!

I have had the pleasure of reading the Pacific Northwest Bears series, well written and a complete delight! The love affair between Edward Rochon and Connie White is explored in this book. The love, their instant connection. The children,the business and the real reason for the feud! All action pack, this book is a gem, you won't want to miss! Thanks Moxie for showing us how true love is....

Three very different situations, three sexy witches who succumb to three big bad wolves! Mischief,mayhem and hijinks. Each has a problem... a hulking delicious problem the laughs and sex are off the charts. Each book is hilarious but together make for the best Halloween treat( an any day treat)! Milly Taiden continues to treat her readers to divinity! Treat yourself to tricks and treats!

Absolutely no nutritional value, I have read hundreds of books. But this is beyond belief trash plain and complete trash. Yes this is a 5 star read if your a man but even I understand what it means to be completely off the rails. And thank God it was free because i would send it back!

Four besties, prowling for the men that light their fires, eight deliciously decadence men willing to bring these woman to their knees( literally). One night to have the experiences of a lifetime. Just hot steamy sex or is this the begin of  unimaginablely delicious  taboo relationships. This was an amazing book written by an incredible author, the sex was dirty,sensual and raw carnality!! It surprises and amazes me the author depth in her writing. Never a dull read...fire and passion in every page!

Book 3, find Laura  exploring the club and when she does,watch out. The object  of her obsession,  none other then Kevin  McKnight!  And now she will be driven to endless heights of passion and with every climax, she is taken  further down into a sexual  abyss!!! Pure,raw ... completely unbound!! A sexual torrent of pleasure!! Hail to  the smut queen!

Sneaking into a sex club was the easy part, finding and keeping the man ( imagine finding the existence of a twin) of your wildest dreams. Double your pleasure,double your fun!  Alain and Alex are twins who want to share. Elissa, shakes and shimmies, and that's just the beginning!. Raw sex and lust is what awaits behind the doors of Club Duo, prepare to have the fantasy fulfilled! Milly Taiden does not disappoint in this  follow-up book! More please ...

This is just salacious, this is the beginning of a remarkable author career... This first book in club duo, literally cements the fact Milly Taiden( writing as Kitty Bush) is the smut queen, to many this may not be what your used to but this is what modern young woman look for, their first crush. Laila was looking for her dream man what she gets is a a flight into fantasy! What she never anticipated that Jack has a wingman!

This was the very first book I have read by Joey W. Hill ! Magnificent, isn't even the adequate. When we lose the love of our lives, sometimes God puts our perfect match under our nose.  Athena had lost her beloved husband the fact that cancer ravaged his body, she was his everything... his mistress! Dale Rousseau was a navy seal, control and order, until the night he rescued a beautiful woman. Two people needing something, he sees into her and underneath the domme was a service sub! Can they navigate through the different worlds? Can giving control be the ultimate gift. This book was alluring and seductive, the dynamics of bdsm is told by a practitioner. That just makes the book even more realistic and decadent! A must read for bdsm enthusiasts!! Beyond 5 stars...
I have reservations about infidelity, the idea just doesn't appeal to me.  Unrealistic expectations and an epiphany of love. The world may be okay but it's just not for me.

The sensuality and exhilaration that comes with the idea of a loving husband and wife. The fact that each  of them heightens their present situation,  they are both very busy but the calls are seductive and tempting them to unimaginable height. The decadence of their encounter, the intimate details of what awaits them only ignites the fire that burns within them. The distance increases their wants, until.....Vanessa Dare is the naughty temptress that residents within us all, her description of her heroine is sexy,sensuous and has a particular Je ne sais quoi. I had reservations about another pen name but this was magnificent. I can't wait for more! And what's more it doesn't disappoint, would recommend this to anyone looking for spicy sex and romantical encounters between a loving couple.
The first book was completely taboo, a little freaky but love Sophia.  Daddy has two buddies and me, what trouble could we get into! Book two, the more the merrier!! More please!

I like to think I'm a bear shifter authority, I have read some fantastic bear shifter books( I do mean fascinating,fabulous authors...This one is way off the mark) I regret the time I wasted with this book. Just way to much going on, I really wish I could return this book, because  99cents is too much for something I regret. On the other hand I will keep the  book as a reminder, that I too am capable of making a mistake.  This book will be the example to not spend another penny on the author. When we have choices, this was definitely a mistake I hope not to repeat. Lesson learned!
If it was a complete book I would gave given more stars just, don't care for a cut up book. Just not for me!

Jewel Henley, has been jilted! After an incredible night of passion( a scorching one night stand), she is unceremoniously fired from her job!! Piers Anetakis has been doped and jilted. He has an unimaginable desire to make love to a beautiful woman. Not realizing there will be consequences, five months later and  Jewel has demands... Will Piers deny her and her unborn child? Will ghosts of the past be laid to rest?

One woman's dream is another's woman's heartbreak, or so that is what  Bella thought always wanting Theron.  She was pulling all the stop to have her hearts desire!  Theron Anetakis, was a force in business and he longed for the life ...to have a wife and child, resigning to the fact he won never have love or so he thought. Bella has brought the billionaire to his knees... Will they have what they want?

When you open your heart it's truly amazing to see love in it many stages. Ellis Brooks did not do casual and Alexto Sarantos didn't do love! Can one woman's love change it all? Loved the book and all it represents.

Caroline Turner, tormented CEO of Turner Advertising. Caroline has had a tough time with weight issues and a an absolutely terrible deplorable attitude towards her staff. And she has an enemy, waiting for her to self destruction until she hires a chef.Maxim Volkov, famed chef and whipmaster, discipline and ordered, this man is in control. When he gets a job offer he pounces. This is the job of a lifetime.Caroline needs discipline... and he is the MASTER!When her nemesis makes trouble,what will happen when he tries to wreak havoc in their lives.My Russian Master, this is book 3 in the service & submission.Megan Michaels has evolved into an amazing author. This series is sexual,sensual, the emotion comes off the pages in waves. The storyline is amazing and the characters are endearingOn another note, Anorexia and Bulimia are serious diseases with disastrous consequences, the author has done a first rate in her research on the subject matter. This book is beyond 5 stars. Would definitely recommend this book and series to anyone looking to explore bdsm. One of the best books I have read in some time. Can't wait for more, bravo Megan ... a true must read!

I love the first three episodes by the fourth was done as done could be. I was not happy for an epilogue and the drama I could have done with it. I just wish it had been better, I was so invested so I finished it with great reluctance. Was happy to finish and was satisfied by the HEA, but it could have been spectacular...

To say clean is hardly the word. This historical romance is with out a doubt the best simple romance book I have ever read. If you were looking for tawdry and debauched you won't find it here.  The his is a story about escaping a reality to come face to face with Destiny. The storyline is immaculate . I would recommend this to anyone interested in Christian romance, a must read.

Karel Yahgar, head of security, a total workaholic. And he's headed to see the matchmaker, none other then Gerri  Wilder!Alivia Vela( Liv) sick and tired of the dating game - where are the real man of substance? A chocoholic addict, she knows she has more than enough sand in her hourglass. Liv knows she has ample curves plus she is sexy,nerdy,inked and curvalicious. She has had many sorrows but she is losing hope there is a man out there for her. If the last disaster is any indication.She didn't believe in fairytales or does she? Karel is imploring Gerri to find him a match, but he has found her! It's his mothers last request. For her only son to settle down  be mated and have his own cubs, could  she live to see that day? Now to convince the woman of his dreams he is for realz!  Can Aurora's security cheif have his cake and eat it too? Will Liv just believe in her own happiness? Family, children, friendship and love can be hers if she just believed.Its so difficult to  choose which book i have loved by Milly Taiden each book is unique. Her books transport you to another world. The purrfect blend of romance, drama and comedy  not to mention scorching hot sex. And in a supernatural settling what more can Milly come up with.... Stellar writing and unforgettable  characters this is a must read. For paranormal and supernatural readers this is a delight!
There was just to much going on for me to say, this was  well written. Too short and bam..bam...bam and we are meant to be together. Nope that isn't the way it goes.
Barebone sex, salaciously decadent. Jacqueline has quite the imagination, but for a lascivious mind,the story was an example in debauchery! Would definitely look into more of her books!

Five formidable billionaires are unleashed in  a kitchen. Mischief and mayhem...and its all taken care of! Each of the billionaires have counted their collective blessings and we revisit the Trask man and their families. There is plenty of love and emotion and the beauty of Christmas miracles! This year the men are catering to their wives and children. We look at the true meaning of Christmas. Jenn Roseton thanks for this amazing look back at your epic series. Always a 5 star read!
Naughty has the combination of salacious and  lasciviousness. One of the decadent finds in a long time. If your looking for a thirty minute escapes look no further.
This is the first book I have read by Laurel Joseph, I have to admit this won't be the last book. I can't wait to explore more of her books. The characters development and storyline is outstanding!

Hyacinth Lenox one of  seven delectable sister, she has always wanted Jackson Reed. The years she has tormented herself for a tragic accident, could she finally forgive herself for her part in her best friends death. Young and innocent can she forgive herself long enough to  take hold of her hearts one true desire.Jackson Reed has yet to overcome the nightmares that haunt his dreams. The one bright spot is the one woman who has him burning with desire!Jackson proposes and Hyacinth accepts! But can two broken souls find love, forgiveness and the promise for tomorrow? Will a misunderstanding destroy them or bring them closer together?Vanessa Vale, enraptured her readers with her naughty tales of sexy historical romance. Each new series is both charming and beguiling. Her words just lure you in, you can't help but become addicted...and what an addiction! Highly recommended, was given a copy for an honest review but as you can plainly see ...This is also a verified purchase! 5 stars and then some!

The author shows us the versatility of  her writing it was incredible! Three awesome storyline, the development of each was superior. Contemporary,paranormal and I was amazed with the level of excellence! Will be looking for more books by this author!

Bianca James has a promising new shifter series! Jarrad and his bear knew she was the one from first glance! She was in a world of trouble, can he save the one woman who could complete him in every way!  Elle,is curvy and sexy and she is trying to stay alive, however dangling from a cliff isn't where she wants to be, with law enforcement on the scene she never expected for her rescuer to be Her everything! Take notice this just is an outstanding new series, with serious potential. It is brilliant, stunningly gorgeous,beautifully written and the level of suspense and drama just draws you in, can't wait for book 2!
When questions are asked and a seed is planted,what is a woman to do?  I will take a double expresso!
This is like a lunch break read.  Sexy as hell but had me wanting more. As in ,what is in store for them. The bonus read is a sexy ménage.  Sofia is a pleasure to read and so looking for more!
It's amazing how you find some salacious, provocative and utterly decadent hot reads this Is a definite must try author!! Two sexy stories that will have you craving much more!!!

I can't recommend this book and all. Nothing about it was what I believe to be fabulous. The writing was decent but the content was lacking in too many categories for me. I love interracial romance but this is so far from the mark. I will pass!
