The case does provide a lip around the device so you can lay your phone face flat, but it does take away from the no bezel design Samsung has managed to create. Overall this is aa beautiful case that I highly recommend!

The product itself comes packaged very well however, the quality is pretty mediocre. After installing not once, but two of them, both of the tempered glass wouldn't stick on the edges and left huge air bubbles. I gave it to days and the edges still wouldn't stick. They eventually came off and ibhad to throw them away. I guess the statement you get what you pay for applies to this situation. I'd recommend consumers to spend a little bit more for a higher quality screen protector.

Before I even start this review, I must say these are awesome! For the price, this is an absolute steal and I will elaborate further as to why. First of all, presentation. Unlike other headphones within this price range, this actually comes packaged very nicely in a box which gives them a much higher grade appearance. Even better, they come with a heavy duty carrying case just in case you want to keep them protected, which once again is very rare within this range. The sound is also very good, a bit better than you can expect from this price range. Bass is very solid, but not over empowering. Highs can kind of get messy but not noticeable unless analyzed carefully. I was provided this product by the manufacturer in exchange for a review, with that being said would I ever purchase them? I absolutely would without any hesitation. Not only they look good, but they sound great and best aspect is that they are highly affordable for what you get!

Recently I have gotten into fashion and I slowly started to develop a liking for loafers. When I came across this loafer it captured my attention right off the bat. The shade of blue used on this loafer actually depends on the amount of light it is exposed to. In darker environments it seems as if it is dark blue, whereas in a brighter environment they look very light. It is hard to dress up with these loafers since  the shade of color constantly looks different, so I'd opt for a different color. In terms of comfort, they are incredible. I wear them for long periods such as 8-9 hours and not once does my feet. They do run a little large however, I'd go a half size down. I'm usually a perfect 11 but these are a little big for me. Overall solid shoes and I couldn't recommend them enough!

I wanted a selfie stick for everyday usage. Something that had to be durable, compact and most importantly reliable. I have come across a few affordable selfie sticks which had terrible battery life and standby time, that used to die while not in use. I was a little hesitant to purchase this product since it was very affordable but I decided to go with my hunch and purchase this anyways since I needed something fast. Let's just say I feel idiotic for having so many doubts because this product is awesome. Not only does it feel good on the hand but also it is built very well. I am someone who uses their phone without a case, and I have the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge. The Edge is a very beautiful phone built of aluminum and glass, so it can be very prone to damage (even though the new Gorilla glass 4 is tested to be 50% stronger than previous generation). However, I mention this because I wanted to emphasize as to how I did not feel worried putting my phone on this selfie stick and extending it all the way out since it was built so well. On one full charge it will last you the entire day and even more. The response is very quick and connecting it was a breeze. Overall a wonderful product for the price, if you want a selfie stick at an affordable price you cannot go wrong with this one.

I love fitness and I love music. Finding the right headphones for exercising can be really irritating because of comfort and fit issues. I initially purchased the famous jaybirds x but for their price they were really disappointing. They never fit really well, water resistant wasn't good (broke from rain) and most importantly their battery life were terrible, not even close to the advertised time. After that disappointment I decided to look for another product at a much more affordable price since I didn't want to deal with warranty issues and something that wouldn't break the bank if it were to break. Considering I had positive experiences with Brainwavz products before, I decided to give these a shot and I am glad that I did. The headphones aren't the most secure fit when it comes to exercising but the sound is incredible. For such an affordable product, it has great bass, clarity and most importantly a balanced sound. Even at max volume the bass is solid and the highs does not distort. Battery life is also superb compared to it's competitors. On one full charge, I can get around 4-5 hours of continuous playtime, which is almost double of what I received on the Jaybirds. Now the aspect that impressed me the most about these were the build quality. The wire is not too long and the headphones themselves are cased with a aluminum body which not only looks premium, but feels premium also. I would not feel worried if I were to drop them or put them under rough usage, they feel very solid. Overall a wonderful product that I am glad that I have tried, If you are in the market for an affordable Bluetooth headphone which not only looks good but performs well, these are a great choice!

I purchased a Bose sound system a few years back that never received any use since I don't really purchase CD's anymore. Since it was a large investment, I decided to seek for a portable Bluetooth audio receiver in order to connect my phone to the sound system and listen to some music. I came across this product at an affordable price and I became very curious. I have never had any experience with this manufacturer before so I was kind of hesitant. Receiving the product, my initial impression was kind of negative. It was packaged in a very generic box without much instructions or branding. However at the end of the day, I only care about how well a product performs rather than how it is packaged, and well....it is awesome!Connecting this device is very easy, just hold the button in order to turn it on and connect it to up to two devices via Bluetooth. It has a range of up to 30ft without sacrificing any audio quality. The sounds come out crisp, bass is solid and highs are usually very clean. I was surprised as to how well this device performed for the price. The battery is very well also, on one full charge it lasts up to 5-6 hours of continuous play. Of course you can always keep it plugged in order to listen to music for a longer period of time.If you are on this page looking for an Bluetooth Audio Receiver, this is a great choice!

Looking for an everyday belt, I came across this item at an affordable price. I was very curious for the quality and from the picture it looked very good. When I received the belt, I wasn't so stoked on it's overall look.The belt is actually very thick and big, and the buckle is lightly plated with gold, and it is already starting to wear off a little. The longevity of the plating isn't something you should look forward to, as it will come off from everyday use and expose the metal underneath. Aside from that slight negative aspect, the rest of the belt is very well made. It is thick, very well padded and most of all seems very durable. If you are looking for an every day tough belt that will last a long time without deteriorating, this is a great buy!

For the price, it is quiet attractive and built very well. Upon first glance, I was very impressed with the Syllable D700's. Not only did they look premium but also felt very sturdy. The headphones are built in a way where you can adjust almost every portion of the headphones to give yourself the perfect and most secure fit, which enables them to stay on your ear even through the most rigorous workout sessions. I've used this product for over a month now testing it's durability, battery life and sound quality. Of course for the price, you cannot expect a performance that rivals products which costs 5-6 times more.During my first week, I have come to realize that the battery life was very good. While listening to music in mid range volume, I'd get about 5-6 hours of music playback through one full charge. While listening to high or max volume, the battery level dropped to about 3-4 hours, which isn't bad. It charges rather quickly, within one hour completely. Overall I am very pleased with the battery performance.The comfort of these headphones can be a hit or a miss. I say this because for me personally, I loved the snug fit that enabled them to stay on my ear while I ran or went through rigorous daily weightlifting routines. Not once did they come off or fall in middle of physical activities. However my brother who listens to music more casually did not find the fit to be comforting but rating irritating. If you are someone such as me who prefers a snug fit for a secure fit, you will adore it. However if you do not, you will find it irritating and uncomfortable.The sound quality is good but not great, these lack serious bass. On most tracks you will hear clear highs and mids but the bass is almost on existent. I mostly listen to genres which involves instruments so it wasn't a big deal for me. However if you are an individual who prefers electronic or hip hop music, you will not be happy.Overall for the price these are alright. They look good, provides a comfortable and secure fit, has a great battery life but falls short in the most important aspect of a headphone and that is the sound quality.

I was in search of a portable wireless charger which I could use during class or work, so I could charge my phone without having to worry about any wires. I came across this product and was intrigued by the decent reviews it received. I wasn't in the market for something spectacular, but rather something which could provide me with one full charge in middle of the day since I am a heavy user. My daily driver is the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge which consists of a 2600mAh battery. Since this charger is advertised 4000mAh, I expected that it would provide me with at least one full charge, knowing that wireless charging wastes more energy while transferring compared to regular USB. However while completely charged, I was only able to get anywhere between 70-85% on it's full capacity. The standby time was also very disappointing. While not in use, the battery depleted by 25%+ over two days. Yes it does look very good and has a good build quality, but at the end of the day if it doesn't provide me with functionality, I am not going to be a happy consumer. Is this worth it? from my perspective absolutely not.

This product is great. Why is that? because it comes down to simplicity and functions. At home, I have many electronic devices in my room and additions such as chromecast etc. The great thing about this product is that it has auto detection. Whenever you turn on a certain device attached to this product, it initially recognizes on it's own and switches accordingly. Such a feature saves time, hassle and makes life much easier. It is built very well using hardened plastic, which should last for a long period of time. Not much to say other than that it is a very good product because it does what it is supposed to do, and it does it very well in a hassle free manner.

Big things come in small packages, a perfect statement to describe this little gadget. Bluetooth speakers are slowly becoming popular and for all the right reasons. I have slowly stopped using stock speakers on my phones and tablets mainly because I own a few Bluetooth speakers and they provide incredible sound. When I was offered to review this product, I was really intrigued mainly due to two reasons. One, Mengo is a small company but their products have been nothing short of spectacular so far. Two, their customer service is superb. I have not experienced much companies who respond within minutes after reaching out to them. That being said, I was intrigued by this product due to how compact it is. As for sound quality, I did not expect much since it was so small, but my assumption was so wrong.Pros1) Sound Quality- For something so small, the sound quality is superb. The Mengo AquaCube has openings on opposite sides and vibrations are put out in order to create a sense of surround sound, it is incredible. It has the perfect balance of Bass, Mids and Highs. Bass is punchy, highs are clear without hurting the ear and the lows are noticeable without being overpowered by mids or highs.2) Controls- The controls of this product are great. Everything is on top of the speaker and has a great tactile clicky feel to them, it screams premium.3) Durability/Water Resistance- The product consists of high grade rubber. It does not pick up any dirt, even after being exposed to water so it always stays clean. I have dropped it as high as 10 ft on concrete to test it's durability, no blemishes to report. However I do not recommend trying such feats, it was only done for the sake of testing. Also as advertised, it is highly water resistant. It isn't waterproof as the title states, that is a misleading advertisement that many companies tend to use. Just for testing sake, I submerged this little guy under water, about 2 feet deep. The duration of the test lasted about 15 minutes and it worked flawlessly right out of the water. This product is surprisingly well built.4) Looks- Compact, durable, and on top of that it is fashionable. The lime green isn't bright and it is a very safe color in terms of being unisex. Included along with this product is a little key chain which can be attached to a backpack or other utilities, making it easy to carry with you on the go.5) Battery Life (Maybe)- I listed battery life as a con due to the fluctuation of the durations it lasted per charge. On my first full charge, I was able to get around 3 hours of continuous playback at max volume, which is pretty good. On my second full charge, I was able to get almost 4 hours of battery life with random usage, which is spectacular as well. My first negative experience was on my 3rd full charge, the battery lasted around a little over 2 hours from continuous playback at max volume, which was a bit disappointing. However, on my most recent charge, I haven't ran out of juice after 4 hours of usage, on and off. So overall, battery life can be a little confusing but since it was a new product, it takes a few complete charges for the battery to become stable. On an average, you can expect 3 1/2 hours of battery life per charge, which is amazing for such a small device.Cons1) MicWhen receiving phone calls, the output is very clear however it does not pick up your voice very well. When I was making calls, I had complaints that my voice was being overpowered by the background noises. However this isn't the main reason as to why we buy Bluetooth speakers, so it isn't a big deal.Overall this is an incredible product. It is fashionable, durable, compact and most importantly, it does what it is supposed to do and that is to provide great sound. This is hands down by far my favorite Bluetooth speakers as of now due to how compact it is and the sound quality it provides. I would recommend this product to anyone without any hesitation. Bravo Mengo on creating another great product.

When we come across affordable items, especially products that are significantly cheaper compared to it's competitors, we tend to think of them as cheap and assume they would be of poor quality. If you are an individual who has such a perspective such as myself, I urge you to disregard that perspective and purchase this product. Why you may ask, and I will gladly state my reasons in a list basis, highlighting the Pros and Cons.Pros1) Battery Life - On a full charge, you will receive about 4 and a half hours of continuous playback at max volume. Of course there are Bluetooth headphones in the market that provides better battery life, however be prepared to pay 4 times the price. I mainly use this for the gym, and I only end up charging about twice a week. My favorite aspect is that every time you turn the headphones on, you are informed as to what level of battery is left ranging from Low, medium, high. So without guessing, you will always be aware as to whether or not you need to charge your headphones before heading out the house, bravo!2) Sound Quality- The sound quality is superb, blew my expectations out of the water. These are a little bass heavy but never gets to the point where it produces a muddy sound. The lows are clear and the highs are balanced, never hurts your ear. However the only weak point are the mids, which can get overpowered by bass but not a huge complain, just nitpicking to be specific. I mostly like to genres such as Rock/Hard Rock/Heavy Metal etc. One thing I have noticed about these headphones is that you can actually feel a "kick" from bass pedals during songs which makes listening to genres with instruments so much more enjoyable. It is a feature you really don't experience in headphones under $100.3) Controls- The controls of the headphones are awesome. They are raised from the body in their own unique shape, so whenever you put your finger on top of the icons, you will know right away by feeling as to what it is, whether to increase the sound or to pick up a call.Cons1) Balanced Comfort- By balanced comfort, I mean that the body doesn't stay in place due to weight difference of both ends of the headphones. The right side of the headphones consists of more components than the left, so while wearing these, the headphones always start to shift towards the right side and hangs in an awkward balance. However it isn't a big issue while you are working out, for casual use it might be annoying.2) Magnets- The earbuds stay in place at the end of the headphones through magnetic connection. However the magnets aren't as strong, so while walking they tend to come off easily and dangle on your neck, cause slight irritation and annoyance.After all is said and done, I would gladly live through the little cons this product consists of due to how good these sound. This is an affordable product which does what it is supposed to and that is to provide great service at a fraction of cost compared to it's competition. I would highly recommend these without any hesitation.

While wooden watches may not be for everyone, they definitely have their place in the industry. I used to be a skeptical individual who wrote of wooden watches as soon as they started to become popular. However once I received this product, I was really impressed. While it doesn't provide the same heft as a stainless steel or tungsten watch would provide, one word that comes to my mind when wearing a wooden watch is comfort. These watches are very well built but making the shift from wearing heavier watches to wooden watches such as this, the weight is almost unnoticeable. The wood is hypoallergenic so wearing them for longer periods of time is no problem to the detrimental of the wood used on this watch. The watch is big coming in at 45mm, however the light weight makes it a breeze to wear. The watch has been keeping excellent time within 5 seconds after one week, which is great for an entry level quartz movement. The bezel of the watch is fixed and cannot be moved, the entire case of the watch is uni body, which is pretty impressive to see within this price range. The Canadian Maple wood is very light and the red hour markers just pop when wearing on the wrist, it is a great vibrant summer look. Overall this is a good product. If you want to try out a wooden watch without breaking the bank, this is a wonderful product to start with.

While it seems identical to the LG's bluetooth headphone product, the overall performance might surprise you. The headphone is very sleek. While crafted from plastic, it does not look cheap at all and has a very nice polished finish. The weight is very light and it does not cause any discomfort if worn for a long period of time or during physical activities. The ear buds clip and hide right under the blades using magnets, so you never have to worry about wires gangling around your neck. Considering the price range I did not expect much but these truly blew me away. The sound quality is superb. With a very solid and tight bass, you never experience the muddy overexposed bass noise which most headphones tend to do within this price range. The mids are clear and the lows are very easy to pick up on. The battery life has been superb. On one full charge, I was able to get around 4-5 hours of battery life listening to music on loud settings. However while putting the sound down to low-medium range, I was able to pull well within 7-8 hours of battery life. These are also very durable. I have been using them as my gym headphones. I always toss them around but they have yet to show any damage. While on the neck, the headphones tend to shift to the left overtime, it isn't a big deal but sometimes can become cumbersome. I suggest in the future products similar to this, the weight is more balanced for a better experience but overall these headphones are superb for the price range and I highly recommend them.

When I first received this product I had my doubts. Considering the low price for a Bluetooth 4.0 headphone, I did not expect much. My first impression was very positive. The packaging of the product was very beautiful. It definitely did not reflect it's price point but rather something much more expensive. However once I opened the package and retrieved the product, I was a little disappointed. The overall build of the headphone is plastic and feels flimsy. The big branding of "Bluetooth Headphones" are unnecessary and looks tacky. The buttons on the headphones have a light coating of silver to give it a stainless steel appearance, but they are plastic and will look bad overtime. The comfort can be annoying, leaving your ears warm and sore. However aside from all the negativity associated with this product, let's get down to the main aspect, which is the sound quality. The performance on these headphones are superb. Bass is solid, while can be muddy at times, it isn't distracting. The mids are surprisingly noticeable and the lows are consistent. I have tested them out to various genres such as electronic, metal, hip/hop, rock etc and they all sounded very good. The battery life has been solid, in medium to high volume range, I have been able to get about 4 hours of battery life. However under low to medium sound range, I have been able to pull around 6-7 hours of battery life. Overall if you are in the market for a pair of Bluetooth headphone which won't break the bank and provide great sound quality, these are a wonderful choice. However if you are in the market for bluetooth headphones which looks good and performs well, this isn't it.

If you are a fan of vintage watches, look no further. While big considering it's design, this watch has a certain elegance to it that will make you fall in love the second you open your watch box upon arrival. While having a square design, the bottom of the case has been arched in order to provide a very comfortable fit on the wrist, which is extremely rare for watches within this price range. While a big watch coming in at around 45mm, it isn't comfortable at all due to the very low weight of the wood. The dial has a coating on it giving it a glossy look, which adds to the polished hands and hour markers, making it very classy. The movement has been performing very well, keeping time within 4-5 seconds after one week of constant usage. For being an entry level quartz movement, that is very good. My only gripe is that the links on the bracelets are big and the length of the bracelet isn't that large. I have a 7 and a half inch wrist and out of the box, the bracelet was almost a perfect fit for me. If you are someone who has a wrist size bigger than 7 and a half inch, you might need to purchase additional links. I also mentioned the links of the watches were too big because when sizing the bracelet, removing one link makes the watch too tight, whereas adding an extra will make it too loose. I suggest adding half sized links in the future products so consumers can have a better fit. Overall this is a wonderful product as an entry level watch, if you have been on the fence of trying wooden watches or looking for a good gift, this is a wonderful product to begin with.

With a very wonderful finish and a gorgeous color, this is an attention grabber for sure. While it has the regular look of a diver or sport watch, it wears very differently on the wrist. Compared to a regular Stainless steel watch, this is very light. One aspect of wooden watches that is slowly turning me into a fan is their comfort. Since it is a very light watch, wearing it for long periods of time is a blast since I almost forget there is a watch on my wrist when I am involved in activities. Since the watch is hypoallergenic, it will keep to it's true color and not turn green over time, enabling you to wear it as a daily driver. The watch can be big or small depending on what is your preference. The case is 45mm and the lug width on the bracelet is around 25-26mm. While it does wear big on the wrist, it doesn't have any comfort issues as I have stated before. Something rare within this price range is that the watch has a slightly domed crystal which adds much more to the overall look.  The bracelet has a beautiful dual deployant clasp, which rare for this price range. The hour markers and hands are coated with super-luminova in order to provide the glow in the dark effect under low light situations. The movement has been very well, keeping time within 3 seconds after one week, which isn't bad at all for an entry level quartz movement. Overall for the price this is a wonderful product. If you are on the fence of trying a wooden watch or want to give it to someone as a gift, this is a wonderful place to start.

When I first noticed wooden watches starting to become popular, I was kind of skeptical. As someone who has a passion over collecting watches and learning about the engineering behind them, I was intrigued but not too excited. When I first received this watch, I was pretty surprised...in a good way. First thing a person will notice who shifts from wearing a regular stainless steel watch to a wooden one, is the comfort. This watch is very light. While it is a big watch, coming in at about 45mm case and 24mm on the bracelet, you barely feel any sort of discomfort on the wrist for wearing it long periods of time. The bracelet is very well made, the links are big but that will turn to be an issue for some, as it did for myself. When sizing the bracelet, removing one link might not be enough for a comfortable fit, but removing two links will make it too tight. I suggest in the future products TopWell adds half sized links for a much more comfortable fit. The clasp is nice, secure and easy to close. The watch has a mineral crystal protecting the dial, with no anti reflection coating so it can be hard to tell the time under sunlight, but for the price range it is completely acceptable. The Japanese quartz movement has been excellent, has lost no time the past week I've been wearing it. The most important aspect about this watch is that it is hypoallergenic, which means the wood will stay looking fresh and clean for a long period of time, making it accessible as an everyday wearer. Overall for the price I am really impressed and if you are someone who is on the fence of trying a wooden watch, this will be an excellent affordable choice.

Before I start this review I must admit that I absolutely disliked Samsung devices prior to this phone. With a cluttered software that only caused frustration while using their phone on a daily basis, I stayed away from Samsung when it came to cellular devices. However with the new S6, Samsung has promised that they have toned down their software, also known as Touchwiz by 40%. A promise of no lag experience and a simpler UI, Samsung plans to win back their older fans and rise back to the top. Did they achieve their goals? Let's find out.ProsDisplay - With a Quad HD super AMOLED display, there is not a single phone in the industry as of now that can compete. With a pixel density of 577 pixels per inch, this is the most vibrant and beautiful display you can acquire. The colors are accurate, the white can be somewhat on the yellow side but that can be altered through the settings. With auto brightness, the screen can go as bright as 600 nits, which makes it extremely easy to read under bright lights. The screen itself is 5.1 inches but almost creates a no bezel experience due to the edge screens.Design - This has to be the most improved category for Samsung. As a company Samsung has always functioned under the philosophy of function over aesthetics. However after a disappointing year last year, Samsung reevaluated their approach as a company. They have thrown aside the plastic builds of past phones and has finally entered the world of premium and luxury. With a gorgeous pair of Gorilla glass 4 covering both the front and back of the phone, it creates a seamless feel on the hand like none other. Both pieces of glass are secured in place by a beautiful Aluminum outer rim that feels cold to the touch every time you pick it up.The buttons are snappy and very clicky and the edges of the outer aluminum rim are polished. Samsung has put great attention to detail that matches and reflects the quality of finishing as other luxurious jewelry. Thanks to the bent edges, the phone feels very slim.However one drawback of the glass body is that it picks up a lot of fingerprints. Luckily if you prefer the white color variation, the finger prints do not show at all. So if you are someone like me who does not like cases on their phones, the white color is the safest bet which is I personally purchased the white variation myself.Performance - What an improvement did Samsung make. With their new iteration of Touchwiz software, samsung had shed off over 40% of bloatware and created an almost lag free experience. I mention lag free because when the phone is in use for longer periods of time, it can become warm and causes lag here and there, but not a deal breaker. I like to be honest so I mention everything. Multitasking has never been better. Even though it is a small real estate in terms of screen size, running two programs at once is completely lag free and enables you to take care of various tasks and save time.Camera - This camera is hands down the best camera in phones as of now. The colors are crisp, the details it captures are astonishing, and most importantly it is fast. The interface itself is very minimal. With double clicking on the home button, it opens up the camera under 0.5 seconds. The software itself is so good, if you are someone who just prefers a camera for point and shoot, I feel very comfortable in saying this phone will replace any cameras you have lying around the house for that purpose (Disregard DSLR cameras etc.). With the addition of f1.9 lens, lowlight pictures are better than ever. Even though they tend to be over exposed, the picture itself comes out very clear. This is an incredible camera and I cannot stretch that enough. I've had people mistake my pictures for DSLR, yup it's that good. My only beef is the front facing camera (FFC abbreviated). Even though the FFC is really good in it's own right, the software tends to create a air brushed finish when taking selfies. This causes a somewhat unnatural look on your skin, but this happens very rarely.Finger Print Scanner - Gone are the days where you have to swipe your finger in order to open your device, now very similar to Apple, just placing your thumb on the physical button unlocks your phone. This method can also be used to verify and pay for some services online.Battery (Charging) - The new fast charging is blazing fast. Samsung promises 15 minutes of charging can provide four hours of battery life. While may be a little exaggerated, you get results very close to that promise. From 0 to 100 percent, it takes about 1 hour and 15 minutes, sometimes even less. Another addition is that the S6 now compatible with any kind of wireless charging. While wireless charging is slow at the moment, it doesn't hurt to have this feature because I use it on a daily basis myself. I have a wireless power bank which I carry around with me on a regular basis and I leave my phone charging whenever it drops low while I take care of other tasks.Cons -Battery Life (Duration) - With such powerful specs means a hungry phone. Samsung has implemented aspects such as fast charging in order to make up for the mediocre battery life but it boils down to what you prefer. With a full charge, you can expect an onscreen time from anywhere between 3 1/2 hours to 5 hours. It is very random. However if left idle and used lightly, it will easily last an entire day. Standby time is also great, it loses about 1-2% battery every 4-6 hours. Overall it is a good performer but once the heavy hitters are present such as playing video games or taking pictures, the battery drains rapidly.Overall this is by far the best phone I have ever used. I am a huge tech nerd and I am switching devices every 3-4 months whenever something new is released. I have had at least 10 different phones within the past 2 years, including all the flagships but I have never enjoyed my time so much with a single device as I have done with this one. it is such a pleasure to pick up this phone every time. Aesthetically it is unlike any other and the egdes of the phone are a pleasure to look at every time. It has the best build quality, best camera and by far the best display of any phone. Even though the cost is high, this purchase is a no brainer to me. If you are in the market for the best there is, this is it, the next big thing.

Prior to this product I have never had an experience with Smart Doorbells before. Skybell was generous enough to reach out to me in order for me to test out their product. When I first received this product, I was very impressed with the packaging. The overall packaging was very minimalistic, and the box did not contain much other than a clear instruction guide and the product itself.Installation can be a pain and I would suggest you get an electrician or someone with knowledge with wiring before attempting it yourself (wasn't pretty when I tried, due to my own idiotic self). After the hard part is done, the rest is pretty simple. Just download the Application from google play or the app store, and start using this product.The design itself is very pleasing. As someone who is big into horology, I pay close attention to smaller details. The finishing on the surface is a brushed finish which looks very premium and the button has a green LED under which makes it very visible even under low light conditions. Depending on your wifi connection, the response time from someone ringing on your doorbell to receiving the notification on your phone happens almost simultaneously. it is such an awesome feature to have. There were days where I used to miss deliveries but those days are long gone.The only con about this product is the motion sensor feature, it is a bit too sensitive. The range is pretty high, which causes unwanted doorbell to go off even if someone isn't near your door.Overall, it is a wonderful product that I highly recommend if you are someone who is looking to purchase a Wifi video doorbell.

With the new powerhouse and absolutely stunning device from Samsung, protection is a must for your investment. I was really pleased to see when Caseology reached out to me and offered me a chance to review their product. Prior to this experience, I have had nothing but positive experience with their products. Whenever I purchase a new device (usually every 4-5 months), this brand is one of the first I purchase a product from. However before going to the negative aspects, I will speak about the positive things I have noticed about this case.ProsFit - The fit is absolutely superb on this case. It is a little hard to put it in at first, however with a little pressure on the corners the phones slides in with ease and is very secured. The outer edges provides a lip, so putting your phone face down won't be an issue since the screen does not make direct contact with the surface. The back of the case is not absolutely clear (however it could be only my review unit, more on this on the con section) but it does show case the beautiful design of this device.Design - The design of this case is superb. The color is an exact match to the phone itself and does not look out of place. It is not slim by any means but nor does it add too much bulk. When holding the case in hand the first thought that pops into the head is quality. The cutouts are precise and the buttons work flawlessly.ConQuality - Now, before I go on I must say that this really applies for my experience only and I cannot speak for others. Maybe I was provided a used case for reviewing purposes but that wasn't stated by Caseology initially so I am going to state it just so the shoppers can be aware. When I received the case, it looked brand new. The case itself had no scratches, however the clear back was heavily scratched and did not look clear at all. Maybe this is a reflection of their quality control but a product in such bad shape should not have sent out. So when placing an order for this case, just be aware.Once again, maybe it was sent to me under that condition due to it being for reviewing purposes, but I like being honest and exposing every angle so shoppers can be aware.

As a person who is always on the go, a portable charger is much required for me. I take care of a lot of tasks using my phone and that leads to a lot of battery consumption. I am currently using the Galaxy S6 edge as my daily driver and it consists of a 2600mAh battery. I am mentioning this because the product itself states it has the capacity to hold 4,000mAh battery, which means under one full charge, it should be able to charge my phone completely once, and around 50% the second time around, and it just does that.The product itself is built wonderfully. The solar charge while big, looks very nicely put. It does not take away from the overall aesthetics and creates a very rugged appearance being surrounded by silicone. Which brings me to my next point, durability. The product itself is very durable. It comes with a clip which let's you attach it on a bookbag so while you are traveling and going about your daily business, that charger is charging through the solar light. The solar charger itself is very slow, but that is understandable and something you should take into consideration while purchasing this product. Being exposed to bright light for about 4-6 hours will gain about a 25% charge, which isn't bad at all. My favorite aspect about this charger is that it does not overcharge if left plugged in while charging. I leave this product charging overnight and once it finishes charging, it automatically shuts off, which speaks positively for the longevity of this product.Overall it is a very durable and stylish product that not only looks good aesthetically, but performs just as well. I have to mention that this product was given to me as a review unit but I was so pleased with it's performance that I ended up purchasing an additional 2 for my other family members. Great product and I highly recommend it.

I've always used the regular old school pump dispensers for my kitchen. However when I was approached by this company to try their new product for an honest review, I decided to step out of my comfort zone and try something new. My first impression was very positive. The quality is superb and looks very nicely finished. It is well constructed and has a minimal but an eye catching design nonetheless. The dispenser is large and holds a solid amount of soap. My average time between refills was about once every two weeks. The sensor works like a charm. Every time I placed my hand underneath the dispenser, it released soap without hassle. Good thing is the amount of soap released was moderate, which enables you to manage the soap amount better. I've been using this product for about a month now and I must say it is still performing flawlessly. Between me and my family, we use it at least 10-12 times a day and that brings me to the battery life. When I received the product initially, I put in a fresh pair of AA required battery and it still is running strong without showing any signs of slowing down.Overall I am truly pleased with this product. The built quality and performance is superb for the price point. Most importantly, this product does what it is supposed to do and does it efficiently. On a side note, from the few interactions I've had with the company and it's leaders, I feel very comfortable in saying that this product is also backed by a great solid team who is willing to provide great customer service. I know I'm not required to mention such things and it might somehow undermine my review, however credit should be given where its due and this company has done everything I have asked for in order to make sure I've had no questions or concerns over their products.

Bluetooth speakers are usually either a hit or a miss. Some tend to lack in performance while others tend to suffer in sound quality. When I was approached by the manufacturer to review this unit, I honestly did not have much expectation. Why you may ask? Well it's because of my own idiotic reasons. One, it was a product from a company of whom I have never heard of before and the other reason being was the price. Bluetooth speakers within this price range usually don't perform very well. However after exchanging some e-mails with the owner of the company, I decided to review this unit because of the great positive vibe I have received. Well enough about the less important details, let's get on to the main thing at hand and that is this product. Is this worth your hard earned money? Well lets go over the product so you can decide for yourself.When you the first receive the product, the packaging is very interesting. It is placed inside a clear hard plastic box that showcases the device along with the instructions and charging cable. The product already comes halfway charged so you can try it right away. Right off the bat, you can tell it is very easy to use. The function buttons are very large and are placed on top. If you are someone who does not have the best vision, it should be very easy on the eyes and will be easier for you to differentiate between each button. The build of this device is completely plastic with the function buttons being rubber. It has a polished look and the bezel on top around the buttons is painted with a shade of dark sky blue, if that makes sense. The bottom of the device has a huge suction cup that enables you to stick it on the wall or place it somewhere in the bathroom. Even though the device has some heft to it, the suction cup is strong enough to hold it in place. I placed it inside my bathroom about 2 weeks ago and it has still stood in place with no signs of falling off. Which brings me to the next aspect, the battery life. The battery performance has been wonderful over the last 2 weeks I have had the device. I use this speaker on a daily basis for about 20 minutes when I am taking my shower. I charged the device completely the first day of receiving it and ever since it has still been performing and did not need a recharge. As well as the battery is, sadly it is also the biggest flaw of the product. To charge this device there's only one way, and that is through using an Aux to USB cable. It is a negative because majority of electronic devices these days does not charge through such a method. So if the cable provided with the product were to break, you would need to repurchase the cable from either the manufacturer or somewhere else instead of using other cables around the house that you might have for other devices. Now to the main aspect of the device, and that is the sound quality. I must say, this product really caught me off guard. Not only does it have good clarity but it also has great bass and mids. I listen to genres that ranges from classical, to hip-hop and mostly heavy metal or hard rock. It provides a great balanced sound with punchy bass that does not sound muddy.Overall this is a wonderful product and well worth the money in my opinion. The build quality is good, and more importantly the sound quality is great. If you are in the market for a loud, clear and stylish wireless speaker, this is a wonderful choice. Hopefully my review was hopeful. If you feel as if I missed anything or you would like to know more, feel free to contact me always for additional information.

I have never been a fan of wallet covers for phones. Every wallet case I have used over the past few years either turn out to be too bulky or rather slim which doesn't allow for much storage. Due to my past experiences, I have always shied away from such cases. However recently I came across this product from Husk. The concept behind this product seemed to be abnormal, but in a positive manner. Not only did this product look good, but rather seemed very useful due to the new approach to wallet cases.The case itself doesn't provide much protection to your phone, but keep in mind that it isn't the highlight of this product. The case is very slim that provides a nice thin layer of protection on the back of your phone and closes very tightly. While inspecting the case, you can come to the conclusion that the product was very well thought out and you appreciate the work of detail. One aspect I noticed this case has that I have never seen in another case is that the inside of the product has a layer of microfiber cloth glued on the case, so the back of your phone will not get scratched and stay clean while you have the cover on your phone. This also stops dust particles from penetrating inside the case.Now to the highlight of the case, which is the back. The rear part of the case consists of two separate entities. The first thing that catches your attention is the little pocket which enables you to store cards/money/papers etc. However if you do not feel comfortable or secure storing such items in that exposed area, there is a hidden or rater private pocket which is hidden away thanks to the magnetic clasp. In order to store anything there, all you have to do is pull back the magnetic tab and store anything to your desire. One thing I found very exciting was that as to how secure the compartment was. I used this wallet regularly for about three weeks and not once did the clasp open in my pocket. It closes with a snap and stays closed very securely.Overall this is a wonderful product. Inspecting up close you can come to the conclusion that it was very well thought out. Not only does it look good and feel premium on the hand, the attention to detail makes you appreciate the product even more. The price might be high and some of you might feel hesitant and I completely understand. However I think the statement "You get what you pay for" perfectly applies to this product.Hopefully I was helpful. if you have any questions or would like to know more information about this product, always feel free to contact me.

This is a wonderful case that provides a very slim and sleek look while providing coverage for your device. I purchased the clear case to showcase the beautiful build of the nexus 6. Surprisingly it isn't so slippery and looks great. Of course since it is a clear plastic case so you can expect it to be a fingerprint magnet and it does look bad if you sweat a lot or have oily hands. I knew the plastic case would be a fingerprint magnet and I purchased the case being aware of the flaw of the material so I am not going to hold it against the company. All the cutouts of the case are perfectly done, buttons are easy to reach and the USB port to charge your phone is easily accessible.The overall fit is perfect, a little too perfect which is its biggest flaw. I know, you might be thinking to yourself is this guy serious? And I don't blame you, let me explain why. The case fits the phone like a glove and barely adds any bulk to your phone. If a slim appearance is what you seek, that is what you will get. However since it does cover the entire phone, it is almost near impossible to take off the case. The case clips on to your phone very tightly and if you want to take off the case, you need to use some strength to bend one side of the case to take it off. It is scary because the two times I had to take this case off, I was literally scared that I would damage my phone. Compared to the Spigen slim fit case, this product is better overall in terms of build and quality BUT I do like to change cases once in a while and because of that reason alone I use the Spigen case over this product, just because I don't want to risk damaging my phone taking the case off. If you aren't someone like me who won't change cases every few weeks, then you have nothing to worry about. However for someone such as me who likes buying different accessories and changing the case up every now and then, this might be an annoying experience for you.

Now that I am a little older I really do not suffer from severe acne anymore, however once a month or so I will have a usual breakout where I will experience a few big pimples. This spot treatment along with the Panoxyl 4% cream face wash combined really helps me recover at a rapid pace and clears my face up within a few days. Before I started using this spot treatment, I only used the face wash. Just the face wash alone would take about a week to clear up my face so this spot treatment really helps me deal with the bigger and badder pimples and reduces the time it takes my skin to recover. I highly recommend this product.

As a new comer in a very saturated market, being a standout company can be very difficult. Brainwavz was a company I have never heard of before and when the company reached out to me and offered me a chance to review this product, I was very curious and decided to give it a try right away. Now, I have to admit that I had doubts prior to receiving this product. Compared to other established company's around, I wonder how a smaller company would stand out in terms of packaging, extras included and quality.Let's just say after I received the product, all my doubts were gone.The headphones came packaged beautifully in a box with cool graphics on the cover highlighting the product. The front of the box has a flap that you can pull open and it reveals the beautifully crafted headphones. It is nice to see that a company puts so much effort on packaging, it is definitely a missing art in the industry and it is nice to see Brainwavz going the extra mile to make their product as perfect as possible. In the package you get a lot of stuff. The most obvious, you receive the headphones along with a carrying case. You are also given 6 different pair of tips for different functions and size for the most comfort to your need. Finally, an airplane adapter is included which if perfect for someone who tends to travel often.First, let me start with the body of the headphones. The headphones are built completely of stainless steel and quiet large in size. It has a beautiful brushed finish all around that makes them not only feel, but look very premium. The headphones are attached to memory wires that gives you total control and enables you to mold the wire to your comfort desired for the perfect fit. However, as much as I loved the memory wires, they can be a con for many. I have used this product regularly for about 3 weeks now. I use them for the gym, traveling or for just casual listening around the house. When I used this for a long period of time, the stiffness of the memory wires did cause irritation behind my ears and it started to cause pain. However to my surprise, the owner of the company reached out to me and informed me as to how they are actually removing the memory wires from the product and they will be regular cables in the future, so that will be an amazing upgrade and make this product even better than it is.Now to the most important aspect, the sound quality. Let's just say that it is absolutely incredible. The overall sound is very balanced. The bass is tight and pumpy, the mids are very well balanced and vocals are crisp and clear. I am truly surprised as to how good these are. To give you a better idea, I will describe my experience of listening to different genres so you can decide if this product is right for you.Rock/Metal/Hardcore - Usually it is very hard to find a pair of headphones that work with these genres. Most headphones these days are tweaked to sound good with the more mainstream music with enhanced bass which causes sounds of instruments to sound muddy and unbalanced. However, these headphones are very good. It provides good balanced sound with crisp and clear vocals that gives sort of a surround sound feel. The bass is tight enough for you to hear bass drums and it creates an awesome experience.Hip Hop - These headphones are solid for this genre however not the best. Due to the balanced sound the clarity is great, you can hear all the different instruments involved however the bass isn't as heavy as most people prefers. This problem however can be solved easily. If you use a smartphone as your music listening device, you can just install an application called "Music EQ" that gives you total control of the sound output of your device and you are then able to crank up the bass.Electronic Music - This genre does shine when it comes to this product. The sounds are very crisp and you can hear every effect involved very clearly. The bass drops are very strong and a total pleasure to listen to. I don't have much to say other than that these are quite good for music such as EDM, dubstep etc.Overall these headphones are phenomenal. From the build quality to the overall sound, these scream premium. The price point might be a little high for a lot of people but I am very sure that these are worth the investment. Not only are you getting an amazing product but you are also getting an amazing customer service team behind it. From my experience of speaking to the owner of the company, I can assure the future buyers that they will be in very good hands. I highly recommend this product and truly believe this is a great investment.

I was in the market for a pair of affordable headphones with quality sound. I already own a pair of high end headphones but did not feel comfortable using them for rough usage such as going to the gym or when I am working around the house fixing things. Thankfully, brainwavz reached out to me and offered me this product to test it out in order to provide an honest review. At first I had a very low expectation because I had no experience with this company before. However, once I received them in the mail, I was blown away. The quality and performance for this product far exceeds its price point. Starting from the build quality, the ear phones have a metal outer body with a beautiful brushed finish that not only looks good, but also feels very comfortable. The ear phones are very compact, they fit inside the ear and stays in firm and secure. I have used this pair of headphone under rough conditions such as jogging every morning and they never fell out, stayed inside very secure. The most amazing aspect of this product has to be its performance. The sound quality is superb. It is very balanced, has huge clarity and good bass. Most in-ear headphones in this price range usually outputs sound with heavy bass that creates a muddy sound, which compromises clarity. However as I have stated before, The Brainwavz delta earphones have a very impressive balanced sound with a good balanced bass.Now to provide an accurate review for the sound quality, I have tested this product for different genres of music. I am going to list them and share my experience so you can focus on your favorite genre to see if this works for you.Rock/Metal/Hardcore - I listen to a lot of rock and heavy metal music. I personally prefer a balanced sound with a kick on the bass for a powerful sound. For these genres, the headphones perform very well. Sometimes it does lack bass but vocals are very well balanced that does not overpower the instruments. Overall they are very impressive.Electronic Music - What can I say? I am in love. I do not listen to much electronic music but I truly believe a good pair of headphones can enhance the experience. While listening to this genre, the instruments was crisp, precise, and very balanced. The bass was very good and to hear the drops were a pleasure.Hip-Hop - This is the only genre where the headphones lacked a little. The vocals are very good, and sounds very balanced mixed with the beats. However, for many songs the bass was not very strong. I personally prefer a balanced sound so I enjoyed my experience, however for people who listens to Hip-Hop/Rap and prefers heavy bass, you might be a little disappointed.I am very happy with this product. It definitely outshines it's competitors within its price range. I feel guilty for doubting Brainwavz in the first place but after trying this product, I must say I am a fan. If you are in the market for a pair of affordable headphones, do not look any further. Drop all your doubts, and purchase this product, it is excellent.

Music is a big part of my life. Whether I am at the gym or I am at work, music is always there with me. I work with friends who are producers and musicians so I am always exposed to high end headphones. Over the years I have developed a love for them and slowly started to collect them just because various headphones perform better for certain genres of music. When I came across Brainwavz, I was really intrigued. The designs are very original and they promise great sound at an affordable price. Of course me being a headphone junkie, I had to try these out to make sure if the products actually performed to their promises.When the product first arrived to my house, to be honest the packaging caught me off guard, in a positive way. The headphones come packaged very nicely in a big box displaying the product, however it has a flap on the front of the box that you can open which exposes the headphones inside the box along with a beautiful carrying case. On the opposite side, you are given thorough details of the headphones and the technology behind it. After reading all the details on the box, which by the way is a good read, I opened up the box and took the headphones out. Right away, I was very impressed by the build quality. The headphones are built from metal and has a very nice finishing on the surface, close to a bead blasted finish. They are designed to go over your ear. Now I will admit that I am not a huge fan of the over the ear design, but I seriously fell in love with this one. Why? well there are two reasons. The first reason is, the selection of the tips you are given. Brainwavz really goes out their way to assure you of your perfect fit. They include 4 sets of tips, in two different colors (Grey and Black) to match your preference and comfort. For serious bass heads, there is a triple layered tip that goes deep in your ear to provide a big bass sound that cannot be achieved from normal buds. I have never seen such tips before and I fell in love with them instantly. However, if you are someone that cares for comfort more than sound, don't worry. Brainwavz also includes a pair of tips that are constructed of memory foam which are extremely comfortable and I use them regularly. Second reason why I love the design is because of the balance. Usually in ear headphones tend to be very unreliable when it comes to a secure fit. During my workouts they always tend to either pop out or become uncomfortable. That is why I do not use them anymore. However it has been a different case for these. The over the ear design not only provides a better fit, but it is also a more secure fit. However nothing is perfect and there is one aspect that did bother me, but might not be a big deal to others, heck it might even be a positive. The wire of the headphones tend to run a little to big for my liking. I usually use bluetooth headphones for my everyday activities because I dislike cables getting in the way. While I was trying out these headphones for the gym, they were kind of bothersome because the wires kept getting in my way, however for my brother who also tried these headphones on (for a second opinion) he had no problem. So it really depends on your preference.Now to the most important thing, sound. Even though the headphones have a wonderful build quality and appearance, it really does not compare to the performance of this product. I was honestly blown away by the balance and clarity. I usually listen to genres such as Rock, Heavy Metal, Classical, and more genres that are driven instrumentally. Usually headphones these days are geared towards the popular music such as EDM, Hip Hop, RnB etc. They usually have heavy bass and those headphones are really not fun for other genres because music tends to come out muddy. Of course to provide accurate information, I tested these headphones on the general popular genres just to see the range it is capable of. I cannot stress enough how impressive the range of these earbuds are compared to the price. When I listened to Rock/Metal music, it was not so bass heavy but rather clear. I was able to distinguish all the different instrumentals being played while still getting the kick from bass drums. The vocals are usually overpowering but with these headphones everything flows very well and it is honestly a pleasure to listen to. If you listen to rock/metal but prefer a much more heavier sound from bass, these won't be the best choice but these still have some serious bass power which balances very well without making the sound muddy. Next, I listened to some EDM and Hip Hop music. Keep in mind these are genres I do not listen to very often but I was thoroughly impressed. The bass was loud but once again not muddy, even at high volume. The one thing I keep going back to and that is the clarity of the sound it projects. While listening to these genres, I was able to hear the beats/sounds clearly and it was honestly a wonderful experience. Afterwards I decided to mess around with the equalizer and I was able to get a very bass heavy sound that messed up the clarity, but it did create a heavier sound that many people prefer.Overall these are wonderful headphones. The build quality is great and the performance is superb. With so many headphones these days it is really hard for us to decide on which to purchase and which is right for us. These headphones provide great sound with clarity that should be appreciated. For the price point, I think this product is an absolute steal and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a great pair of entry earbud that provides a taste of high end sound.

With summer right around the corner, I have been looking around for a portable speaker that I will be able to carry around with me. I do a lot of work around the house and it does get annoying wearing headphones for long periods of time, especially when I am doing a lot of physical work. I already have higher end speaker systems around the house, so I was not planning on investing too much money for another new listening device. After much research here on Amazon, I landed across this product. Now, when I saw the low price point I honestly had really low expectations. I just required something simple so I purchased this device anyway expecting the worst. Well I guess the term "never judge a book by it's cover" applies perfectly to this situation. This device is absolutely incredible and I will explain why I feel that way.Right away, the first aspect that grabs your attention is the beautiful appearance of the device and it's build quality. It is very simple. The entire body of the device is crafted from plastic, however do not let that turn you away. To test it's durability, I have dropped this device about 3 times from about 4 feet high and it did not break nor did it have any cracks. When you first turn on the device, right away you see two bright blue LED lights start blinking under the device to inform you that it is ready to be connected to a Bluetooth device. The connection was very easy and simple, took about 30 seconds. If you don't have a bluetooth device, you can still use this speaker. Not only is it a bluetooth device, it can also be used as an external speaker by connecting a music player to the speaker using an AUX cable which is also provided along with the speaker, which is a great addition. Don't like carrying around a music player along with the speaker? no worries this device also has a port for a mini SD card in the back of the device. Once you enter the SD card, the speaker automatically loads the music files and starts playing.Aside from the looks and functions, let's talk about the most important aspect and that is the sound quality. I must say, I am blown away. The sound is very clear, projects to create a form of surround sound, and has a very strong punch for good bass. I mainly listen to Hard Rock/Heavy Metal music. For me the key essential thing is clarity. I like hearing every instrument being balanced along with vocals and to my surprise this device did just that. I have headphones/speakers that cost 3-4 times more than this device but does not project music with this much clarity. Now, I understand my preferred genre isn't the most popular, so I decided to test this device on other genres. For listeners of electronic music, you can expect to hear those big bass drops without having a muddy sound and actually see the speaker vibrate, it is awesome. For Hip-Hop/Rap listeners, you can expect a perfect balance between the vocals and beats. For fans of vocals such as RnB music or country, this bad boy is for you guys also. It projects vocals very well and as I have stated many times before, the clarity of the music being projected is scary good for a speaker at this price point.Now last but not least, endurance. This speaker has a lifespan of about 3-4 hours with one full charge while perforing at full sound. Of course it does work while charging. To charge the device completely, it takes about two hours, which is my only con for this device. I wish the lifespan per charge was a bit longer due to the long charging time. However, it is one compromise I understand. For a product to be priced this low and perform this good, it is darn near perfect.If you are in the market for an affordable portable speaker, this is it. I highly recommend this one!

If you are looking for a wall charger, this is it. I currently work and attend college full time, so basically I am out of the house for majority of the day. My life and work related tasks revolves around my wireless devices such as my phone, tablet, etc. So, I always require my devices to be charged and ready to go every morning. Every time I had to charge my devices, I had to connect them in three different inserts around the house and it would be an annoying process to constantly check up on my devices to make sure they didn't over charge. So I decided to look around to see if I could find an alternative to my problem and well, I came across this product.The OXA 4 USB Port Wall Charger is just plain awesome. Not only is it very compact, but it also has a very appealing appearance. Front the front, the adapter looks very simple and has a classic design that we see everyday on other products similar to this, however the true beauty is where the insert of the ports are. The back of the Charger is done in a very stylish blue plastic, which reveals 4 USB ports. Once you connect the the wall adapter, it springs to life and the entire back of the wall charger lights up brightly, it is very nice. However, does it really matter if something looks nice but cannot perform? So I decided to put this product to the test. For a week straight, I charged 4 devices on it at once, twice a day. I charged an iPad, and 3 phones at the same time. I honestly expected the product to break from the high stress test but to my surprise, it performed just fine and still gets the job done.I am very pleased with this product. For the price point, I did not expect such a beautiful and solid product. I've had a few questions and the OXA customer service team has provided me with outstanding information. I am definitely a fan and highly recommend this product!

As of today, wireless devices has become a part of our everyday lives. We use them for various different reasons. However, as much as they make our life easier, they tend to be weak in one aspect, and that is battery life. I am someone that relies heavily on my cell phone. I am currently a full time student while working full time. I am always out the house and I never get a chance to charge my device. It is crucial that I have my phone up and running at all times, mainly because I use it to keep track of my clients for work and any downtime can be hurtful to my business. So, I have tried all kinds of solution to solve my problem. From carrying around a charger to carrying around a spare battery, I have tried it all. that is where this power bank comes into play.So what is a PowerBank? Well, a simple answer is that it is a device that can be charged to hold electrical power. Since it is portable, you are able to carry this device with you anywhere you decide to go.OXA was very generous to reach out to me and asked me if I would be interested in trying this device out. Thank you to my previous experience with OXA, it was a no brainer for me since their products are always solid. When you receive this product, you will notice right away that it is packaged very well. So what is included the package? You receive the powerbank along with a USB wire that has a detachable head. This enables you to charge any device whether it be an apple product or an android device. The device has a very sleek appearance, the outer shell is crafted from polycarbonate and has a polished (shiny) finish throughout. My favorite aspect of the device has to be the display screen. Most powerbanks use lights to indicate the remainder balance of the device, however the display screen on this device shows the amount of power stored in percentage, which is really helpful since it is providing you with detailed information as to how much power you have left. Another nifty aspect of this device is that, if you click on the power button twice, it turns on the flashlight which is on the right side of the device.If you are someone who isn't very familiar with technical terms when it comes to technology, you might be asking yourself as to what 10,000mAh stands for. Well, in simple terms mAh is mainly used to measure the capacity of a battery. The higher the number, the more power it will be able to provide to keep a device running longer.Still confused? Well let me provide you with some examples.If you have a iPhone 4/5/5S, you will be able to charge your phone completely using this device about 3-4 times per charge.If you have a Samsung Galaxy Device, you will be able to charge your phone about 3-4 times.If you have a phone with a larger battery capacity such as the Galaxy Note 3 or LGG2, you will be able to charge your phone on the go about 2-3 times completely using this device.I tested this device mainly on my Google Nexus 5 which has a battery of 2300mAh, and I was able to charge it 4 times from one full charge on the OXA Powerbank.Overall for the price point, I think this is honestly one of the best buys when it comes to power banks. Not only is the price great, OXA also has a wonderful customer service team. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to write to me so I can help you as much as possible.

Suspense, dark settings, and mystery are key elements required to keep us at the edge of our seats. Edgar Allen Poe's short story "The Fall of the House of Usher" is based on just that. Growing up, I have always been intrigued by the supernatural and loved reading literature based on the certain subject. Whether it be a fictional story or actual experiences, it would peak my interest. While attending college, a professor of mine recommended that I read this story. For it's time, it was a very controversial story. What's not to love right? Well since it was written such a long time ago, the old English was hard for me to get a grasp of and was quiet difficult to comprehend as to what was unfolding in the story. It was sort of upsetting that I wasn't able to understand and could not decipher this story properly. Luckily, I came across this rewritten version of the book in contemporary English. Now, these authors did an excellent job. The story was rewritten very carefully with the same amount of detail as the original and not once did I feel confused nor have a hard time understanding.Reading this short story in contemporary English has helped me comprehend as to why this story is such a timeless classic. I want to give my gratitude to the authors for rewriting the entire story in contemporary English, they have done a wonderful job rewriting this classic while keeping the same elements of the original!

My days are hectic. I currently work full time and attend school full time. My days are filled with constant work, whether it be physical or mental. By the end of the day I am exhausted and burned out. Sleep is very important for me because it helps me regain my energy and prepares me again for the next day. Lately I have been struggling trying go get a goodnight sleep due to some back problems and just not being comfortable while asleep. So I decided to give this product a try and well, I am extremely excited that I did!The pillow is very firm but yet soft, extremely comfortable. It comes packaged very nicely and looks very nice. The pillow fit perfectly inside the pillow cover and right away looked much fluffier and better than all the other pillows in my house. My first night, I did not know what to expect. Usually I sleep on two pillows to get a comfortable balance for my neck. Since this pillow is firm and big, I decided to sleep with just this one and not use the other pillows. To my surprise, it was very balanced and felt amazing. To explain the best way possible, it felt as if I was laying on a marshmallow. For the past few days I have been using it, I've been getting great sleep with no back pain whatsoever like I used to experience before. It is kind of astonishing as to how important and what a difference a pillow can be for a good night sleep.I usually try to stay neutral while reviewing a product but it is going to be hard for this one. I highly recommend this pillow if you are looking for a firm but soft pillow that will give you great balance and comfort while sleeping. The price point is definitely great, and the customer service behind this company is outstanding.

As a full time student and employee, I am barely ever home. Having a cell phone up and running is very important. Not only do I use my cell phone to keep in touch with friends and family, but I also use it to for work related tasks. Now, as great and powerful cellphones are today, they do lack something very important and that is a good battery life. I have tried many alternatives such as carrying an extra battery, charging in middle of class, and going as far as carrying an extra phone to make sure I never lose contact with my clients. However, all those alternatives turned out to be a hassle. Eventually I came across power banks and decided to give them a try. So why did I decide to try this product? Price and size.The Oxa power bank comes packaged very well and looks very professional. I was kind of surprised to expect such presentation for the low price point. Once you open the package, you receive the power bank and USB wires to charge the device of your choosing. It does not come pre-charged, well at least mine did not. It took about an hour to charge the power bank completely. When in charge, there is a hidden LED light under the case that just springs to life, letting you know that the device is under use. There are many aspects of this product that one can cherish, such as the compact size that makes it easy to carry, the led light confirming that the product is under use, and the different devices it is compatible with. However there is one aspect that stopped this product from becoming great. The power output to charge a device is very slow. It took about two hours to completely charge one device of 2300mAh. I have similar power banks which cost about twice the price, but however they charge at double the rate.At the end of the day if you are looking for an affordable power bank that you can just grab on the go and leave plugged in your bag to charge your device, then this is absolutely great. However if you are someone such as me who lives a fast paced lifestyle and requires more power and efficiency, than you would be better off spending a bit more and getting something stronger, such as other higher end oxa products.

Living an active life, I am always on the go. From checking e-mails to contacting clients, let's just say my phone is always under use. As great as smartphones are these days, they still lack one thing and that is a strong battery life. Thankfully, 5 Star America reached out to me one day and offered me to try out their power bank. I thought this was a great opportunity because considering my lifestyle, it would be the perfect situation to test this product. I've tested this product over a period of weeks to test not only it's performance but it's endurance. Over the years I have tried many products that worked great out of the box but failed to perform after a few weeks due to its poor quality, however that didn't turn out to be the case with this product.My performance and endurance test is pretty rigorous. I fully charged this product twice everyday. Once in The morning when I wake up and once before I leave work. After charging fully, I used it right say to charge my phone, which gave my Nexus 5 one full charge with a little bit of juice left in the bank. After this doing a little over a week, the charger still performed flawlessly and I have been using it since. Overall it is a wonderful product and for the price, not only does it look good but it is also a good performer. If you are in the market to try a power bank, don't be hesitant to try this one.

As technology progresses, we are introduced with new products that can be either useful or just for entertainment. I've always been intrigued by wireless chargers however I never wanted to pay the premium price that big manufacturers are charging as of now. I was very honored when the RavPower team reached out to me and offered me a chance to try out their new product for an honest review. I jumped at the opportunity and went in with an open mind. The RavPower team was very hasty. They shipped my package the same day of my response and the package arrived to me within two days.My first initial impression was a very positive one.
