It comes with the actual diffuser, usb cord (its extra long), blotting paper (there are several), and instruction manual (its a mini foldable pamphlet smaller than the diffuser).I plugged the diffuser up, and was able to smell the oil much sooner than I thought I would. (To be honest I didn't think I would smell anything so I started working on my site--barely 4 minutes passed when I was able to smell the awesome scent of peppermint--don't judge, its my favorite).The diffuser continues to burn off the oil until the oil is gone. This does not turn off the diffuser (keep that in mind). The most awesome part about this diffuser is that there is no burnt smell. There is no smell of plastic or paper being set ablaze (even when all of the oil is burned off).Seems the diffuser is powerful enough to work effectively yet not so powerful that you would need to be alarmed or afraid to walk out of the room while it is still plugged in. Only reason I knew the oil had burned off was because I stopped smelling that awesome scent of peppermint that I spoke of earlier.This diffuser is great for a home office. It is compact and comes with an extra long usb cord. When the diffuser is on it shines a bright blue light. The time between plugging the diffuser in and the diffuser warming up is not long at all.There are several benefits to choosing this usb diffuser over its larger plugged-in counterparts:Extremely portable. USB Cord Doubles as a charging cord for other electronic devices. Completely silent. Can be turned on using a wall connection or usb (computer) port.

These leis hold up very well. They come in multiple colors and are beautiful to behold. Are these perfect for parties? Yes. Can these leis be worn by all ages without affecting the "coolness" meter of the wearer? Absolutely.

This two toned necklace is beautiful to behold and very easy to read. The metals look extremely aged which only add to the jewelry's beauty. The chain is extremely long. Adjusting the necklace takes some practice as there are no large holes in order to shorten the necklace length.Product sent by company for review

I really enjoyed browsing this book. She writes just how she speaks. The typos make her human. I would definitely give this book to others if it were in paperback form. She gives you the floor to do just as she and others have done but this book is not about holding your hand. Either you will strive to make your dreams come true or you will keep dreaming about your desires. Point of this book: Act on your dreams. You're no different than anyone else.
This coconut oil has a slight scent to it.I have included a full video review for this product.

I am still trying to figure out how to put this together but boy was I excited to receive it. I thought it was just cardboard--literally. That is far from the case. The cardboard is just the base. There is metal, a rubber band, and lenses included in this. An update will occur when I finally get to use it.Product sent by D-Scope Pro
These leis came in multiple colors. There are several designs and they held up well being pulled off and put back on. They are really great when it comes to brightening up a party.

This is a great selfie stick. I know. I own several. It does not come with a bluetooth remote but has a remote button connected to the bottom of the stick for easy photo capturing. So far this stick works with the big 3 phones-iOS, android, and windows.

This doll made a little someone squeal with delight. I purchased the doll because I could not find this particular one in stores. It came with all its pieces in tact and the box looked as if it were straight out of the factory. Very pleased.

The crown is a deep yellow. None of the stones are missing which is a plus. This crown is not adjustable so if it is too small then it will have to rest atop your head. If it is too bog then it will just have to sit lower on your forehead. Nice costume quality.

Head over heels for this refillable perfume vial. I have been wanting one of these for months. I take this with me everywhere I take a lip gloss (and that is everywhere-literally). The vial is small and the perfume is able to be refilled from the bottom of the black vial rather than the top. I really like this travel stick-a lot.

Way to go for making me feel like I have the smallest head in the world. This hat is perfect for anyone who wants to channel their inner train engineer. Who knew the way to look exactly like a person who knows the inner workings of trains would be to wear blue and white stripes on ones head? I sure didn't.You want to know how it feels right? Well it feel like a cotton shirt that has been washed at least 7 times. Before you turn your nose up, just know that is a good thing. No one wants to walk around with an itchy brillo pad on their head (or do they?) This has can be easily folded up and put into your pocket. Want to know how I know? This hat came folded multiple times in a small box used typically for books. I was able to pull it out and it somehow managed to look exactly like the photo (somewhat). This is a definite ode to whoever (or whatever machine) stitched this.]Enough typing. I have a train to operate.Hat sent by Yagoozan for my perusal and inspection.

This thermometer works extremely well. The temperatures are read rather quickly. The display is clear and the numbers are fairly large. The buttons on the thermometer are easy to press as well as locate. The thermometer itself is extremely easy to hold.Product sent by Just-Brill

This necklace was presented in an extremely lovely jewelry box. That in itself was a lovely surprise. The gold tone of this necklace and pendant is rich in color. It is of a deeper yellow than pictured. The photos looks like 10kt gold whereas the pieces I received look more like 24kt gold. The writing on the jewelry is easy to read. The chain/necklace is extremely long and adjustable.

I was really excited to receive these seeds. The packaging, though smaller than I believed it would be, is really awesome. The biodegradable box is a really nice touch. The seeds are a mixture of flowers that reflect spring and summer. I am so anxious to see these seeds bloom into flowers.This product was sent by VREMI

This selfoe stick is pretty awesome. It comes in 4 pieces: the usb cable, the actual stick, the holster for the cell phone to actually sit in, and an orange rubber bumper for the dock.This item is great. Depending on the cell phone you use, your phone will be able to use the selfie button located on the stick. If it doesn't connect you will have to use a self timer or purchase a camera remote.*Product sent for purpose of review

Yes yes, the daylight light bulbs are more blue than daylight but you can go to yoyr local hardware store and get daylight bulbs for cheap.The 3 stands tower over my 5 foot frame when extended to their max. The umbrellas have zero tears and hold up well.The bag that is used to store the stands in is a bit shaky but the zipper hasn't broken on me. I do fear that it will give out each time I zip the items back into the bag.Overall this is so worth the money. If you know how to edit the blue hue won't matter. If anyone complains about lighting (which delayed me from purchasing it for over two weeks) they aren't complaining about much. One light can run well over $50 depending on brand.This set is epic and is taking me to the next level.

This reusable food pouch is genius. A plastic food pouch that has a ziploc closure, twist open top, and a washable interior is a money saver.6 pouches came in this box. Use them for liquids or foods with a similar consistency to yogurt or applesauce over and over. Great for all ages.*Product sent for review

The newest craze seems to be getting fibers placed on the ends of your lashes versus getting the traditional faux lashes placed at the base of the lash line.This product comes in three pieces: the cae, the transplant gel, and the fiber wand.The product indeed creates the illusion of longer lashes but it does so at times with the end result mimicking spider legs or clumpy lashes.So why five stars? The product works. Its purpose is to aid in the appearance of lengthier lashes. It does that. How the longer lashes look depends on the person applying the product.*Product sent for purpose of review

This chocolate fudge has the wonderful addition of peppermint. The jar is nice sized and has a "pop-cap" lid on it.Anything chocolate related is a personal preference. Some people like dark chocolate, others enjoy it with peanut butter, milk, mint, or orher ways. You definitely would have to try this fudge for yourself since your palette is unique to you.I can say that the jar Is half the height of a small jar of peanut butter. Being that this is fudge, that actually turns out to be a really nice size.*Product sent for purpose of review

This party bag is pure fun in a bag. The leis come in a bag of 50. They come in various bright colors and, though they are not kid proof. The leis are sturdy enough to take off and put back on with no issues, but they are prone to having the petals torn off the vine if the wearer is not careful.This party pack is perfect for any gathering or pair them with whatever outfit you have just to brighten the day.*Product sent for purpose of review

This magnetic car mount is stronger than I expected it to be. Though I like to read directions when they come with a product, it wasn't necessary when it came to this car mount. I tested this with 2 different sized phones and the magnet was able to latch on to both phones without issue. This car mount is perfect for those that just can't do without their phones, even when they are on the road.

The Govivo Reflective Vest is thinner than other reflective vests I have worn in the past. Being that this is weightless, the vest is best suited for the active person. Whether you run, ride a bike, or do any other active in the dark, this is perfect for you.The vest comes completely loosened. It was way too large for me the way it came. This told me that it was made to fit multiple frame: tall, short, thin, or wide. Though the vest itself is thin, the reflective tape is still effective. This vest will get a lot of wear in my active household.*Product sent to me for purposes of review

What you will first notice about this purse upon touching it is that its WOOL. This purse does not have a soft feel inside or out, but it IS lined on the inside. The inner lining is thing but contains pockets (which all bags need). The design is bold and reminds me of the desert. The straps are of extremely great quality. They are about 12" from where the bag would sit on your shoulders to where the straps actually meet the bag. There is no fear of the straps giving out due to carrying so much in the purse. The zipper is thin but seems to hold together just fine. Overall this is a wonderful purse to take to a place like Coachella or any event where you need to carry more than just your id and money.

This hat looked like a huge dose of fun online so I had to have it. I was rally impressed when I received it. It came in a nice sized box, wrapped in a thin  layer of plastic. The hat itself is extremely sturdy. The hat doesn't have a plastic feeling to it; its more of a hardened felt feel. The ribbon was a nice touch and a pleasant contrast from the felt.This hat is a spot on reproduction of a hat that you wold find on a Mountie. Perfect for cosplay.*Product sent for review

5 Stars! This was one impressive little gift set! The blends sound delightful! The box is gift worthy and the oils smell devine! There are 6 full size 10 ml size bottles with pastel metallic labels that lend them a gift giving charm. I have not yet tried them all but what I did was outstanding. The 6 blends are:1. Tropical Island2. Mellow Mind3. Breath Again4. Romantic Paradise5. Health Guard6. Dreamy SleepIt also comes with a little card in the box with the oils that tells about the blends. This is part of what it says:This is our most popular blends gift set and we are glad you are getting to try it out. Every essential oil has unique properties which they are known for. When they are properly blended, these properties get enhanced and create synergy. We have worked hard to formulate, try and test these blends to insure the best possible results.I was able to get this fantastic little set at a discount as part of a promo but I totally recommend this for yourself or gift giving, its well worth every penny and it has a lot of charm too!

This Lavender essential oil is fragrant, smooth, soothing and very pleasant. I would describe it as velvety so calling it Kashmir Lavender really describes the scent quite well. There is so many uses for Lavender and that is why its one of my favorite essential oils. It's truly "Essential".Kashmir to me is a way of describing something in a luxurious way but its actually a place in India so I believe the reason I have the impression about the word Kashmir as I do is because of the area of India where this oil is mainly produced.The health benefits of lavender essential oil include its ability to eliminate nervous tension, relieve pain, disinfect the scalp and skin, enhance blood circulation and treat respiratory problems. The Latin name of lavender is Lavare, which means “to wash”, due to its aroma which has a particularly clean aroma.Lavender oil is extracted mostly from the flowers of the lavender plant, primarily through steam distillation. The flowers of lavender are fragrant in nature and have been used for making potpourri for centuries. Traditionally, lavender essential oil has also been used in making perfumes. The oil is very useful in aromatherapy and many aromatic preparations and combinations are made using lavender oil.A few of the benefits are:1. CalmingRub 2-3 drops of lavender oil in your cupped palms, then use the inhalation method to draw the scent all the way into your amygdala gland (the emotional warehouse) in your brain to calm the mind. Then, rub on the feet, temples, wrists (or anywhere) for an immediate calming effect on the body. Great for use in crowded areas like planes or subways to carve out your own personal oasis.2. Sleep aidAgain, use the cupping and inhalation method. Then, rub a drop of Lavender oil on your palms and smooth on your pillow to help you sleep.3. Bee sting / Insect bitePut a drop of Lavender oil on a bee sting or insect bite to stop itching reduce swelling.4. Minor burnPut 2-3 drops Lavender oil on a minor burn to decrease pain. I recently did this after I spilled scorching hot tea on my hand at Starbucks and luckily had my lavender with me. Result: NO redness, swelling or pain. NO sign of any burn. Lavender works wonders!5. CutsDrop Lavender oil on cut to stop bleeding, clean wound, and kill bacteria.6. Eczema / DermatitisMix several drops of Lavender oil with a nut or vegetable mixing oil (coconut, sesame, etc) and use topically on eczema and dermatitis. I have a dear friend who suffers from severe eczema and swears by this.7. Nausea or motion sicknessTo alleviate the symptoms of motion sickness, place a drop of Lavender oil on end of tongue, behind the ears or around the navel.8. NosebleedTo stop a nosebleed, put a drop of lavender oil on a tissue and wrap it around a small chip of ice. Push the tissue covered ice chip up under the middle of the top lip to the base of the nose and hold as long as comfortable or until the bleeding stops (do not freeze the lip or gum).9. Dry or chapped skinRub lavender oil on dry or chapped skin.10. Chapped or sunburned lipsRub a drop of lavender oil on chapped or sunburned lips.11. Hay fever.Rub a drop of lavender oil between your palms and inhale deeply to help alleviate the symptoms of hay fever.12. Dandruff.Rub several drops of lavender oil into the scalp to help eliminate dandruff.13. Cold soresPut a drop of lavender oil on a cold sore.So now you see why this is one of my favorites and why you might want to add it to your own cart. I absolutely love this oil and recommend it to anyone and everyone and I hope it becomes one of your favorites too! I was able to get this product at a discount as part of a promotion but highly recommend it.

I am definitely loving this handy tool! I bought some mango's in anticipation of this tools arrival. It is thick and substantial and very well made. The yellow hand grips are textured to provide good anti slip traction and provide better leverage as you push through the mango. The pit pops out beautifully and I couldn't be happier. It is packaged nicely and fastened to a slick gloss cardboard hang tag printed in full color by two twist ties. The yellow grips actually have a gentle curve which I would classify as ergonomic. I found it to be quite comfortable to use and my family loves mangos so we go through a good share of them. I was not able to find a similar product at my local grocery store and if I had I still think I would have chosen this one as it has fantastic qualities, You really know you are using a well made product when you touch it. I got this at a discount as part of a promo but would highly recommend to others.

l really love this cutting board. It thicker and more beautiful than I thought it would be. I love the trough around the outer edge to catch the juices from those things you cut. The bamboo is gorgeous. I actually like to leave it out on the counter like I "forgot" it there. It dresses up the counter besides being highly functional! I was able to get this as part of a promo at a discount but I would seriously recommend this to others. Its a really keeper for sure!

Ok I needed a good waterproof bag, My daughter does a lot of sports and she was the one that actually asked for this. I ordered the largest size of these and its much bigger than I thought it would be. This would be great for a coach, with a bunch of equipment. Its very well build, it is made of a very thick plastic or rubber material and anything you have in this bag for sure, WILL NOT GET WET. Top quality, expertly manufactured. Very satisfied customer. Thank you so much!

My family burns through back up battery packs pretty fast. I really liked this one though. It came packaged nicely in a box with instruction sheet, but its pretty simple to handle so that isn't necessarily necessary. I charged it off the computer because I was on the computer the day it came. There is a plug box included and you can charge it up that way if you prefer. It has three cables that are fused together with a USB on one end and three different common charge ends on the other. There was a micro, an Apple and another, maybe another micro, those two looked very similar. Any way it fit both mine and my husbands Android phones just fine. One or the other of us is frequently low battery and tethering to a charger or a car charger isn't always practical.We had a soccer game to go to last night. Parents night. My husband had 38% battery. So I decided to test it out at the game. Once plugged in it started charging at a pretty good rate, I wish I had charted the time started and the time it was done but like I said we were at the game and I wasn't paying attention. The battery pack itself is kind of heavy but it has a sleek design, the size is about that of a normal phone but slightly slimmer. The texture is amazing. I have to say I LOVE the texture of the batter pack, it's like anti skid almost, not smooth and slippery, which I think allows it to grip the dash when placed in a car, maybe, not sure, but it's nice.By the time we got back in the car the phone was charged up and there was still battery life on the charging battery. It has 4 lights so you can tell and it had 2 remaining when I checked. There is also a button on the side so you can plug in and remember to push the button. It makes sense because otherwise it could be leaking charge while sitting there not plugged into anything so I like the on off button feature.I was really surprised at the quality and speed at which it charged my husbands phone. The USB port got warm but it wasn't hot so I think that is a good feature too. Over all I rated it as a 5 star and we are very happy with its performance, not to mention the price. Its really a great deal and quite affordable so if you chose to do it, you could get each member of your household one and not be out a lot of money. I think this would make a great holiday gift as its durability and quality are outstanding and the box lends itself for easy wrapping and gift giving.This is an excellent product and I received it at a discount as part of a promotion but I would highly recommend for others and will likely be purchasing more for my own gift giving this holiday season.

Ok, several things about this lamp. I bought it for the purpose of clamping to the shelf above my desk. I have two computers there and no other lamp has been able to angle in from the top like this and adequately provide the desired amount of light to light up my desk. The blueish hue it offers provides a very day like light without the yellow mist that is common with many other lamps. Ok that has a lot to do with the bulb but Im saying these are great for an office. The 2 Levels of Brightness allow me to adjust for overcast days or bright days when the sun is coming in the window but also allow for enough light to brighten my desk top and computer keyboards well into the evenings when the house becomes dark. I also like its flexibility as it adjusts to the required angle and shape to accommodate the full range of lighting needs. I want the light on my hands and on my computers and desk top but not in my face, over my shoulder or top of my head.  The clamp is strong, supports the lamp easily and protects from scratching the wood on my desk shelf.I love that it uses 3xAA Batteries and is powered by AC Adapter or USB, it automatically uses the AC Adapter's Power to light the lamp so you have some options, depending on the wiring of your office. Mine is horrible and the long wall that my desk sits against doesn't even have one plug. I have to run an ungrounded extension cord over to my computers and just the location and electric set up of my office is rotten. This lamp adjusts to such a situation well. For this reason I gave it a 5 stars. I am very please with the lamp and although I got it at a discount as part of a promotion I would definitely recommend it to others. Thank you for providing such a wonderful light source. I appreciate it to no end!

I got these for my grand daughter, she is young, too young to crochet but when she is able these are perfect. Its a full set with different sizes and brightly colored to stimulate the young mind, The handles are bigger and ergonomic so they will be comfortable for her to learn with. I got these at a discount as part of a promo but highly recommend them for teaching for the reasons I stated above. Love them!

The reason I purchased this Dance Crazy Muscle Madness Sports Massager stick is for these reasons.Benefits of Using Dance Crazy Muscle Madness Sports Massager  Roller1) Increase circulation: Manipulation of the muscles causes the blood vessels to dilate and pump more blood into the muscles and fascia.Benefits:Before Exercise: warms up the tissues and make them more pliable to stretching, and less prone to injury.After Exercise: flushes the residue of exercise (i.e. metabolic waste products) from the muscles to hasten recovery.2) Treats Connective Tissue scarring and muscular adhesions, which result from normal training and body imbalances.Benefits:Before Exercise: breaks down dysfunctional scarring that forms as your body attempts to heal from the stress of your previous workouts. Helps create functional scarring that makes you more resilient to injury.After Exercise: relaxes tired and tight muscles, works out the knots (muscle spasms) that occur when muscles are overtaxed.3) Sensory Stimulation from the proprietary, textured surfaces of the Dance Crazy Muscle Madness Sports massage tool stimulate the nervous system to create a reflex relaxation of the muscles, much the same way acupressure works.Benefits:Before Exercise: works out the knots and relaxes the small muscle spasms, known as trigger points, which result from workouts and daily life and interfere with proper muscle and joint function.After Exercise: relaxes muscle spasm that occurs in fatigued or overtaxed muscles.I was able to get this massage roller at a discount as part of a promotion in exchange for my opinion and I would recommend this to others.

I love Myrrh and use it all the time! Both myrrh resin and myrrh oil have a long history of medicinal use, valued for their wound-healing properties. Egyptians used myrrh to treat hay fever and heal herpes.8 Myrrh oil has also been used as incense and a holy oil in religious rituals and ceremonies for over 5,000 years.Maintaining healthy skin is one of myrrh oil's renowned uses, as it prevents the signs of aging and soothes cracked or chapped skin. This is why it's commonly added to many skin care products today.Myrrh oil is also used for:Adding fragrance for perfumesEmbalmingFlavoring food productsMyrrh oil is also a valuable aromatherapy oil that can be used for massages, mixed in bathwater, or simply applied on the skin. You can also:Use it as a mouthwash to help eliminate dental infections.Put it in a cold compress to relieve sores and wounds.Add it to creams and lotions to help relieve skin infections, such as athlete's foot, ringworm, weeping eczema, bedsores, boils, carbuncles, and acne.I was able to get this bottle at a discount as part of a promotion and would definitely recommend to others!

Excellent knee sleeve, its soft fabric and holds a healing knee in place while the copper works to help heal the joint. It is light and easy to wear and can be used under normal clothes discreetly. Easy to remove and yet stay securely in place. Received this as part of a promotion at a discount but I would recommend to others.

I LOVE tea tree oil. It is one of my most used oils. It kills bacteria and promotes healing, its an excellent oil to have on hand, You must google it and all it's uses. I like this Invivo Essential oil because it is in a 4 oz bottle and since I use so much of it I never buy any less than this. I was so happy to get my hands of this item! Received this as part of a promotion at a discount but I would recommend to others.

There is some great value in this package, you are getting several bags. They are all good quality and in a variety of shapes and sizes. Most of the bags like this are sold one or two at the most together. This is an incredible deal. Received this as part of a promotion at a discount but I would recommend to others.

I had one stupid scar on my forehead from a curling iron and I have used this about 6 weeks now. I have it down to just a bump and I am continuing to use this. It works and that's really all you expect out of a product. You won't waste your money and you will get a product that actually works. It takes a while but what doesn't? Received this as part of a promotion at a discount but I would recommend to others.

My dogs don't care for chicken livers so I gave this away. However, if your dog does like these I think they are a great treat. They are super easy to stick in the leash bag and go and they won't spoil or leak livery disgusting smell on the leash bag and car seat. It's definitely a great way to take REAL MEAT along for the dogs, as they are freeze dried, not dehydrator dried so the keep very well in open air. Received this as part of a promotion at a discount but I would recommend to others.

Excellent water bottle. I still have not gotten much of a fruity taste from anything other than citrus fruits but  I will keep trying. The flip lid makes sense and the finger grips are a good idea. It still develops condensation so I had to crochet a cozy for it. Other than that, it does exactly what you would expect a water bottle to do. The color is bright so they look nice too. Received this as part of a promotion at a discount but I would recommend to others.

This is easy to deal with, pops right in to securely hold your phone. Pops out easily to store away or move to another vehicle with ease. Does exactly as it is designed to do. Received this as part of a promotion at a discount but I would recommend to others.

Excellent tool. I used on lemons and limes and found it to be easy to handle. Its long and very practical design allows you to push long strokes and grates elegant coils. The handle is secure and the steel is firm. No flexibility wanted and none had. This is THE tool for zesting. I would recommend to others.

Mixed smoothly, tastes good, easy to digest. Doesn't make you burp and no gas later (like egg white protein) Felt good going down but not over powering chocolate, just "enough" chocolate. Worth the money. I would recommend to others.

This is really a nice simple way to store knives. I got a set that didn't come in a block and the plastic thing they came with was designed poorly and I never cared for it much. I bought this one and its great! Its super stong and holds the knives securely. It was a little long for the spot I wanted to put it so I am still trying to figure out a better place but for what it is, and was designed for it is definately top quality. Buy with confidence (just measure before you order) I did receive it at a discount as part of a promo and may gift it as I dont' have a good spot but its hard to gift as I actually really love it!

Im sorry, I know someone put a lot of effort into making this item, but its cheap and big and has a lot of parts. Its plastic and it isn't any where as cool and rugged looking as it looks. It cuts softer vegetables much easier than the harder ones like potatoes or sweet potatoes. I dread digging it out to use as there are a lot of pieces, it doesn't stay put together like it looks in the pictures, feels cheap, box looks cheap and out dated. I mean, I guess it works ok, so I gave it 3 stars but durability and storing it needs maybe a better design and better grade of plastic. I probably won't keep it.

Absolutely PERFECT in every way. Its heavy and solid and sturdy and scoops just right like you would expect. The handle is lightly padded and it cleans up easily. Its everything you would ever expect a ice cream scoop to be. I could not be happier, except if it came with ice cream!

I already know I like it so the product I can say is just fine. It came two day prime, which was good but when I unpacked it, it was slippery and I had to wash the outside of the bottle with soap and water to get the greasey feel off. I think some leaked, not enough to make the package damaged but just enough to make it mildly unpleasant to handle. Im not sure if others have gotten theirs like that, but it doesn't make my buying experience a skip in the park. I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased feedback and I think its fine if it doesn't leak which it did so Im still kind of on the fence about it. It works as expected but that just leaves me with one leg on either side of the fence with this one.

This book is very very short. I think the "thoughts" are all good but it's basically a "think good, say good, be good"  Its just doesn't have any depth and the book is too short to really rate it. Yeah the philosophy is good but its not long enough to inspire or influence, if you are looking for just a quick positive affirmation then this will work, if you want more out of it you won't get it. The quote is I have all seen before and Im not sure about how it is organized if it is organized at all... I guess it was worth every penny I paid since I got it for free but I wouldn't pay for this if given the choice.

Excellent! I really like this rake. Excellent quality! The shorts are sewn very well, there is a non slip grip on the legs so they stay in place. I have two track athletes in my family and I ordered these compression sleeves for one with shin splints. To really understand how compression socks and sleeves work, it’s important to have a basic understanding of how blood flows through the body. The heart pumps oxygen containing blood to our extremities and working muscles though arteries. Once the cells use the oxygen and other nutrients from the blood, the then deoxygenated blood, along with lactic acid and other waste products enter the veins to get taken back to the heart. Once the blood gets back to the heart, it’s oxygenated from the lungs and the process is repeated.Keeping oxygenated blood flowing to muscles is important for performance. The more oxygen the cells have, the better they will function. During exercise, the body produces lactic acid as a waste product. If this lactic acid is not removed from the muscles, it can contribute to soreness and decreased ability to perform. Another factor in decreased performance is muscle fatigue. Muscular vibration during physical activity contributes to fatigue. Think about how much shock and vibration is going through your leg muscles as you pound pavement with 3-5 times your body weight while running. Over time, those little vibrations of the muscles add up and they become fatigued.Now that we know what the blood and muscles are doing while we are running, let’s talk about what compression socks and sleeves do to help the body. Compression socks and sleeves provide graduated compression, meaning the compression is higher (tighter) at the foot and ankle and lower (looser) as it moves up the calf and lower leg. This type of compression helps to fight the effects of gravity and assist the body in venous return (deoxygenated blood flowing back up to the heart).My daughter said she put the socks on and ran her events and she remembered them "feeling tight" at first but she quickly forgot about them and felt great during her events. I received this product as part of a promotion in exchange for this review and I think understanding how they actually work is important in reflecting on the performance of the product. Based on the technology that has gone into these sleeves and my daughter's testimony on her shin splints disappearing from her mind I have to rate these as a 5 star and highly recommend them. Excellent job!! As I am writing this review this is our second set of compression socks (they each wanted their own, go figure!)

Love this Argan oil! I love to use organic products when I can and was very happy to get hold of this. Argan oil loads with various nutrients. It is primarily used for hair or skin care, though some cosmetics will also take advantage of this oil. Read on to get more detailed information of the its benefits. The unique combination of antioxidant and moisturizing properties in this oil can help to maintain skin elasticity while preventing moisture loss that can contribute to the aging process. This oil can make the skin look softer while limiting the appearance of stretch marks, under eye circles, burns and wrinkles as well and damage from smoking, pollution or harsh sunlight. It can help to regulate sebum so the skin will not look greasy and manage the body’s pH so the skin will be less likely to become irritated.Applying argan oil to the hair can make it look healthier by preventing frizz and split ends. It can make the hair look shinier and eliminate limp tresses by hydrating the roots and strengthening the hair, making your hair more manageable. This can help to reduce the risk that outdoor activities or styling will break or damage the strands of hair. Argan oil provides a high dose of fatty acids that can make brittle hair stronger and improve the protein structures without adding a sticky, oily component to the hair. The high antioxidant content of argan oil can help to improve immunity to certain diseases including endometrial, prostate, breast or colorectal cancer. Using this oil has been known to improve brittle nails, soothe arthritis and rheumatism pain and insulin resistance. Men have found that using argan oil can improve triglyceride levels to help ward off cardiovascular disease.Argan oil is very high in omega-6 fatty acids and linoleic acid which can provide anti-inflammatory, anti-aging, antioxidant and moisturizing properties for the skin.It also contains omega-9 unsaturated fatty acids and vitamin A which provide high doses of antioxidants.This oil also contains 620mg of trocopeherols which have the same activity as vitamin E. This is twice the amount of this chemical compared to the more common olive oil.The trocopherol content of argan oil makes it a powerful antioxidant that can help to protect soft tissue by neutralizing the effects of free radicals.I love this oil in particular because it feels silky and smooth and soaks right into my skin. I feel it nourishing my hair and my skin and hair look vibrant because of it. I received this product at a promo discount and would absolutely recommend it to others. EXCELLENT quality! Thanks so much!!

My daughter has been using this and she likes it a lot. She says she gets hungry but when she is eating she get full very quickly. She has lost about 3 pounds in the last week and hasn't put a lot of effort into it other than taking this supplement. It has only been about a week so I will try to come back and update my review as she progresses. She is 16 so she isn't exactly a "child". She's very active but for some reason she likes carbs and I think that is her main downfall. The supplement seems to help her control that and she is doing well on it.
